798.description: As introduced, enacts the "Urban Agriculture Zone Act." - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 43 and Title 67.

799.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to educational materials.
799.description: As introduced, prohibits the state textbook and instructional materials quality commission from recommending or listing, the state board of education from approving for local adoption or from granting a waiver for, and LEAs and public charter schools from adopting or using textbooks and instructional materials or supplemental instructional materials that promote, normalize, support, or address lesbian, gay, bi-sexual, or transgender issues or lifestyles. - Amends TCA Title 49.

800.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
800.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 50, Chapter 1, relative to employment.
800.description: As introduced, requires certain employers to utilize an e-verification program in hiring; removes immunity for an employer's reliance on other forms of verification; makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 50, Chapter 1.

801.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to global positioning monitoring.
801.description: As introduced, enacts "Amanda Mercer's Law." - Amends TCA Title 36; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

802.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 2 and Title 40, Chapter 39, Part 1, relative to animal abuse.
802.description: As introduced, establishes enhanced penalties for acts of animal cruelty when committed against 10 or more non-livestock animals at the same time and place. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 2 and Title 40, Chapter 39, Part 1.

803.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
803.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 53, relative to industrial development corporations.
803.description: As introduced, adds to projects under the authority of industrial development corporations certain facilities or expenditures paid or incurred for a system, plant, or equipment for the provision of certain telecommunications services; authorizes a municipality to provide aid or assistance for such projects. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 53.

804.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
804.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 6, relative to absentee voting.
804.description: As introduced, deletes a provision making it a Class A misdemeanor for a person who is not an employee of an election commission to give an unsolicited request for an application for an absentee ballot to any person; deletes a provision making it a Class E felony for a person who is not an employee of an election commission to give an application for an absentee ballot to any person. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 6.

805.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
805.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 6, Part 2, relative to absentee ballot applications.
805.description: As introduced, requires an applicant for an absentee ballot to only include the last four digits of the applicant's social security number on the application rather than the applicant's full social security number. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 6, Part 2.

806.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
806.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 37; Title 47; Title 53 and Title 71, relative to welfare.
806.description: As introduced, requires the department of human services to promulgate rules to phase out SNAP and TANF asset limits over a four-year period. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 37; Title 47; Title 53 and Title 71.

807.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
807.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to corporal punishment.
807.description: As introduced, prohibits corporal punishment in public schools. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

808.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5, relative to confidentiality of data captured from license plate reader systems.
808.description: As enacted, requires that captured plate data from automatic license plate reader systems be treated as confidential and not be open for inspection by members of the public; schedules provision to expire July 1, 2026. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5.

809.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
809.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 6; Title 37; Title 41 and Title 49, relative to juveniles.
809.description: As introduced, increases from 60 to 90 the number of days by which the department must submit any new policies adopted by the department to the judiciary committee of the senate and the committee of the house of representatives having oversight over children and families for review. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 6; Title 37; Title 41 and Title 49.

810.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, relative to tourism development.
810.description: As enacted, increases maximum amount of additional fee that may be imposed on certain sales in central improvement districts under the Convention Center and Tourism Development Financing Act; specifies how additional fee may be used. - Amends TCA Title 7.

811.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
811.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, relative to convention centers.
811.description: As introduced, authorizes the board of directors of a convention center authority to allow members to participate by electronic or other means of communication. - Amends TCA Title 7.

812.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 43; Title 53 and Title 68, relative to the "Tennessee Food Freedom Act".
812.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Food Freedom Act" to specify circumstances when persons may sell certain homemade food products without meeting certain permitting and licensure requirements. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 43; Title 53 and Title 68.

814.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
814.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49 and Title 71, relative to the Tennessee Anti-Lunch Shaming Act.
814.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Anti-Lunch Shaming Act"; prohibits a school from taking certain actions against a student who cannot pay for a meal, or who has accumulated a meal debt; requires a school to provide a United States department of agriculture reimbursable meal to each student who requests one; requires a school to assist parents and guardians with obtaining free or reduced-price meals for the parent's or guardian's eligible student. - Amends TCA Title 49 and Title 71.

815.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
815.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 50, relative to sex discrimination.
815.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Pay Equality Act" to revise present law concerning sex-based discrimination in compensation for employment. - Amends TCA Title 50.

816.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
816.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7 and Title 65, relative to telecommunications.
816.description: As introduced, authorizes a municipal electric plant to provide telephone, telegraph, telecommunications services, or other like systems, plants, or equipment within the corporate or county limits of another municipality without needing to obtain consent; increases the minimum download and upload speeds required for an entity to be awarded a broadband accessibility grant. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7 and Title 65.

817.last_action: Failed in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
817.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, Chapter 20, Part 1, relative to housing authorities.
817.description: As introduced, broadens the types of lessees with whom a housing authority may negotiate payments in lieu of taxes if the city or county for which the housing authority was created authorizes such negotiation. - Amends TCA Title 13, Chapter 20, Part 1.

819.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 17, Part 1; Section 8-21-205 and Title 48, Chapter 101, Part 5, relative to certain funds collected by the department of state.
819.description: As enacted, requires that funds collected from charitable organizations that solicit contributions be used by the secretary of state to defray the costs of the division of the department of state in administering laws governing charitable solicitations; requires that portion of certain filing fees collected by the secretary of state from business organizations be used to defray operating costs of the division of the department of state. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 17, Part 1; Section 8-21-205 and Title 48, Chapter 101, Part 5.

820.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
820.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 36, relative to broadband services authorization.
820.description: As introduced, authorizes a municipal energy authority whose principal office is located within a county with a population of 25,000 or less that has also been designated as a tier 3 or a tier 4 enhancement county to provide cable or internet service within the portion of the county that is outside of the authority’s electric system service area if the authority obtains the consent of each telephone cooperative, electric cooperative, and municipal or other governmental electric system in whose territory the authority will provide those services. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 36.

822.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 105, relative to blasting standards.
822.description: As introduced, increases fine that may be assessed against persons who fail to give notice of blasting operations prior to conducting such operations; reduces maximum allowable peak particle velocity limits for blasting site distances; revises other provisions regarding blasting. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 105.

823.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 51; Title 39; Title 45; Title 47 and Title 48, relative to financial institutions.
823.description: As introduced, prohibits a licensee that offers interactive sports wagering from allowing a person to place a bet or wager at the same location as where the person entered into a flex loan plan, a title pledge agreement, a deferred presentment services agreement, or a check cashing transaction; prohibits certain provisions in documents for such transactions. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 51; Title 39; Title 45; Title 47 and Title 48.

824.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
824.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 32 and Title 40, Chapter 7, relative to criminal procedure.
824.description: As introduced, clarifies that when changes are made to a citation in lieu of continued custody form, a law enforcement agency may destroy the agency's existing supply of forms and begin using a new form; clarifies the definition of "mistaken identity," as it relates to expunction, to mean that the person arrested was not the individual the arresting officer believed the person to be at the time of arrest. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 32 and Title 40, Chapter 7.

825.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 15, Chapter 2, relative to days of special observance.
825.description: As enacted, designates the month of June as "African-American Music Appreciation Month." - Amends TCA Title 15, Chapter 2.

827.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63 and Title 68, relative to dementia education.
827.description: As enacted, requires the department, in collaboration with other public and private healthcare agencies, to incorporate information about Alzheimer’s disease and other dementias into its existing public health programs and services. - Amends TCA Title 63 and Title 68.

828.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
828.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to the Solemn Covenant of the States to Award Prizes for Curing Diseases.
828.description: As introduced, enacts the Solemn Covenant of the States to Award Prizes for Curing Diseases compact. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

829.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 43; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 55, relative to consumer protection.
829.description: As enacted, requires a manufacturer, under certain circumstances, to replace farm machinery with comparable farm machinery or accept return of the farm machinery and refund the full purchase price and related repair costs, less a reasonable allowance for use and a reasonable offset for physical damage; creates a civil cause of action for consumers. - Amends TCA Title 43; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 55.

830.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 53, relative to the board of directors of industrial development corporations.
830.description: As enacted, requires each member of a board of directors of an industrial development corporation to complete a conflict-of-interest statement; requires the Tennessee Ethics Commission to post on its website a sample conflict of interest statement. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 53.

831.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
831.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39; Title 43; Title 47; Title 49; Title 62; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to the regulation and taxation of tobacco and tobacco-derived products.
831.description: As introduced, deletes requirement that commissioner of revenue share information pertaining to enforcement of Tennessee Tobacco Manufacturers' Escrow Fund Act of 1999 with the attorney general and reporter. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39; Title 43; Title 47; Title 49; Title 62; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68.

832.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 21, Part 7 and Title 39, relative to civil rights.
832.description: As introduced, expands the offense of civil rights intimidation to include a person who injures, threatens to injure, or damages the property of another due to the other's actual or perceived employment as a law enforcement officer or judge. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 21, Part 7 and Title 39.

833.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
833.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 50, relative to unemployment insurance.
833.description: As introduced, increases, from 30 days to 36 days, the time in which a distress warrant issued as a result of an employer defaulting in payment of premiums or interest to the department is returnable. - Amends TCA Title 50.

834.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
834.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 8; Title 16 and Title 50, relative to leave for state employees.
834.description: As introduced, changes, from 15 to 30, the number of days before the employee wishes the leave to commence that an employee seeking to qualify for leave to compete in the Pan-American or Olympic competitions must make the leave request. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 8; Title 16 and Title 50.

836.last_action: Action Def. in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee to General Sub
836.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to scholarships.
836.description: As introduced, enacts the "Opportunity Scholarships Program," which creates a scholarship program for students who reside in certain LEAs with a minimum average growth of two percent in average daily membership over the previous five fiscal years to attend certain eligible private schools. - Amends TCA Title 49.

837.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
837.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 24, relative to county officials.
837.description: As introduced, eliminates the mandatory compensation increase for county officers; updates county officer minimum salaries to the 2020-2021 fiscal year amounts. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 24.

838.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 34; Title 42; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to certificates of need.
838.description: As introduced, increases from 60 to 70 days the period within which the departments of health, mental health and substance abuse services, and intellectual and developmental disabilities must file a written report with the health services and development agency detailing findings of a review of an application for a certificate of need. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 34; Title 42; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

839.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
839.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to response to instruction and intervention.
839.description: As introduced, requires the BEP formula to fund one full-time response to instruction and intervention (RTI²) position per 1,000 students or one full-time RTI² position for each LEA, whichever is greater. - Amends TCA Title 49.

840.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 7 and Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to economic impact of changes to periods of imprisonment in government facilities.
840.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing appropriations in regards to laws that result in net increase or net decrease in periods of imprisonment in state facilities. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 7 and Title 9, Chapter 4.

841.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 49; Title 62 and Title 67, relative to workforce development.
841.description: As enacted, requires each high school to designate an apprenticeship training program contact; requires the department of education to compile and publish a list of the apprenticeship program contacts. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 49; Title 62 and Title 67.

842.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 41, relative to the health of inmates.
842.description: As enacted, requires that female inmates who are 50 through 74 years of age be offered a mammogram or other appropriate screening every two years; requires that female inmates who are 40 through 49 years of age be offered a physician consultation to inquire when a mammogram is needed; requires correctional institutions, which does not include city or county jails, to the best of their ability, to provide educational training on the importance of preventative health care to the inmates. - Amends TCA Title 41.

843.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
843.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to hospitals.
843.description: As introduced, changes from July 1, 2021, to July 1, 2024, the termination date for the "Tennessee Rural Hospital Transformation Act of 2018," - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 68 and Title 71.

844.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 4, relative to consumption of alcoholic beverages on the premises.
844.description: As enacted, authorizes the sale of alcoholic beverages for on-premises consumption at various locations. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 4.

845.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 6; Title 8, Chapter 30; Title 41 and Title 49, relative to correctional teachers.
845.description: As enacted, deletes the requirement that teachers in the special school district of penal and reformatory institutions receive annual compensation at a rate of one tenth times 12 of the annual compensation in effect in the county in which the respective institution is located or one tenth times 12 of the average of the annual compensation of all the counties that are contiguous with the county in which the respective institution is located, whichever is greater, solely out of the state appropriations made to the respective institutions; deletes the prohibition against paying longevity to teachers in such special school district. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 6; Title 8, Chapter 30; Title 41 and Title 49.

846.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
846.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to special education.
846.description: As introduced, allows the advisory council for the education of students with disabilities to submit its annual report electronically to the governor, the general assembly, and the state board of education. - Amends TCA Title 49.

847.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
847.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 8, relative to the use of off-highway motor vehicles on highways.
847.description: As introduced, authorizes off-highway vehicle operation on certain segments of State Route 56 and State Route 108 in Grundy County. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 8.

848.last_action: Assigned to s/c Higher Education Subcommittee
848.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 49 and Title 67, relative to the expansion of employee-owned businesses.
848.description: As introduced, enacts the "Grow Jobs Through Employee Ownership Act," to support the growth and expansion of employee-owned businesses. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 49 and Title 67.

849.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
849.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13; Title 35, Chapter 8, Part 1; Section 37-10-204; Section 38-6-121; Title 39; Title 40, Chapter 6, Part 3; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 54; Title 55; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to telecommunications.
849.description: As introduced, requires the public utility commission to post on its website in a manner accessible to the general public an electronic copy of the most recent annual report to the general assembly and governor on all matters relating to the commission for the preceding year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13; Title 35, Chapter 8, Part 1; Section 37-10-204; Section 38-6-121; Title 39; Title 40, Chapter 6, Part 3; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 54; Title 55; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68.

851.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
851.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, relative to the beer barrelage tax.
851.description: As introduced, reallocates 3 percent of revenue derived from the beer barrelage tax that is provided to the general fund to the department of agriculture for the purposes of supporting growth in the utilization of Tennessee agricultural products in brewing and in the promotion of the growth of the Tennessee brewing industry. - Amends TCA Title 57.

852.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 3-1-102 and Section 5-1-111, relative to district boundaries.
852.description: As enacted, authorizes the comptroller of the treasury to extend the January 1, 2022, deadline for county legislative bodies to redistrict due to the United States census bureau delay in releasing the results of the 2020 federal census. - Amends TCA Section 3-1-102 and Section 5-1-111.

854.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 58, Chapter 2, relative to the continuation of business during states of emergency.
854.description: As enacted, enacts the "Business Fairness Act," allowing businesses that comply with safety precautions and guidelines issued by the government or authorized agency during declared states of emergency to continue or resume business. - Amends TCA Title 58, Chapter 2.

855.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 4; Title 13, Chapter 7; Title 67, Chapter 5 and Title 67, Chapter 4, relative to the collection of privilege taxes on occupancy.
855.description: As enacted, redefines "hotel" for purposes of the hotel occupancy tax to mean any structure or space, or any portion thereof, that is occupied or intended or designed for occupancy by transients for dwelling, lodging, or sleeping purposes, and includes privately, publicly, or government-owned hotels, inns, tourist camps, tourist courts, tourist cabins, motels, short-term rental units, primitive and recreational vehicle campsites and campgrounds, or any place in which rooms, lodgings, or accommodations are furnished to transients for consideration. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 4; Title 13, Chapter 7; Title 67, Chapter 5 and Title 67, Chapter 4.

856.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 6, Part 1, relative to producer licensing.
856.description: As introduced, changes, from 18 to 19 years, the minimum age someone must be for the commissioner to be authorized to approve the individual's application for an insurance producer license. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 6, Part 1.

857.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
857.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to virtual education.
857.description: As introduced, establishes the pupil/teacher ratios for virtual schools, rather than allowing the state board of education to do so; authorizes virtual schools to exceed maximum class sizes by up to 30 percent; requires virtual schools to comply with the class size and caseload requirements for special education established by the state board of education. - Amends TCA Title 49.

858.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 25; Title 29 and Title 47, relative to social media.
858.description: As introduced, prohibits social media platforms from including in their contracts provisions that limit, authorize the limitation of, or censor political or religious speech. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 25; Title 29 and Title 47.

859.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to organ donation.
859.description: As introduced, requires an organ procurement organization to contact family members of a decedent within five hours of the decedent's death to inquire about organ donation and makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 63 and Title 68.

860.last_action: Failed in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
860.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 1, relative to lead-level tests.
860.description: As introduced, clarifies that local boards of education are required to implement a policy that incorporates, at a minimum, biennial testing for lead levels in drinking water. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 2, Part 1.

861.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Business & Utilities Subcommittee
861.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 10; Title 13; Title 45 and Title 67, relative to economic development.
861.description: As introduced, enacts the "Support Micro-Businesses Act" to create a revolving loan fund to support certain small businesses. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 10; Title 13; Title 45 and Title 67.

862.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
862.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to no knock warrants.
862.description: As introduced, prohibits a court from issuing or a law enforcement officer from serving a no knock search or arrest warrant; defines a no knock warrant as a warrant that specifically enables an officer to enter a structure without giving notice of the officer's authority or the purpose of the officer's presence. - Amends TCA Title 40.

863.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, relative to nurses.
863.description: As enacted, adds nurses to the assault against a first responder who is discharging or attempting to discharge official duties statute. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13.

864.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to instructional salaries and wages.
864.description: As enacted, requires the board to determine the percentage of any increase in funds appropriated to the instructional salaries and wages component of the basic education program (BEP) and increase the minimum salary on the state salary schedule by that percentage. - Amends TCA Title 49.

866.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-3-126, relative to motor vehicle liens.
866.description: As enacted, eliminates the condition that a first lienholder or the first lienholder's designee may only file an application for a motor vehicle temporary lien with the secretary of state when a manufacturer's statement of origin or an existing certificate of title on a motor vehicle is unavailable. - Amends TCA Section 55-3-126.

867.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
867.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 14; Title 50 and Title 67, relative to unemployment.
867.description: As introduced, enacts the "Modernized and More Efficient Employment Security Act." - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 14; Title 50 and Title 67.

868.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
868.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 58, Chapter 2 and Title 68, relative to public health emergencies.
868.description: As introduced, authorizes the general assembly to end a state of emergency that was declared because of a public health emergency by the passage of a joint resolution; requires the governor to provide certain information to the general assembly relative to a declared state of emergency based on a public health emergency. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 58, Chapter 2 and Title 68.

869.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 28; Title 29 and Title 40, relative to victim compensation.
869.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing restitution to victim; extends, from one year to two years, the time within which a victim of a crime may file a claim with the criminal injuries compensation fund. - Amends TCA Title 28; Title 29 and Title 40.

870.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 59, Chapter 8, relative to reclamation.
870.description: As introduced, exempts open pit mines and quarries from local regulations when reclaiming a pit with fill material from a highway project, if operator complies with the Clean Water Act and other relevant state regulations. - Amends TCA Title 59, Chapter 8.

871.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
871.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7 and Title 86, relative to emergency communications districts.
871.description: As introduced, requires the state emergency communications board to promulgate rules to establish uniform standards for 911 emergency communications districts that include uniform dispatching requirements and standards and that require emergency communications districts to be staffed by employees or contract workers of the districts; exempts certain urban counties from the requirement. - Amends TCA Title 7 and Title 86.

872.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
872.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to property bought by a county at a tax sale.
872.description: As introduced, provides that whenever Coffee County acquires property at a tax sale, any non-governmental entity holding a vested and duly recorded contractual right to the payment of fees or assessments secured by such property retains such right; further provides that Coffee County will be liable for the payment of such fees and assessments if the county makes actual use of the property purchased at the tax sale. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 67, Chapter 5.

873.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 37, relative to child placement.
873.description: As enacted, requires the caseworker for a child who has been placed in foster care to document any objection to the child's placement with a relative that is made by another relative or other interested party; requires the department of children's services to include the number of such objections in its annual report on foster care. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 37.

874.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Insurance Subcommittee
874.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 56; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
874.description: As introduced, increases, from 15 days to 20 days, the time from the date an agency contract is executed or the first insurance application is filed that an insurer has to file a notice of appointment for appointment of a producer under the Insurance Producer Licensing Act. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 56; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

875.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
875.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
875.description: As introduced, deletes obsolete requirement for the commissioner of commerce and insurance to study impediments to insuring persons who have used force that is justified. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 56 and Title 71.

876.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 63-10-216, relative to pharmacies.
876.description: As enacted, makes changes with regard to compounding pharmacies, including allowing out-of-state pharmacy practice sites to provide certain inspections, equivalent to what are currently required, if accepted by the Tennessee board of pharmacy and removing the requirement that pharmacies engaging in sterile compounding have to make certain quarterly reports to the board. - Amends TCA Section 63-10-216.

877.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, relative to health care sharing ministries.
877.description: As introduced, exempts certain health care sharing ministries from the application of the insurance laws of this state, including licensure. - Amends TCA Title 56.

878.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
878.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to TennCare.
878.description: As introduced, increases from 30 to 45 days the time period in which an enrollee or applicant for medical assistance must mail documentation of a material change affecting the enrollee or applicant's TennCare application. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

879.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 38, Chapter 3; Title 39, Chapter 17; Title 43; Title 50; Title 53; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to cannabis for medical use.
879.description: As introduced, requests the department and its division of health related boards to perform a study on the licensure and regulation of cannabis for medical use by departments of health and medical professional licensing boards in states contiguous to Tennessee and report findings to the general assembly's health committees by December 15, 2021. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 38, Chapter 3; Title 39, Chapter 17; Title 43; Title 50; Title 53; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68.

880.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to rioting.
880.description: As enacted, expands the offense of aggravated rioting to include rioting by a person who travels from outside the state with intent to commit a criminal offense and participating in a riot in exchange for compensation; increases the mandatory minimum sentence for aggravated rioting to 60 days if the person commits more than one aggravating circumstance. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

881.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to school discipline.
881.description: As introduced, enacts the "Keep Kids in School Act," which requires the department to issue guidance and recommendations on developing a school discipline policy; requires local boards of education and charter school governing bodies to adopt a discipline policy that aligns with guidance and recommendations issued by the department. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

882.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-5-409, relative to educator contracts.
882.description: As introduced, changes the timeframe within which written notice must be provided by a local board or director of schools to a teacher of dismissal or failure to reelect from received within five business days following the last instructional day of the school year to sent within five business days of the last day a teacher is required to report to work in a school year. - Amends TCA Section 49-5-409.

884.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
884.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, relative to temporary assistance.
884.description: As introduced, provides a $400 supplement to families receiving temporary assistance for three months to offset expenses related to purchasing personal protective equipment, job loss, internet costs associated with virtual education and job searches, and other pandemic-related expenses. - Amends TCA Title 71.

885.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
885.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 71, relative to the Families First Act of 1996.
885.description: As introduced, requires an annual cost of living increase for families first temporary assistance payments based on the consumer price index. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 71.

886.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 11, relative to the department of environment and conservation.
886.description: As enacted, requires the commissioner to promulgate rules that take effect by July 1, 2021, to create a commercial use authorization to allow persons wanting to engage in commercial activities at state parks or state natural areas to obtain a permit to do so; specifies that the rules must include fees structured to promote park self-sufficiency and economic development. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 11.

887.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-21-401 and Title 40, relative to expunction.
887.description: As enacted, authorizes a clerk to charge a fee of less than $100 for expunction; expands the offenses for which expunction is permitted; revises other related provisions. - Amends TCA Section 8-21-401 and Title 40.

888.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
888.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 26 and Title 63, Chapter 2, relative to healthcare liability.
888.description: As introduced, changes from within five business days to 10 business days after a second undeliverable healthcare liability letter the time within which the notice has to then be mailed to the provider's office or business address at the location where the provider last provided a medical service to a patient. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 26 and Title 63, Chapter 2.

889.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to alternative education.
889.description: As enacted, authorizes an LEA to remove a student from the regular school program without assigning the student to an alternative school or alternative program if the student was suspended or expelled for certain offenses that may threaten the safety of persons attending or assigned to the regular school program and the alternative school or alternative program is located on the same grounds as the regular school program. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

890.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
890.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 1, relative to the use of opioid antagonists for drug-related overdoses.
890.description: As introduced, authorizes certain entities providing addiction treatment services or residential housing services for those in recovery to receive opioid antagonists and to administer those opioid antagonists in certain situations if certain criteria is met. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 1.

891.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
891.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 55, relative to school transportation.
891.description: As introduced, reduces, from 10 to five days, the period of time in which a change in the contact information of a checker designated to make sure that no person remains on a school bus must be submitted to a local board of education. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 55.

892.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 32, relative to expunction.
892.description: As enacted, allows a person who was convicted of a nonviolent offense committed prior to January 1, 1980, and received a pardon for the offense to have the person's criminal records related to the offense expunged. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 32.

893.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
893.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 6, Part 3; Title 38 and Title 39, relative to domestic violence.
893.description: As introduced, includes a domestic relationship between the victim and the defendant as an aggravating factor in sentencing for first degree murder; adds strangulation as an aggravating factor for reckless aggravated assault; expands aggravated assault to include reckless strangulation; requires law enforcement agencies to implement written policies requiring officers to screen victims of domestic violence; directs TACIR to study domestic violence prosecutions. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 6, Part 3; Title 38 and Title 39.

894.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
894.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to sentencing.
894.description: As introduced, directs TACIR to conduct a study comparing the length of sentences imposed on individuals currently incarcerated with current sentencing guidelines, and identify any disparities between sentences imposed for similar offenses; requires TACIR to submit a report to members of the general assembly by January 1, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

895.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Criminal Justice Subcommittee
895.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 29, relative to voting rights.
895.description: As introduced, allows certain persons deprived of the right of suffrage to apply for a voter registration card and have the right of suffrage provisionally restored if the person enters into a payment plan to become current on all child support obligations. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 29.

896.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Criminal Justice Subcommittee
896.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 16, Chapter 3, Part 8; Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 11, relative to bail bonding.
896.description: As introduced, establishes a registration program for the regulation and oversight of bail bondsmen by the department of commerce and insurance. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 16, Chapter 3, Part 8; Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 11.

898.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 54 and Title 8, Chapter 47, relative to the Tennessee Firearms Freedom Act.
898.description: As introduced, creates a civil action against any government entity, official, employee, or agent that violates a person's right to bear arms under the Tennessee Constitution or United States Constitution; specifies such a violation may be prosecuted as official oppression; provides for injunctive relief; clarifies that the enforcement of any law is not considered a violation. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 54 and Title 8, Chapter 47.

899.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
899.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to sexual offenders.
899.description: As introduced, requires a sexual offender or violent sexual offender to report to a designated law enforcement agency to update the offender's registration within five days of the offender's birthday rather than within seven days. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

901.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 50 and Title 70, relative to weapons.
901.description: As enacted, enacts the "Second Amendment Privacy and Protection Act of 2021," - Amends TCA Title 10; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 50 and Title 70.

902.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
902.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-9-302, relative to crash helmet requirements for riders and passengers of motorcycles, motorized bicycles, and motor-driven cycles.
902.description: As introduced, exempts drivers and passengers over 26 years of age from the requirement to wear a crash helmet while operating or riding in motorcycles, motor-driven cycles, and motorized bicycles, if the person is covered by health or medical insurance other than insurance through TennCare; makes a violation of the helmet law a secondary offense. - Amends TCA Section 55-9-302.

904.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
904.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12 and Title 68, Chapter 120, relative to accommodations in public restrooms.
904.description: As introduced, requires newly constructed or renovated buildings that are open to the public to contain at least one restroom containing a powered, height-adjustable, adult-sized changing table if constructed or renovated after a certain date. - Amends TCA Title 12 and Title 68, Chapter 120.

905.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
905.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 24, relative to the collection of moneys owed by a criminal defendant.
905.description: As introduced, changes the allocation formula for moneys paid into the court by adding restitution owed to the victim to the formula, and directing that the payment of restitution is to be credited first, until paid in full, then litigation taxes, payment of costs, and the fine. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 24.

906.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
906.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to restitution.
906.description: As introduced, permits a general sessions court to direct a defendant to make restitution to the victim of an offense as a condition of payment or as a civil judgment; changes the court's mandatory duty to consider the defendant's financial resources in determining the amount of restitution to a discretionary one. - Amends TCA Title 40.

907.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
907.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to reports of child abuse or neglect or child sexual abuse.
907.description: As introduced, permits a person who has been accused of child abuse or neglect or child sexual abuse to petition the court with jurisdiction over the allegations to order the department of children's services to identify the reporter for good cause shown; prohibits the department from accepting reports for which the reporter refuses to provide the reporter's name and contact information. - Amends TCA Title 37.

908.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
908.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 13, relative to political parties.
908.description: As introduced, prohibits a political party from considering an incumbent legislator's legislative voting history when determining whether a candidate is a bona fide member of that party for purposes of appearing on the ballot. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 13.

909.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5, relative to public records.
909.description: As enacted, revises provisions regarding confidentiality of certain information in records of person arrested or charged but not convicted of an offense and information in accident reports. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5.

910.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 58, relative to businesses.
910.description: As introduced, requires any government entity responsible for issuing an emergency shutdown order requiring businesses to close or partially shutdown to reimburse the business; provides that businesses receive compensation for a shutdown based on their proceeds from the previous fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 58.

911.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 58, relative to executive orders.
911.description: As introduced, requires the governor to transmit copies of federal executive orders to the joint government operations committee for review and to recommend to the general assembly whether further action should be taken based on the recommendation. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 58.

912.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to tax refunds.
912.description: As enacted, allows for sales or use taxes collected from a customer by a dealer being refunded to the customer if the customer twice requested a refund from the dealer and the dealer failed or declined to issue the refund and other criteria are met. - Amends TCA Title 67.

914.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 62-4-109, relative to the practice of aesthetics.
914.description: As enacted, authorizes a licensed aesthetician to perform cosmetic microneedling if performed under the supervision of a licensed physician. - Amends TCA Section 62-4-109.

916.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
916.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 49 and Title 66, relative to local education agencies.
916.description: As introduced, revises bidding procedures for an LEA that does not follow the local governing body’s procedures to require 10 business days’ notice prior to the acceptance of bids for construction of, or additions to, buildings in excess of $10,000, instead of 10 days’ notice. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 49 and Title 66.

917.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 4 and Title 67, Chapter 4, relative to taxes.
917.description: As enacted, specifies that a vacation lodging service is not a short-term rental unit marketplace for purposes of being responsible for collecting and remitting tourist accommodation taxes and hotel occupancy taxes. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 4 and Title 67, Chapter 4.

918.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
918.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, relative to landlords.
918.description: As introduced, prohibits a landlord from refusing to enter into a rental agreement with a prospective tenant solely based upon the tenant being previously evicted during a public health emergency related to COVID-19. - Amends TCA Title 66.

919.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 17, relative to hearing instruments.
919.description: As enacted, adds cerumen management in the course of examining ears by certain persons in the definition of the practice of dispensing and fitting hearing instruments; imposes certain requirements in regard to cerumen management. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 17.

921.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
921.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health care.
921.description: As introduced, changes from annually to semi-annually the frequency of the submission to the governor of reports of the board of dentistry’s proceedings and activities. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 63 and Title 68.

922.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
922.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 71, relative to nursing homes.
922.description: As introduced, removes an obsolete reference regarding when the department of health must provide recommendations related to protecting nursing home residents from vendors and others who would seek to provide inappropriate or unneeded goods and services, or otherwise divert personal needs allowance funds for uses other than meeting residents' personal needs. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 71.

923.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to law enforcement.
923.description: As enacted, revises various provisions of the Freedom from Unwarranted Surveillance Act. - Amends TCA Title 39.

924.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to cyber security.
924.description: As enacted, adds certain cyber security-related information to the information that the state-level safety team must include in the template safety plan that LEAs must adopt as part of their comprehensive district-wide and building-level school safety plans. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

925.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 18, relative to the employment of minors.
925.description: As enacted, allows an age-restricted venue to continue to permit smoking in the venue even if the venue employs a person under 21 years of age if the employee is at least 16 years of age, the child of the owner of the venue, and the venue is not an adult-oriented establishment. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 18.

926.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 1 and Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 6, relative to criminal offenses.
926.description: As introduced, increases the percentage of restitution for victims of aggravated assault, injured in the scope of their official duties as employees of a penal institution, that will be deducted from the inmate's commissary account from 50 percent to 60 percent, - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 1 and Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 6.

927.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 38 and Title 39, relative to the Tennessee Second Amendment Sanctuary Act.
927.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Second Amendment Sanctuary Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 38 and Title 39.

928.last_action: Action def. in Government Operations Committee to 2022
928.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9 and Title 64, Chapter 6, relative to regional megasites.
928.description: As introduced, extends the Memphis regional megasite authority to June 30, 2024. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9 and Title 64, Chapter 6.

929.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
929.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 1, Part 3, relative to state symbols.
929.description: As introduced, designates the ladder as the official state tool. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 1, Part 3.

931.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
931.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to doulas.
931.description: As introduced, requires that doula services be provided to recipients of TennCare; requires that the doula services be performed by a person who has received certain certification. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 56 and Title 71.

933.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
933.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 9-21-106 and Title 66, relative to solar energy.
933.description: As introduced, authorizes no more than one commercial or industrial customer or group of customers to enter into a lease under which the customer or group of customers pays for the use of a solar energy system, or enter into a power purchase agreement (PPA) under which the customer or group of customers pays a specific rate for the electricity that is generated each month from a solar energy system. - Amends TCA Section 9-21-106 and Title 66.

934.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
934.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to harassment.
934.description: As introduced, makes it a discriminatory practice for a person who is paying a non-employee for labor or services to engage in harassment of the non-employee because of the non-employee's sex; holds such persons liable for the actions of their employees in engaging in such harassment under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

935.last_action: Failed in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
935.title: AN ACT to to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13 and Title 64, relative to the "Regional Strategic Infrastructure and Resiliency Planning Act".
935.description: As introduced, creates the "Regional Strategic Infrastructure and Resiliency Planning Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13 and Title 64.

936.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
936.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to voting machines.
936.description: As introduced, requires a county election commission purchasing or entering into a contract to obtain a voting system to ensure that the system produces a voter-verifiable paper audit trail. - Amends TCA Title 2.

938.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Public Service Subcommittee
938.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 56, relative to state health plan rates.
938.description: As introduced, requires the state group insurance plan, starting in the 2022 plan year, to have an alternate allowable charges schedule to allow enrollees to utilize the services of any licensed medical provider in the United States without being penalized with out-of-network cost sharing charges, except as provided in the schedule, and to have a preferred tier and non-preferred tier. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 56.

939.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
939.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 12 and Title 58, relative to state government.
939.description: As introduced, reduces from 90 to 60 days the period, after the end of the fiscal year in which savings are realized, that a cash award must be paid to a state employee under the employee suggestion award plan for an adopted suggestion that results in substantial savings to this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 12 and Title 58.

940.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
940.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3 and Title 8, relative to public officials.
940.description: As introduced, authorizes the governor to designate a person for purposes of approving notaries public in this state. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3 and Title 8.

941.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
941.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 10 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to temporary tax relief.
941.description: As introduced, directs TACIR to conduct a study regarding the use and effectiveness of sales tax holidays as temporary tax relief. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 10 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

942.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20; Title 29 and Title 50, Chapter 1, relative to employee rights.
942.description: As enacted, clarifies that non-compliance with state and federal anti-discrimination laws is not included in the definition of "illegal activities" as it relates to provisions prohibiting retaliatory termination of an employee. - Amends TCA Title 20; Title 29 and Title 50, Chapter 1.

943.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, relative to fees charged by clerks.
943.description: As enacted, requires the circuit court clerks, criminal court clerks, clerks and masters of chancery courts, clerks of courts of general sessions, county clerks, clerks of juvenile and probate courts, and clerks of law and equity courts within Knox County to charge the standard schedule of fees. - Amends TCA Title 8.

944.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
944.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 50, relative to the unemployment trust fund.
944.description: As introduced, changes, from 90 days to 95 days, the time from the mailing date or in-person delivery of a monetary determination for benefits to a claimant that the claimant has to protest the monetary determination. - Amends TCA Title 50.

945.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Health Committee
945.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5 and Title 68, relative to health.
945.description: As introduced, establishes a deadline of January 1 for the submission of the annual plan of expenditures with relation to state grant-in-aid funds submitted by each county to the commissioner of health. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5 and Title 68.

946.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 17 and Title 62, Chapter 19, relative to auctions of previously titled motor vehicles that are antique or unique.
946.description: As enacted, authorizes the sale or purchase of previously titled antique or unique motor vehicles without a motor vehicle dealer license through auction formats that meet certain criteria. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 17 and Title 62, Chapter 19.

947.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to certificates of need.
947.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Health Services and Planning Act of 2021," which revises various provisions of and renames the Tennessee Health Services and Planning Act of 2002. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71.

948.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
948.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 102; Title 68, Chapter 11 and Title 68, Chapter 120, relative to alarm devices.
948.description: As introduced, requires that a carbon monoxide alarm be installed and maintained in one and two-family rental units; requires that such rental units with gas powered heaters have a carbon monoxide alarm in rooms used for sleeping; requires existing battery-powered smoke alarms be replaced with smoke alarms containing tamper-resistant battery units. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 102; Title 68, Chapter 11 and Title 68, Chapter 120.

950.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 35, relative to criminal offenses.
950.description: As enacted, creates the offense of negligently, by act or omission, engaging in conduct that places a child in imminent danger of death, bodily injury, or physical or mental impairment. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 35.

951.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
951.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5 and Title 8, relative to county retirement plans.
951.description: As introduced, authorizes a county that provides a retirement and pension plan to its employees and does not participate in the state consolidated retirement system to provide for the establishment of retirement credit for employees who left employment with the county in order to perform military service in the armed forces of the United States and is reemployed by the county after such military service. - Amends TCA Title 5 and Title 8.

952.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40, Chapter 11 and Title 55, relative to monitoring systems.
952.description: As introduced, requires the magistrate to provide a victim who participates in a global positioning monitoring system with emergency assistance number, in addition to the number for a local law enforcement agency. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40, Chapter 11 and Title 55.

953.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8, Chapter 30; Title 9; Title 10 and Title 12, relative to proceedings against state employees.
953.description: As introduced, requires a state agency in a proceeding to suspend, terminate, or discipline an employee in state service to prove by a preponderance of the evidence that the employee violated state law or a rule or policy of the agency prior to taking such action. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8, Chapter 30; Title 9; Title 10 and Title 12.

954.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5 and Title 40, Chapter 39, relative to juvenile offenders.
954.description: As enacted, prohibits juvenile courts from placing certain juveniles on judicial diversion; imposes certain other restrictions on juveniles adjudicated delinquent for certain acts. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5 and Title 40, Chapter 39.

955.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
955.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 71, relative to long-term care.
955.description: As introduced, changes from February 1 to January 15, the date by which the bureau of TennCare must report to the general assembly a separate accounting of long-term expenditures for nursing facility services, home and community-based services made under the CHOICES long-term healthcare program, and employment and Community First CHOICES services. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 71.

956.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
956.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, Chapter 6, Part 1 and Section 39-13-519, relative to sexual offenses.
956.description: As introduced, requires the bureau to create a system by which victims of sexual assault offenses can obtain the location and status of the victim's sexual assault evidence collection kit using a tracking number; changes various timelines for collecting, storing, and submitting sexual assault collection kits. - Amends TCA Title 38, Chapter 6, Part 1 and Section 39-13-519.

957.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
957.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 43 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to agriculture.
957.description: As introduced, adds sales tax exemptions for certain agricultural equipment and technology purchased by qualified farmers and nurserymen that are used for conservation farming practices; modifies eligibility criteria based on row crop acreage for cost-share grants associated with the department of agriculture's Tennessee agricultural enhancement grant program for applicants who engage in conservation farming practices. - Amends TCA Title 43 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

958.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 63, relative to licensure of professional counselors.
958.description: As enacted, enacts the "Interstate Compact for License Portability Act" for professional counseling services. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 63.

959.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
959.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 10; Title 3; Title 4, Chapter 55 and Title 8, Chapter 50, relative to ethics.
959.description: As introduced, allows members of the board of directors for the bureau of ethics and campaign finance to also receive electronic notice of any special meeting being called by the board's chair, in addition to the written notice required to be delivered personally or left at the member's residence under present law. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 10; Title 3; Title 4, Chapter 55 and Title 8, Chapter 50.

960.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 38-3-113, relative to immunity.
960.description: As enacted, states that a law enforcement officer meeting certain qualifications who makes an arrest outside of the law enforcement officer's jurisdiction has the same legal status and immunity from suit as a state or local law enforcement officer making an arrest within the state or local law enforcement officer's jurisdiction if certain circumstances are met. - Amends TCA Section 38-3-113.

961.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-2-130, relative to released time courses.
961.description: As introduced, increases from one-half credit to one credit, the number of credits that may be awarded to a student for work completed in a release time course under a policy adopted by a local board. - Amends TCA Section 49-2-130.

963.last_action: Failed for lack of motion in: Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
963.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 7-86-303, relative to emergency communication board funding.
963.description: As introduced, removes the prohibition on a board of directors reducing the base funding amount for an emergency communications district unless local government funding for the district was reduced. - Amends TCA Section 7-86-303.

964.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 104, relative to fireworks.
964.description: As enacted, requires the state fire marshal to verify that an applicant for a fireworks permit is locally licensed to do business in this state and is registered with the department of revenue prior to issuing a permit. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 104.

965.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to private funding for elections.
965.description: As enacted, establishes certain restrictions and limitations on state election commission, secretary of state, coordinator of elections, county election commission, and administrators of elections in regard to funding for elections, the acceptance of certain gifts, and the expenditure of certain funds. - Amends TCA Title 2.

967.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6, Chapter 54 and Title 7, Chapter 53, relative to housing incentives.
967.description: As enacted, defines the terms "economic development" and "project" to include incentives that promote the development of single-family housing, for purposes of laws governing projects by industrial development corporations and contributions to industrial development corporations by municipalities. - Amends TCA Title 6, Chapter 54 and Title 7, Chapter 53.

968.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
968.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, Chapter 8, Part 1, relative to the Public Safety Through Hiring Act.
968.description: As introduced, enacts the "Public Safety Through Hiring Act," which prohibits law enforcement agencies from hiring a person as a police officer who was fired due to disciplinary infractions or while under investigation for misconduct in the line of duty, or who resigned or retired while under investigation for disciplinary infractions or misconduct in the line of duty. - Amends TCA Title 38, Chapter 8, Part 1.

969.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
969.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 3-1-102, relative to senatorial districts.
969.description: As introduced, updates references to 2020 TIGER system and geography; clarifies provisions concerning districts, terms, and vacancies prior to November 2022 elections. - Amends TCA Section 3-1-102.

970.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
970.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 1, relative to redistricting.
970.description: As introduced, enacts the "Fair Maps Act," which establishes requirements for the process of redistricting congressional and general assembly districts. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 1.

971.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
971.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to Schedule VI controlled substances.
971.description: As introduced, reduces, from a Class A misdemeanor to a Class C misdemeanor, the offenses of knowing possession, casual exchange, and distribution of small amounts of marijuana; establishes early release eligibility for nonviolent offenders convicted of Class A misdemeanor marijuana offenses. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

972.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 10, relative to advanced coursework.
972.description: As enacted, enacts the "SEM Advancement Act," which requires a local board of education or charter school governing body to develop and adopt a policy that establishes criteria for the enrollment of students in grades seven through 12 into available advanced English language arts, mathematics, and science courses. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 10.

973.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Health Committee
973.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 68, relative to health and safety.
973.description: As introduced, creates the state opioid task force to determine best practices for addressing opioid abuse and addiction and the resources needed to implement such practices. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 68.

974.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 3 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to taxes.
974.description: As enacted, provides for the allocation of certain revenue from state and local sales taxes to pay for the capital and operation expenses associated with a motor sports facility. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 3 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

975.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4, relative to drugs.
975.description: As enacted, excludes from the definition of marijuana "a product," instead of "a cannabidiol product" approved as a prescription medication by the United States food and drug administration; specifies that such a product will be redesignated, rescheduled, or deleted as a controlled substance. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4.

976.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
976.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-6-101, relative to county clerks.
976.description: As introduced, requires county clerks to retain $3.00 of the $11.00 fee for noting liens, encumbrances, or mortgages on a certificate of title; requires that the retained funds be earmarked for office supplies and equipment related to the notations. - Amends TCA Section 55-6-101.

977.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 3 and Title 55, Chapter 8, relative to public property.
977.description: As enacted, creates a Class C misdemeanor offense, punishable by a $50 fine and community service work, for camping along a controlled-access highway or entrance or exit ramp; expands Equal Access to Public Property Act of 2012, under which it is a Class E felony offense for a person to camp on property owned by the state knowing that the area on which the camping occurs is not specifically designated for use as a camping area, to apply the offense of unauthorized camping to all public property. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 3 and Title 55, Chapter 8.

978.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
978.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 67, relative to insurance policies.
978.description: As introduced, extends the effective date of a commercial risk insurance policy cancellation from 10 days to 15 days after notice is mailed to a named insured. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 67.

979.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
979.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33 and Title 68, relative to mental health.
979.description: As introduced, changes, from 30 days to 40 days, the number of days a committing court has to hold a hearing on a reinstatement order after the person files a written request for the hearing. - Amends TCA Title 33 and Title 68.

980.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
980.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 2, relative to reckless endangerment.
980.description: As introduced, increases the punishment for reckless endangerment with a deadly weapon to a Class D felony if the offense occurred during a road rage incident. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 2.

981.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to adverse childhood experiences.
981.description: As introduced, requires LEAs to implement an adverse childhood experiences (ACE) program; creates a process to refer students who have experienced four or more ACEs to appropriate mental and behavioral health providers and makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

982.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 9; Title 4; Title 8 and Title 67, relative to the council on pensions and insurance.
