982.description: As enacted, changes name of the "council on pensions and insurance" to the "council on pensions"; removes bills involving insurance from council's purview; removes requirement that bills reported out of the council have the council's committee amendments attached to be considered by the standing committee. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 9; Title 4; Title 8 and Title 67.

983.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to water access in public schools.
983.description: As introduced, requires a local board of education or the governing body of a public charter school to incorporate water bottle filling stations as part of any new school building construction; major renovation; or substantial repair, replacement, or upgrade of a school building's plumbing system or fixtures. - Amends TCA Title 49.

984.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
984.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 67, relative to state funds.
984.description: As introduced, requires each board to notify the commissioner of finance and administration when the estimate of board fees for a fiscal year is more than the certified amount of board fees required by the board for that fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 67.

986.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
986.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-7-2109 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17, relative to the privilege tax imposed on persons engaged in certain occupations.
986.description: As introduced, eliminates the professional privilege tax for tax years that begin on and after June 1, 2022. - Amends TCA Section 49-7-2109 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17.

987.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
987.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 68, Chapter 140, relative to ambulance services.
987.description: As introduced, specifies the types of standards that the Tennessee emergency medical services board may promulgate related to the licensure of air ambulance services and special personnel equipment operation and activities; identifies such standards as including response and operations standards, standards for communications, and records and forms. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 68, Chapter 140.

988.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40 and Title 55, relative to nonpayment of litigation taxes, court costs, and fines.
988.description: As introduced, extends the time, from 30 days to 60 days, within which a person may reestablish or demonstrate compliance with a payment plan for unpaid litigation taxes, court costs, and fines in order to avoid the suspension of the person's driver license. - Amends TCA Title 40 and Title 55.

990.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to sexual contact with an inmate.
990.description: As introduced, requires the department to review the federal Prison Rape Elimination Act to examine how the state standards of detection and response to prison rape could be improved, and report its findings and recommendations to the governor and general assembly by January 15, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

991.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to TennCare.
991.description: As enacted, enacts "Terrence's Law," which requires the bureau to conduct an annual review of all medications and forms of treatment for sickle cell disease, and services for enrollees with a diagnosis of sickle cell disease that are eligible for coverage under the medical assistance program; requires the bureau to solicit and consider input from the public when conducting the annual review; requires annual report to the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

993.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
993.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 38, Chapter 6; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the Tennessee violence intervention program.
993.description: As introduced, creates the Tennessee violence intervention program within the department's office of criminal justice programs to invest in evidence-based violence reduction initiatives. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 38, Chapter 6; Title 39 and Title 40.

994.last_action: Failed in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
994.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 32, Part 1, relative to the expunction of certain criminal records.
994.description: As introduced, decreases from five to three years the amount of time that must have elapsed since the completion of a person's misdemeanor sentence before the person may apply for expunction of records. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 32, Part 1.

995.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to child care.
995.description: As enacted, authorizes the department to utilize an enrollment-based child care subsidy payments program that complies with all applicable federal funding requirements and legal authority and that seeks to provide adequate, stable payments to providers of child care services by establishing effective payment practices based upon accurate time and attendance systems. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 68 and Title 71.

996.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
996.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16; Title 18; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to community-based sentencing alternatives.
996.description: As introduced, requires the administrative director of the courts to annually prepare and distribute to the judiciary committees of the senate and the house of representatives a report detailing statistical information relative to the use of community-based sentencing alternatives to confinement when the offense is nonviolent and the defendant is the primary caregiver of a dependent child. - Amends TCA Title 16; Title 18; Title 40 and Title 41.

997.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
997.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 29 and Title 41, relative to claims for compensation by persons wrongfully imprisoned.
997.description: As introduced, authorizes a person wrongfully imprisoned and exonerated who is awarded compensation for such imprisonment by the board of claims to designate a person or entity as a designated beneficiary of the remaining portion of the compensation upon the claimant's death. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 8; Title 29 and Title 41.

998.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to federal block grant financing and other federal funds.
998.description: As enacted, requires each state agency to submit, on or before February 1 of each year, a report to members of the finance, ways and means committees summarizing amounts of federal block grants and purposes for which funds were expended, including any unexpended or returned portions. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 9, Chapter 4.

999.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
999.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the education of students in kindergarten through grade three.
999.description: As introduced, reduces from 25 to 20, and from 20 to 15, respectively, the maximum class size and the average grade level unit classroom size for grades kindergarten through three in a school in which 50 percent or more of the school's third grade students were not reading on grade level by the end of the immediately preceding school year. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1000.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1000.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to school counselors.
1000.description: As introduced, requires the BEP formula to fund full-time school counselor positions at a ratio of one per 250 students or one full-time school counselor position for each LEA, whichever is greater. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1001.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1001.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9 and Title 71, relative to temporary assistance.
1001.description: As introduced, requires the monthly allotment of temporary cash assistance awarded to each recipient in the Families First program to be increased from the 2021 level to $380 by January 1, 2022, subject to appropriation of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9 and Title 71.

1002.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1002.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to maternal mortality.
1002.description: As introduced, requires the annual report by the Tennessee maternal mortality review and prevention team be transmitted no later than December 31 each year; specifies that the speakers of the senate and house of representatives receive the report to the general assembly; adds the legislative librarian to the recipients for the report. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1003.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
1003.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 49, relative to voter registration.
1003.description: As introduced, requires county election commissions to conduct a supplemental registration at public and private high schools once each fall and spring semester; requires county election commissions to designate teachers as deputies for the purposes of in-person registration at supplemental registrations. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 49.

1005.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 10, relative to children.
1005.description: As enacted, expands the unruly act of illegal use of a communication device by a minor to include possessing or transmitting an image of sexual activity involving a minor. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 10.

1006.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 4, relative to executive orders issued by the President of the United States.
1006.description: As introduced, prescribes a process by which the joint government operations committee of the general assembly may review an executive order of the president of the United States for its constitutionality under federal law and submit its findings and recommendations to the attorney general and reporter and the governor. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 4.

1007.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1007.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 35, relative to release eligibility.
1007.description: As introduced, increases the maximum percentage of the sentence imposed by the court that can be reduced by sentence credits from 15 percent to 35 percent for certain offenses and makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 35.

1008.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1008.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 20 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 21, relative to franchise and excise taxes.
1008.description: As introduced, requires commissioner of revenue to report in writing to the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and the house of representatives the total annual amount of industrial machinery franchise and excise tax credits for fiscal years 2016-2021. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 20 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 21.

1009.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 1 and Title 56, relative to insurance for the state.
1009.description: As enacted, authorizes the board of claims to approve, and the state treasurer to establish and maintain, a captive insurance company for the state. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 1 and Title 56.

1012.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33 and Title 71, relative to services for persons with intellectual and developmental disabilities.
1012.description: As introduced, clarifies that the requirement for the department to assess the fiscal impact upon licensees of a change by the department of certain rules, regulations, policies, or guidelines also applies if affected licensees render services pursuant to agreements with TennCare or TennCare managed care organizations. - Amends TCA Title 33 and Title 71.

1013.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
1013.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 25, Part 3, relative to the sale of cigarettes.
1013.description: As introduced, prohibits a retailer, tobacco distributor, or other person from advertising, offering to sell, or selling cigarettes for less than an amount set by the department of revenue. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 25, Part 3.

1014.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to discount plans.
1014.description: As enacted, revises and enacts provisions governing discount plans including prescription drug plans. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1015.title: AN ACT, to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 3-9-103; Title 8, Chapter 25; Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37, relative to retirement.
1015.description: As enacted, increases from $40 to $50 the minimum amount that the state will match to an employee's optional retirement plan. - Amends TCA Section 3-9-103; Title 8, Chapter 25; Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37.

1016.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
1016.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5 and Title 67, relative to distribution of sales and use taxes.
1016.description: As introduced, removes obsolete language that prohibited revenue from being apportioned pursuant to an allocation made in a specific dollar amount in the general appropriations act to the county revenue partnership fund in fiscal years 2007-2008 and 2008-2009. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5 and Title 67.

1017.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to concealed handgun carry permits.
1017.description: As enacted, requires the department of safety to conduct a name-based criminal history record check every four years after a person is issued a concealed handgun carry permit; permits the department to revoke the permit if the person is ineligible to possess a firearm; implements a $50 fee for renewal of the permit. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

1018.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 19 and Title 13, Chapter 26, Part 1, relative to bond requirements for human resource agencies.
1018.description: As enacted, authorizes human resource agencies to obtain insurance in lieu of surety bonds to ensure the lawful performance by agency officials and employees of their fiduciary duties and responsibilities. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 19 and Title 13, Chapter 26, Part 1.

1019.last_action: Def. to Special Calendar to be Published with Final Calendar in Education Administration
1019.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 12, relative to voter registration.
1019.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to provide voter registration information by hand delivery, mail, or email to the LEA's students who are 18 years of age on or before a date of election. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 12.

1020.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1020.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 68, Chapter 105, relative to blasting standards.
1020.description: As introduced, permits the advisory council on the commercial explosives industry to conduct meetings by electronic means as long as the means utilized permit all members to send and receive real-time audio. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 68, Chapter 105.

1021.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 53; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to prescription drugs.
1021.description: As introduced, enacts the "Safe, Low-Cost Prescription Drugs Program Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 53; Title 68 and Title 71.

1022.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 19; Title 20; Title 22; Title 27; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to environmental courts.
1022.description: As introduced, authorizes counties that have environmental courts to approve by two-thirds vote of county legislative body the empanelment of juries for general sessions courts when sitting as an environmental court. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 19; Title 20; Title 22; Title 27; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40.

1023.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1023.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to transportation infrastructure.
1023.description: As introduced, increases, from 10 to 12, the number of days an owner of a utility facility, which is located in a state highway right-of-way, has to respond to a second relocation notice. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 65 and Title 67.

1024.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1024.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55, relative to sentencing.
1024.description: As introduced, reduces the time within which a sentencing hearing must be held from within 45 days after a finding of guilt to within 30 days after the finding of guilt. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55.

1025.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1025.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3; Title 4 and Title 8, relative to ethics.
1025.description: As introduced, requires each governing body to provide a copy of the ethical standards adopted by the governing body to each official and employee of the governing body within 10 days of the beginning of the official's or employee's service. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3; Title 4 and Title 8.

1026.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to treatment for children.
1026.description: As enacted, specifies that standard medical practice does not involve prescribing hormone treatment for gender dysphoric or gender incongruent prepubertal minors; prohibits a healthcare prescriber from prescribing a course of treatment that involves hormone treatment for gender dysphoric or gender incongruent prepubertal minors, except that a healthcare prescriber may prescribe a course of treatment that involves hormone treatments for prepubertal minors for diagnoses of growth deficiencies or other diagnoses unrelated to gender dysphoria or gender incongruency. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1027.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 39; Title 54 and Title 66, relative to the regulation of certain products by governmental entities.
1027.description: As enacted, authorizes a municipality, a county, or a county having a metropolitan form of government to prohibit the use of tobacco products or vapor products, or both, on the grounds of a public park, public playground, or public greenway as long as the public park, public playground, or public greenway is owned or controlled by the respective municipality or county. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 39; Title 54 and Title 66.

1028.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1028.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 48, relative to public meetings.
1028.description: As introduced, extends from one year to two years the amount of time for which a governing body that permits electronic communication between members over the internet must control the electronic archive. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 48.

1029.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 7, relative to the Tennessee Election Day Registration Act.
1029.description: As introduced, authorizes a qualified voter to register to vote and vote on any day of early voting and on election day for a primary, general, or runoff election in this state. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 7.

1030.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1030.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to sales and use tax exemptions.
1030.description: As introduced, exempts feminine hygiene products from sales tax on the annual sales tax holiday. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

1031.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1031.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 58, Chapter 2 and Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to property assessment.
1031.description: As introduced, requires certain information to be provided to the assessor of property; authorizes a county or municipal governing body to adopt by 2/3 vote a provision to allow proration of property taxes for tangible personal property that is destroyed, demolished, or substantially damaged as a result of a disaster. - Amends TCA Title 58, Chapter 2 and Title 67, Chapter 5.

1032.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1032.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to substance abuse.
1032.description: As introduced, requires commissioner of health to report to the speakers and the health committees the impact of recent legislation reducing the abuse of opioids in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1033.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 2-16-103, relative to congressional districts.
1033.description: As enacted, establishes the state's congressional districts. - Amends TCA Section 2-16-103.

1034.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 3-1-103, relative to state representative districts.
1034.description: As enacted, establishes state house of representatives districts. - Amends TCA Section 3-1-103.

1035.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Calendar & Rules Committee
1035.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 16, Part 1 and Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1, relative to redistricting.
1035.description: As introduced, updates references to 2020 TIGER system and geography. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 16, Part 1 and Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1.

1037.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1037.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 10 and Title 9, Chapter 4, Part 51, relative to state finances.
1037.description: As introduced, changes the date, from January 1 to January 2, by which the commissioner of education must provide to the office of legislative budget analysis the revised BEP funding formula for the ensuing fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 10 and Title 9, Chapter 4, Part 51.

1038.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 50 and Title 56, relative to employment security.
1038.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing benefits formula under the Tennessee Employment Security Law. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 50 and Title 56.

1039.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 12, relative to services provided to the state by state officials and employees.
1039.description: As enacted, prohibits members of the general assembly from bidding on, selling, or offering for sale any service to a state entity or to have a financial interest in the bidding, selling, or offering for sale of any service to a state entity; makes the prohibition applicable during the tenure of the member's office and for six months thereafter; creates certain exceptions; violation results in disqualification from holding certain offices; enacts other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 12.

1040.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1040.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 17; Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 6 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 5, relative to gaming.
1040.description: As introduced, reduces from five years to two years the amount of time that a qualified 501(c)(3) or 501(c)(19) must be continuously operating in this state to qualify for and conduct an annual nonprofit gaming event. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 17; Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 6 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 5.

1041.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to economically distressed counties.
1041.description: As enacted, revises provision governing allocation of sales and use tax revenue to certain commercial development districts in economically distressed counties by clarifying that a county bordering three such distressed counties for purposes of the allocation must have bordered at least three such counties in three fiscal years since fiscal year 2016-2017, if certain requirements met. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

1042.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1042.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 3, relative to members of the general assembly.
1042.description: As introduced, requires orientation of new members to take place within 90 days after election or appointment. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 3.

1043.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 65, Chapter 1 and Title 65, Chapter 2, relative to the Tennessee public utility commission.
1043.description: As enacted, increases membership of commission from five to seven members; revises other provisions regarding appointments and panels. - Amends TCA Title 65, Chapter 1 and Title 65, Chapter 2.

1044.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 29, Chapter 26; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health-related licensing.
1044.description: As enacted, requires licensing authority, upon learning a healthcare prescriber was indicted for or convicted of certain criminal offenses, to restrict or revoke, respectively, the prescriber’s ability to prescribe controlled substances; requires licensing authority to suspend the license of certain healthcare professionals upon finding the healthcare professional failed to comply with physician collaboration requirements; requires facility administrators to report certain information. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 29, Chapter 26; Title 63 and Title 68.

1045.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 49, relative to acquisition of goods and services by the state.
1045.description: As enacted, clarifies that the fiscal review committee must be allowed to review noncompetitive procurement agreements; requires the chief procurement officer to report procurement contracts monthly to the fiscal review committee; revises provisions governing public employees accepting employment with respondent to a solicitation or contractor in certain situations; revises other provisions related to state contracts. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 49.

1046.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 9; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55, relative to criminal justice.
1046.description: As enacted, enumerates certain sexual offenses for which there will be no release eligibility. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 9; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55.

1047.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Civil Justice Committee
1047.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 36; Title 37; Title 40; Chapter 78 of the Public Acts of 1975 and Chapter 505 of the Public Acts of 1972, relative to general sessions courts.
1047.description: As introduced, dissolves the consolidated general sessions court for White and Van Buren counties and establishes an individual general sessions court for each county. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 36; Title 37; Title 40; Chapter 78 of the Public Acts of 1975 and Chapter 505 of the Public Acts of 1972.

1048.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 10-7-503 and Section 29-20-401, relative to audits.
1048.description: As enacted, requires that insurance pool, special fund, and reserve fund created by a governmental entity and any entity administering such funds be audited annually by the comptroller of the treasury. - Amends TCA Section 10-7-503 and Section 29-20-401.

1049.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in State Government Committee
1049.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 6, relative to restrictions on lobbying.
1049.description: As introduced, prohibits governor's staff from lobbying for 12 months following departure from office or employment. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 6.

1050.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1050.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 1 and Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to property.
1050.description: As introduced, authorizes the division of property assessments to electronically submit to the state board of equalization the division's annual report that summarizes the division's work and makes recommendations to the state board of equalization that the division deems appropriate. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 1 and Title 67, Chapter 5.

1051.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, relative to legislative committees.
1051.description: As enacted, updates references to house of representative committee names.

1052.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1052.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, to revise appointing authority of governmental entities.
1052.description: As introduced, modifies the appointing authority of the governor, the speaker of the senate, and the speaker of the house of representatives to the advisory council on workers' compensation by requiring the governor's employee appointment to be from organized labor instead of at least one of the three employee appointments of the governor, the speaker of the senate, and the speaker of the house of representatives to be from organized labor.

1053.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 11, relative to the Cumberland Trail State Park.
1053.description: As enacted, renames the Cumberland Trail State Park the "Justin P. Wilson Cumberland Trail State Park." - Amends TCA Title 11.

1054.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29, Part 1, relative to state agencies.
1054.description: As enacted, prohibits state entities subject to review under the Tennessee Governmental Entity Review Law from promulgating rules or adopting policies to exempt members of such entities from rulemaking or policy requirements solely by virtue of their status as members. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29, Part 1.

1056.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1056.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 10; Title 12, Chapter 6 and Title 39, Chapter 16, relative to governmental records.
1056.description: As introduced, clarifies that government records unlawfully removed from a government records office be returned to their office of origin within two business days of the time safeguards are established to prevent further recurrence of unlawful removal. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 10; Title 12, Chapter 6 and Title 39, Chapter 16.

1058.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 33; Title 34; Title 49; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to graduate medical education.
1058.description: As introduced, requires commissioner of health to provide the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and house of representatives with brief summaries of the current graduate medical education training programs throughout the state and the allocation of federal funds used to support graduate medical education associated with the TennCare program. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 33; Title 34; Title 49; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1059.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1059.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 51 and Title 49, relative to the education lottery.
1059.description: As introduced, changes the date by which the Tennessee education lottery corporation is required to annually submit its proposed operating budget to the department of finance and administration from September 1 to the first business day of September. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 51 and Title 49.

1060.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1060.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, Chapter 5, relative to assessments.
1060.description: As introduced, reduces from 3 percent to 2 percent the assessment rate for a licensed nursing home that on July 1, 2020, operated as part of a continuing care retirement community. - Amends TCA Title 71, Chapter 5.

1062.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1062.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8, Chapter 4, Part 1; Title 16, Chapter 22; Title 16, Chapter 3; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to alternatives to incarceration.
1062.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Rebound Act" to address recidivism of probationers and parolees. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8, Chapter 4, Part 1; Title 16, Chapter 22; Title 16, Chapter 3; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

1065.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1065.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-6-209, relative to sales and use taxes.
1065.description: As introduced, exempts from sales and use tax certain tangible personal property owned by a local education agency (LEA) used by a contractor or subcontractor for maintenance or construction needs of an LEA. - Amends TCA Section 67-6-209.

1066.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 54 and Title 55, Chapter 8, relative to state highways.
1066.description: As introduced, authorizes the driver of a passenger vehicle to make a right-hand turn from the paved shoulder of a state highway onto an intersecting road, highway, or driveway under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 54 and Title 55, Chapter 8.

1067.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5, Chapter 14, relative to county purchasing.
1067.description: As introduced, increases the threshold, from under $10,000 to under $25,000, that a county operating pursuant to the general law for purchasing may make purchases and enter leases without public advertisement and competitive bidding. - Amends TCA Title 5, Chapter 14.

1068.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 41-22-116, relative to goods manufactured by inmates.
1068.description: As enacted, authorizes TRICOR to sell goods manufactured by inmates to government entities, private nonprofit corporations, and charitable organizations in this state if the TRICOR board determines the sale is in the best interests of the state and does not unfairly compete with private sector businesses. - Amends TCA Section 41-22-116.

1069.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
1069.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-4-409, relative to taxation of real property platform transactions.
1069.description: As introduced, exempts payment of the recordation tax on transfers of residential real property purchased and resold by a business entity that operates an internet website or application. - Amends TCA Section 67-4-409.

1070.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to the sales tax on food.
1070.description: As introduced, exempts the retail sale of food and food ingredients from the state sales tax for the period of May through October 2021. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

1071.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 1; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 20; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 47 and Title 49, relative to actions against the state.
1071.description: As enacted, creates a right of appeal in an action brought against this state, a department or agency of this state, or an official of this state in their official capacity that challenges the constitutionality of a state statute, whereby the state may appeal as of right from an interlocutory order of a circuit or chancery court of this state that grants, continues, or modifies an injunction or denies a motion to dissolve or modify an injunction. - Amends TCA Title 1; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 20; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 47 and Title 49.

1072.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1072.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 15 and Title 71, Chapter 6, Part 1, relative to vulnerable adults.
1072.description: As introduced, clarifies that the criminal justice committee of the house of representatives shall receive an annual report summarizing the work of the vulnerable adult protective investigative team. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 15 and Title 71, Chapter 6, Part 1.

1073.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1073.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, relative to assault of a first responder.
1073.description: As introduced, increases the penalty for assault of a first responder from a Class A misdemeanor to a Class E felony. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13.

1074.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49 and Title 68, relative to contact tracing in schools.
1074.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner of education to include a comparison of the COVID-19 contact tracing policies, if any, implemented by LEAs in K-12 public schools in the 2020-2021 school year in the commissioner's annual report. - Amends TCA Title 49 and Title 68.

1075.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 13, relative to physical therapy.
1075.description: As enacted, removes the one-year experience requirement for doctorate level physical therapists for purposes of the direct access practice exception; requires physical therapists without a doctorate to meet certain educational requirements for purposes of the direct access practice exception. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 13.

1077.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1077.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 50, relative to employment.
1077.description: As introduced, requires certain private employers to include in the final wages of an employee, who quits or is discharged, accrued, but unused, vacation pay or other compensatory time; makes void a provision in a company policy or labor agreement providing to the contrary. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 50.

1078.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1078.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 24; Title 29; Title 36; Title 39 and Title 68, Chapter 3, relative to abortion.
1078.description: As introduced, permits a person to petition a court for an injunction to prohibit a woman who is pregnant with the person's unborn child from obtaining an abortion; requires the petitioner to execute a voluntary acknowledgement of paternity that is not subject to being rescinded or challenged. - Amends TCA Title 24; Title 29; Title 36; Title 39 and Title 68, Chapter 3.

1079.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 38; Title 48; Title 49; Title 53; Title 55; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to medical professionals.
1079.description: As enacted, makes various changes to laws regulating physician assistants. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 38; Title 48; Title 49; Title 53; Title 55; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1080.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
1080.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 62, Chapter 76 and Title 63, Chapter 1, relative to occupational licensing.
1080.description: As introduced, enacts the "Licensing Independence for Future Tennesseans Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 62, Chapter 76 and Title 63, Chapter 1.

1081.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-4-102, relative to sports authority facilities.
1081.description: As enacted, designates sports facilities at private universities as sports authority facilities for purposes of consumption of alcoholic beverages on the premises. - Amends TCA Section 57-4-102.

1083.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1083.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 6, relative to criminal procedure.
1083.description: As introduced, reduces the period of time, from five years to one year from the date of issuance, in which a process, warrant, precept, or summons for a misdemeanor offense must be served, returned, or quashed before it is automatically terminated and removed from the records. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 6.

1085.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 30, relative to evidence.
1085.description: As enacted, requires a law enforcement agency that discovers potentially exculpatory evidence to report that evidence; enacts the "Post-Conviction Fingerprint Analysis Act of 2021." - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 30.

1086.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1086.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 16 and Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1, relative to redistricting.
1086.description: As introduced, requires compliance with state and federal constitutions as well as judicial decisions in passing congressional redistricting plan. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 16 and Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1.

1087.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to needle and hypodermic syringe exchange programs.
1087.description: As introduced, removes the prohibition on operating a needle and hypodermic syringe exchange program within 1,000 feet of a public park in certain counties and municipalities. - Amends TCA Title 68.

1088.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1088.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to sentencing for offenses committed by minors.
1088.description: As introduced, reduces the sentence a person who commits first degree murder as a minor is required to serve before becoming release eligible from 51 years to 30 years; applies to offenses committed on or after July 1, 2021. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

1089.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 16 and Title 29, Chapter 17, relative to eminent domain.
1089.description: As introduced, requires property taken by eminent domain to be valued at 130 percent of the fair market value; requires compensation for depreciation of property on which an easement is taken by eminent domain. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 16 and Title 29, Chapter 17.

1090.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 5, relative to the board of dentistry.
1090.description: As enacted, removes restriction on appointment to the board of dentistry for persons affiliated with educational institutions where the practice of dentistry, dental hygiene, and dental assisting is taught. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 5.

1091.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1091.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, Chapter 6 and Title 68, Chapter 102, relative to limited licensed electricians.
1091.description: As introduced, adds a deadline to the present law requirement that a person with knowledge of faulty electrical work performed by a limited licensed electrician notify the board of licensing contractors; requires the report is made within three business days from the date the person knows of the faulty electrical work. - Amends TCA Title 62, Chapter 6 and Title 68, Chapter 102.

1092.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1092.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 64 and Title 67, relative to transportation.
1092.description: As introduced, deletes an expired provision specifying which highway projects were to benefit from the 1986 gasoline tax increases. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 64 and Title 67.

1093.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
1093.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4; Title 8; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to the Tennessee fish and wildlife commission.
1093.description: As introduced, adds the senate judiciary committee and criminal justice committee of the house of representatives to the legislative committees to which the commission must report actions taken on permits, licenses, and fees to be assessed following the promulgation of the proposed rules. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4; Title 8; Title 69 and Title 70.

1094.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1094.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-9-302 and Section 55-9-308, relative to three-wheeled motorcycles.
1094.description: As introduced, exempts persons who are at least 25 years of age from helmet requirements when riding a three-wheeled motorcycle, including autocycles; clarifies helmet requirements with regard to autocycles. - Amends TCA Section 55-9-302 and Section 55-9-308.

1095.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 41, relative to school discipline.
1095.description: As enacted, confers immunity from civil liability upon a teacher, principal, school employee, or school bus driver properly using reasonable force to correct or restrain a student or prevent bodily harm or death to another person. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 41.

1096.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 19, relative to bonds.
1096.description: As enacted, authorizes counties that self-insure their liability for county officials and employees under the Tennessee Governmental Tort Liability Act to self-insure their risk of loss in lieu of obtaining bonds or insurance to cover their liability for such persons. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 19.

1097.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 2-6-601, relative to voting in nursing homes.
1097.description: As enacted, allows a person who lives in an independent living facility that is on the same property as a licensed nursing home, assisted care living facility, or home for the aged to vote by absentee ballot when the county election commission conducts an election at the licensed nursing home, assisted care living facility, or home for the aged. - Amends TCA Section 2-6-601.

1098.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1098.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 29; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 43; Title 45; Title 53; Title 63; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, Chapter 3, Part 12, relative to the Tennessee Marijuana Regulation Act.
1098.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Marijuana Regulation Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 29; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 43; Title 45; Title 53; Title 63; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, Chapter 3, Part 12.

1099.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to sexual abuse of children.
1099.description: As introduced, requires the department to work with the joint task force on children's justice, human trafficking advisory council, and council of juvenile and family court judges to identify and provide services to children who have been victims of commercial sexual exploitation and trafficking. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40.

1100.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
1100.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 9 and Title 49, relative to enhancing the high-need workforce in rural and underserved counties.
1100.description: As introduced, enacts the "Rural Renewal Award Act." - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 9 and Title 49.

1101.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 40-32-101 and Section 40-35-313, relative to expunction.
1101.description: As enacted, extends eligibility for expunction to a person convicted of Class A misdemeanor assault prior to July 1, 2000. - Amends TCA Section 40-32-101 and Section 40-35-313.

1102.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
1102.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to tutoring.
1102.description: As introduced, enacts the "Operation Comeback Act," which directs the department to develop a tutoring program to provide access to high-quality tutoring services to students enrolled in kindergarten through grade three to combat student learning loss resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1103.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1103.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3 and Title 4, Chapter 29, relative to the commission on responsible fatherhood.
1103.description: As introduced, creates the commission on responsible fatherhood. - Amends TCA Title 3 and Title 4, Chapter 29.

1104.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
1104.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 17, relative to elections for judges of courts of record.
1104.description: As introduced, requires nonpartisan elections for chancellors, circuit court judges, criminal court judges, and judges of any other state trial court of record. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 17.

1105.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1105.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to criminal offenders.
1105.description: As introduced, reduces, from 30 days to 10 days, the time within which a court that issues an order of expunction following the defendant's successful completion of a diversion program is required to submit a copy of the order to the Tennessee bureau of investigation. - Amends TCA Title 40.

1106.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1106.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 4, relative to transfer tax.
1106.description: As introduced, clarifies that a deed is treated as a quitclaim deed for transfer tax purposes if the deed only conveys the grantor's interest to the grantee, and that a deed containing language evidencing an intent to convey the property itself, warranties of title, or habendum clauses is taxed as a transfer of a freehold estate. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 4.

1107.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1107.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 9, relative to audit.
1107.description: As introduced, increases from five business days to 10 business days the time in which a contracting entity contending it is not subject to audit shall file to the comptroller a written objection to the audit. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 9.

1108.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1108.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 61 and Title 67, relative to commerce.
1108.description: As introduced, changes, from 30 days to 35 days, the time within which a check must be presented for payment or given to a depositary bank for collection before the liability of the endorser is discharged under the Uniform Commercial Code. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 61 and Title 67.

1110.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1110.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to unemployment.
1110.description: As introduced, changes from February 1 to February 15 the date by which the commissioner must submit to the governor an annual report on the department's administration of the unemployment security program and any recommendations for amendments to the program. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

1111.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12, Chapter 4 and Title 50, Chapter 3, relative to requirements placed on contractors under public contracts.
1111.description: As enacted, prohibits local governmental entities from mandating certain disclosures in contracts for improvements to real property, or in a bid, proposal, or agreement relating to an improvement of real property. - Amends TCA Title 12, Chapter 4 and Title 50, Chapter 3.

1112.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1112.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 47, Chapter 18, relative to social media websites.
1112.description: As introduced, defines "social media website" for the purposes of the Consumer Protection Act of 1977. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 47, Chapter 18.

1113.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 49 and Title 71, relative to child care services for state employees.
1113.description: As enacted, authorizes state agencies to contract with a licensed provider of child care services to offer child care services as an option for the agency's officers and employees. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 49 and Title 71.

1115.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to purchases of gun safes.
1115.description: As introduced, exempts sales of gun safes from sales and use tax. - Amends TCA Title 67.

1116.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1116.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64 and Title 67, relative to transportation.
1116.description: As introduced, increases from 60 to 90 days, the maximum timeframe in which the governing board of the regional transportation authority of Middle Tennessee may vote to adopt alternative provisions to operate as a regional transportation authority. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64 and Title 67.

1117.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1117.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 9, relative to auditing.
1117.description: As introduced, extends, from five to 10 business days, the time period in which an entity contracting with the state or a local government may file a written objection after receiving a notice of audit from the comptroller of the treasury if the contracting entity contends that it is not subject to audit. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8 and Title 9.

1118.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1118.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 10 and Title 67, relative to industrial development.
1118.description: As introduced, reduces, from 15 days to 10 business days after the event, the period in which an industrial development corporation has to file notice of default on debt obligations with the state funding board. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 10 and Title 67.

1120.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to records involving abuse of children.
1120.description: As enacted, makes it a Class A misdemeanor for a person to attempt to access or obtain confidential information from the department of children's services regarding alleged child abuse or neglect that the person knows is in violation of state or federal laws and regulations regarding confidentiality. - Amends TCA Title 37.

1121.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 16-15-209, relative to travel reimbursement for special judges.
1121.description: As enacted, allows a general sessions or juvenile court judge serving by interchange to receive reimbursement for travel expenses from the county to which the judge travels to serve; limits certain travel expenses to no more than $100 per day. - Amends TCA Section 16-15-209.

1122.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1122.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 14 and Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to district public defenders.
1122.description: As introduced, changes, from 10 days to 10 business days, the minimum amount of notice that must be provided to members of the district public defenders conference when a meeting is called by the president of the conference. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 14 and Title 9, Chapter 4.

1123.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 24, Chapter 5; Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 56, Chapter 7, relative to civil actions.
1123.description: As introduced, increases the amount of medical bills that are presumed necessary and reasonable when attached to a complaint or civil warrant from $4,000 to $25,000. - Amends TCA Title 24, Chapter 5; Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 56, Chapter 7.

1124.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3; Title 4; Title 16; Title 17; Title 27 and Title 29, relative to elections.
1124.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing qualification of additional candidates in a primary election or nonpartisan general election after the qualifying deadline due to death, withdrawal, or disqualification of a qualified candidate leaving no candidates for nomination or office. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3; Title 4; Title 16; Title 17; Title 27 and Title 29.

1126.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, Chapter 27, relative to commerce.
1126.description: As enacted, requires a homeowners’ association to provide, upon written request of a member, a record of certain information in a vote to amend a declaration that prohibits or effectively prohibits the use of residential property as a long-term rental property; creates a vested right in an owner to use single-family residential property as long-term rental property if certain conditions exist; requires business entity owners of residential property to notify a homeowners’ association of certain information. - Amends TCA Title 66, Chapter 27.

1127.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 38, Part 6, relative to the safe at home address confidentiality program.
1127.description: As enacted, revises the coverage and application process of certain co-applicants to the home address confidentiality program established by the secretary of state. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 38, Part 6.

1128.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 8, Chapter 26; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 49, relative to programs to reduce recidivism.
1128.description: As introduced, requires the department of correction to pay an additional $5.00 per day recidivism-reduction stipend for certain county jails housing convicted felons, in which the felons attend evidence-based programs to reduce recidivism rates upon release; authorizes community colleges and colleges of applied technology to assist county governments in development of such programs. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 8, Chapter 26; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 49.

1129.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4; Title 16; Title 17; Title 20; Title 27 and Title 29, relative to causes of action.
1129.description: As enacted, establishes process for three-judge panel hearing civil actions in which the complaint: challenges the constitutionality of a statute, executive order, or rule; includes a claim for declaratory judgment or injunctive relief; and is brought against the state, a state department or agency, or a state official acting in their official capacity. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4; Title 16; Title 17; Title 20; Title 27 and Title 29.

1130.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 5, relative to education.
1130.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing criminal history checks of certain persons who come in direct contact with school children or children in a child care program. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 5.

1131.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 20; Title 29; Title 33; Title 47; Title 53; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to the opioid crisis.
1131.description: As enacted, establishes the opioid abatement fund; enacts the "Opioid Abatement Council Act"; enacts the "Tennessee Opioid Abatement Act"; authorizes the attorney general and reporter to settle claims against opioid manufacturers. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 20; Title 29; Title 33; Title 47; Title 53; Title 68 and Title 71.

1132.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1132.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 20; Title 29; Title 33; Title 47; Title 53; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to civil matters of interest to the state of Tennessee.
1132.description: As introduced, requires the attorney general and reporter to submit a report quarterly to the speaker of the senate and the speaker of the house of representatives of all compromises and settlements made without the written approval of the speaker of the senate and the speaker of the house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 20; Title 29; Title 33; Title 47; Title 53; Title 68 and Title 71.

1133.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55 and Title 56, relative to motor vehicle insurance.
1133.description: As enacted, increases from $15,000 to $25,000 the minimum amount of insurance coverage for property damage in any one accident that is required for a split-limit motor vehicle insurance policy to qualify as proof of financial security under the financial responsibility law for policies issued or renewed after December 31, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 55 and Title 56.

1134.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1134.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to bail.
1134.description: As introduced, lengthens, from 180 days to 190 days, the period of time that must expire from the date a defendant's surety is served with scire facias or scire facias is returned to the clerk unserved or undelivered, before the court may enter judgment against the defendant for the amount of the bail. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1135.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
1135.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 65 and Title 69, relative to water resources.
1135.description: As introduced, requires persons who withdraw 10,000 or more gallons of water per day without registering with the commissioner of environment and conservation, in order to respond to an emergency, to report such withdrawals to the director of the water resources division within 90 days of the withdrawal. - Amends TCA Title 65 and Title 69.

1136.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 8; Title 58 and Title 68, relative to public officials.
1136.description: As enacted, prohibits the state, a political subdivision, or a public official from prohibiting or imposing additional restrictions on the lawful operations of a church or religious organization during a state of emergency, major disaster, or natural disaster; restricts a county health officer from issuing an order closing or limiting the operations of a church or religious organization for purposes of worship services. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 8; Title 58 and Title 68.

1137.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
1137.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 64, Chapter 1, Part 11, relative to the West Tennessee River Basin Authority.
1137.description: As introduced, enacts the "West Tennessee River Basin Flood Resiliency Fund Act"; authorizes county mayors to appoint a designee to serve in their place on the authority's board. - Amends TCA Title 64, Chapter 1, Part 11.

1138.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1138.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 65, Chapter 25, relative to internet services.
1138.description: As introduced, authorizes concurrent or adjacent utility cooperatives to enter into written agreements allowing construction and maintenance of infrastructure to provide services outside of a cooperative's service area; creates a waiver for persons residing in an affected service area to request cooperatives to enter into a written agreement. - Amends TCA Title 65, Chapter 25.

1139.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Chapter 222 of the Public Acts of 1983, and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to Reelfoot Lake Regional Utility and Planning District.
1139.description: As enacted, changes the compensation, from an amount not to exceed $1,000 annually to an amount not to exceed $200 monthly, for the board of directors of the Reelfoot Lake regional utility and planning district. - Amends TCA Chapter 222 of the Public Acts of 1983, and any other acts amendatory thereto.

1140.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
1140.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 70, relative to the wildlife resources agency.
1140.description: As introduced, extends the effective date for newly published regulations involving cooperative agreements between the TWRA and federal agencies, from 30 days to 45 days after the publication date by the TWRA; revises due date for the submission of financial reports by the TWRA executive director to the governor and commission members, from September 15 to September 30 of each year. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 70.

1141.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 4 and Title 55, Chapter 5, relative to issuance or use of temporary tags or permits.
1141.description: As introduced, establishes that a dealer that obtains special purpose plates for use by customers for temporary purposes is responsible for the safekeeping of each plate. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 4 and Title 55, Chapter 5.

1142.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1142.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 55, relative to driver licenses.
1142.description: As introduced, increases, from a Class A misdemeanor to a Class E felony, the penalty for a third or subsequent conviction of driving on a license that is canceled, suspended, or revoked. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 55.

1143.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7, Chapter 35; Title 65; Title 68 and Title 69, relative to water quality.
1143.description: As enacted, defines "system of incentives" to include regulatory flexibility recognizing increased environmental performance and enhanced water quality under specified permitted activities through permit conditions pursuant to duly promulgated rules. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7, Chapter 35; Title 65; Title 68 and Title 69.

1144.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 43, relative to agricultural property.
1144.description: As enacted, revises offense of critical infrastructure vandalism. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 43.

1145.last_action: Assigned to s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee
1145.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12 and Title 54, relative to sales by a local government.
1145.description: As introduced, requires a county or municipality to retain a detailed record of the sale of surplus property by public auction to a county or municipal official or employee, or former county or municipal official or employee, for at least 12 months after the sale. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12 and Title 54.

1146.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1146.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 50 and Title 68, relative to employment.
1146.description: As introduced, prohibits an employer from requiring an employee to receive an immunization or vaccination for COVID-19 against the will of the employee as a condition of maintaining employment; prohibits the employer from taking adverse action against an employee refusing such immunization or vaccination. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 50 and Title 68.

1148.last_action: Assigned to s/c Higher Education Subcommittee
1148.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, Part 7, relative to course materials.
1148.description: As introduced, requires the Tennessee higher education commission to create a model program of equitable access to course materials to provide required course materials to Tennessee Promise scholarship students at no cost; requires THEC to select a vendor for the program through an RFP. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4, Part 7.

1149.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to the Helping Heroes Act of 2008.
1149.description: As enacted, revises various provisions of the helping heroes grants. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4.

1150.title: AN ACT pursuant to Article II, Section 24, of the Tennessee Constitution providing for the dollar amount and rate by which the growth of appropriations from state tax revenues will exceed the estimated growth in the state's economy and to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 4, Part 52.
1150.description: As enacted, authorizes the index of appropriations from state tax revenues for 2021-2022 fiscal year to exceed the index of estimated growth in the state's economy by $431,600,000 or 2.37 percent. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 4, Part 52.

1151.title: AN ACT to authorize the state of Tennessee, acting by resolutions of its funding board, to issue and sell its bonds and bond anticipation notes to provide for acquisition of equipment and sites, and erection, construction, and equipment of sites and buildings, expressly including the acquisition of existing structures for expansion, improvements, betterments, and extraordinary repairs to existing structures, for construction of highways, and repair, replacement, or rehabilitation of bridges, and for grants to any county, metropolitan government, incorporated town, city, special district of the state, or any governmental agency or instrumentality of any of them; to make grants to industrial development corporations to provide for acquisition of equipment and acquisition, site preparation, erection, construction, and equipment of sites and buildings; and infrastructure improvements and development; and to provide for the expenditure of said funds; to issue its debt in excess of the authorized amount to fund discount and costs of issuance; and to provide for the expenditure of said funds. This act makes appropriations for an indefinite period of time for the purpose of allocating the proceeds of the bonds and notes authorized by this act.
1151.description: As enacted, authorizes the state to issue and sell bonds of up to $126 million.

1152.title: AN ACT to make appropriations for the purpose of defraying the expenses of the state government for the fiscal years beginning July 1, 2020, and July 1, 2021, in the administration, operation and maintenance of the legislative, executive and judicial branches of the various departments, institutions, offices and agencies of the state; for certain state aid and obligations; for capital outlay, for the service of the public debt, for emergency and contingency; to repeal certain appropriations and any acts inconsistent herewith; to provide provisional continuing appropriations; and to establish certain provisions, limitations and restrictions under which appropriations may be obligated and expended. This act makes appropriations for the purposes described above for the fiscal years beginning July 1, 2020, and July 1, 2021.
1152.description: As enacted, makes appropriations for the fiscal years beginning July 1, 2020, and July 1, 2021.

1153.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 29; Title 33; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 57; Title 58; Title 59; Title 60; Title 61; Title 62; Title 63; Title 64; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68; Title 69; Title 70 and Title 71, relative to statutory revisions required for implementation of the annual appropriations act.
1153.description: As enacted, establishes a sales tax holiday on food and food ingredients and on prepared food (excluding alcoholic beverages) from Friday, July 30, 2021, through Thursday, August 5, 2021; revises qualified work-based learning grant program provisions. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 29; Title 33; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 57; Title 58; Title 59; Title 60; Title 61; Title 62; Title 63; Title 64; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68; Title 69; Title 70 and Title 71.

1154.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 55 and Title 62, relative to catalytic converters.
1154.description: As enacted, establishes certain requirements for persons engaged in the business of buying or selling unattached catalytic converters as a single item; creates Class A, punishable by fine only, misdemeanor of possessing a used, detached catalytic converter that the person does not have authorization to possess. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 55 and Title 62.

1155.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1155.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to rare diseases afflicting children.
1155.description: As introduced, enacts the "Access to Pediatric Rare Disease Treatment Information Act"; provides for sharing of essential treatment information for children with cancer among certain healthcare institutions. - Amends TCA Title 68.

1157.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to absentee voting ballot boxes.
1157.description: As introduced, authorizes a county election commission to place absentee voting ballot boxes at locations within its jurisdiction other than at the commission's office. - Amends TCA Title 2.

1158.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1158.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to juveniles in possession of firearms.
1158.description: As introduced, requires that a juvenile court proceeding involving allegations that the juvenile was illegally in possession of a firearm be given priority in scheduling and be heard by the court as soon as is practicable. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40.

1159.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1159.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to the transfer of firearms.
1159.description: As introduced, creates the Class A misdemeanor offense of illegal transfer of a firearm to a prohibited possessor, which is committed when a person intentionally transfers a firearm to another who is known or should be known to be prohibited from purchasing or possessing a firearm by federal or state law. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.
