1160.last_action: Failed in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1160.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to firearms.
1160.description: As introduced, requires, when neither the seller nor purchaser of a firearm is a licensed gun dealer, that the transaction be completed through a licensed gun dealer, and that the dealer perform the same criminal history record check required for purchases from licensed gun dealers. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

1161.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1161.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 8 and Title 66, relative to real property.
1161.description: As introduced, authorizes an attorney licensed in this state to acknowledge the execution of an instrument affecting real property in this state. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 8 and Title 66.

1162.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 2, Part 6, relative to local health services.
1162.description: As enacted, prohibits a county board of health or county department of health from prohibiting or regulating agriculture except as otherwise authorized by law. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 2, Part 6.

1163.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16; Title 30 and Title 35, Chapter 15, relative to probate.
1163.description: As introduced, mandates an executor or administrator of an estate to send a document outlining the probate process to beneficiaries of the estate within 30 days of receipt of letters testamentary or letters of administration; requires an executor or administrator to send a disclosure to beneficiaries regarding financial obligations and real property of the estate; makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 16; Title 30 and Title 35, Chapter 15.

1164.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to African-American history.
1164.description: As introduced, creates the Tennessee African-American historical commission. - Amends TCA Title 4.

1165.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 2, Part 4 and Title 37, Chapter 5, relative to siblings in foster care.
1165.description: As enacted, requires a foster care agency to provide a child in foster care with contact information for each sibling who is also in foster care and who is not placed in the same home as the child if maintaining contact with the sibling is in the best interests of each sibling. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 2, Part 4 and Title 37, Chapter 5.

1166.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1166.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to expunction.
1166.description: As introduced, authorizes a court ordering the expunction of a person's public record following discharge to send the order to the Tennessee bureau of investigation in electronic format. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1168.last_action: Failed in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1168.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 21; Title 8, Chapter 50 and Title 49, Chapter 5, relative to leave.
1168.description: As introduced, adds paternity leave to the kind of leave a person holding a position that requires a teacher's license is entitled to under the state leave plan. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 21; Title 8, Chapter 50 and Title 49, Chapter 5.

1169.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1169.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, relative to speeding violations.
1169.description: As introduced, requires only a warning be issued for first and second violations of speeding on certain highways where the speed at the time of the violation is less than seven miles per hour over the speed limit. - Amends TCA Title 55.

1170.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to firearms.
1170.description: As enacted, enacts the "Firearms Information Privacy Protection Act." - Amends TCA Title 29; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1171.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 29, relative to time for collection of privilege tax on residential development.
1171.description: As enacted, authorizes a local governing body to pass a resolution or ordinance requiring 50 percent of the residential development tax levied under the County Powers Relief Act to be paid at the time of application for a building permit and the remaining 50 percent of the tax to be paid prior to the issuance of a certificate of occupancy. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 29.

1172.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1172.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to local education capital investment.
1172.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Local Education Capital Investment Act." - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

1173.last_action: Def. to Special Calendar to be Published with Final Calendar in Education Administration
1173.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 2; Title 49, Chapter 3 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to local education capital investment.
1173.description: As introduced, creates the Tennessee rapid growth school district fund from which capital improvement grants are to be awarded in fiscal year 2021-2022 to LEAs experiencing rapidly growing student populations. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 2; Title 49, Chapter 3 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

1175.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1175.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12 and Title 29, relative to public property.
1175.description: As introduced, requires the owner of equipment, property, or infrastructure that is located on state property to maintain and repair the equipment, property, or infrastructure and to reimburse the state for removing or moving the equipment, property, or infrastructure, or remove or move it at the owner's expense. - Amends TCA Title 12 and Title 29.

1176.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, relative to observation without consent.
1176.description: As introduced, specifies, for the offense of observation without consent, that a person has a reasonable expectation of privacy from members of the opposite sex in a single-sex multi-person use bathroom, locker room, dressing room or shower; defines a person's sex as the sex listed on the person's birth certificate and makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13.

1178.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 10, relative to political campaign committees.
1178.description: As enacted, disqualifies an officer of a multicandidate political campaign committee from running for a state or local public office if the multicandidate political campaign committee has not paid a lawfully assessed civil penalty for a violation of the financial disclosure laws or the campaign contribution laws within 30 days; revises other provisions regarding political campaign committees. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 10.

1179.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5, relative to predatory offenses.
1179.description: As enacted, adds the offense of trafficking a person for a commercial sex act to the meaning of predatory offenses for purposes of sentencing a person as a child sexual predator. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 5.

1180.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 10; Title 39; Title 62, Chapter 5 and Title 68, relative to abortion.
1180.description: As enacted, requires that disposition of remains from a surgical abortion performed at an abortion facility be by burial or cremation; requires the department of health to promulgate certain rules and forms; and makes certain other changes regarding the disposition of fetal remains. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 10; Title 39; Title 62, Chapter 5 and Title 68.

1181.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 49 and Title 68, relative to public facilities.
1181.description: As enacted, requires a public or private entity or business that operates a building or facility open to the general public to post a notice at the entrance of each public restroom of the entity's or business's policy of allowing a member of either biological sex to use any public restroom within the building or facility, if the entity or business maintains such a policy. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 49 and Title 68.

1182.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to criminal procedure.
1182.description: As enacted, clarifies that when a person is serving two or more probationary sentences and the person's probation is revoked on one sentence, then the person must receive credit for time served as a result of that revocation against any other concurrent probationary sentence that is subsequently revoked in any jurisdiction in this state. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

1183.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1183.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to property assessors.
1183.description: As introduced, revises authorization and references to district assessors to only allow assessments made by county assessor from old county when new county is created for purposes of determining outstanding indebtedness at time of formation of new county. - Amends TCA Title 67.

1184.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1184.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 26 and Title 30, relative to property tax exemptions.
1184.description: As introduced, increases the values of homestead exemptions in various provisions. - Amends TCA Title 26 and Title 30.

1185.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 35, relative to trusts.
1185.description: As enacted, makes various changes to laws regarding trusts. - Amends TCA Title 35.

1186.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal procedure.
1186.description: As enacted, authorizes law enforcement officers, district attorneys general, and the attorney general to seek criminal process for the production of wire and electronic communications and transactional records pertaining to the communications; sets guidelines for the service of and compliance with the criminal process. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1187.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 11, relative to conditions of bond.
1187.description: As enacted, requires a court, in setting bail for a defendant charged with driving under the influence of an intoxicant or another offense in which alcohol was involved, to require the person to operate only a motor vehicle equipped with a functioning ignition interlock device unless such an order would not be in the best interest of justice. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 11.

1188.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1188.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, Chapter 1, relative to real property.
1188.description: As introduced, abolishes various estates and reversion interests in land. - Amends TCA Title 66, Chapter 1.

1189.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 35 and Title 66, relative to real property.
1189.description: As enacted, allows real property conveyances to a trust to vest title in the trustee of the trust; requires that public records referencing a trust be indexed by the name of the trust, if stated in the document, and in the name of each trustee listed in the document. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 35 and Title 66.

1191.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
1191.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, Chapter 3 and Title 13, Chapter 4, relative to subdivision regulations.
1191.description: As introduced, requires regional and municipal planning commissions to make available for public inspection a copy of the subdivision regulations during regular business hours at the planning commission office; requires that the subdivision regulations be posted on the municipality's or planning commission's website, if the municipality or the planning commission maintains a website. - Amends TCA Title 13, Chapter 3 and Title 13, Chapter 4.

1192.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 10, relative to the registry of election finance.
1192.description: As enacted, authorizes the registry of election finance to retain counsel to pursue the collection of unpaid civil penalties assessed by the registry, in lieu of petitioning the attorney general and reporter; states that venue for such suits is the residence of the defendant. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 10.

1193.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1193.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 37, relative to standards of review.
1193.description: As introduced, changes the standard of review for appeals of a magistrate's decision to the juvenile court judge from de novo to abuse of discretion. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 37.

1194.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health care.
1194.description: As enacted, requires a health insurance entity, a health services provider, or a healthcare facility to notify a patient of communication among the entity, a health services provider, and a healthcare facility concerning the patient's medical claim; requires a utilization review agent to notify the provider or healthcare facility, as well as the enrollee, when additional information is needed for a prior authorization request. - Amends TCA Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68.

1195.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1195.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 10; Title 13; Title 20; Title 27 and Title 57, relative to venue for certain actions against the state.
1195.description: As introduced, sets venue for actions challenging the constitutionality of a state statute, executive order, or administrative rule or regulation in the county where the plaintiff resides or, if the plaintiff is not a resident of Tennessee, in Sumner County. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 10; Title 13; Title 20; Title 27 and Title 57.

1196.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4; Title 9; Title 12; Title 20; Title 29; Title 39; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 58; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to corporations.
1196.description: As introduced, requires certain for-profit corporations to report their contributions and donations to state and local governmental entities and election officials for purposes of facilitating and conducting elections in this state if such contributions and donations exceed a certain amount. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4; Title 9; Title 12; Title 20; Title 29; Title 39; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 58; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68.

1198.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 28 and Title 29, Chapter 34, relative to asbestos-related liability.
1198.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing information to be filed by a plaintiff in an asbestos action; requires dismissal without prejudice of plaintiff's asbestos claim as to any defendant whose product or premises is not identified in the required information form; requires that plaintiff's asbestos claim be dismissed without prejudice if plaintiff fails to provide the required information. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 28 and Title 29, Chapter 34.

1199.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-4-115; Title 16 and Title 18, Chapter 1, relative to data reported to the administrative office of the courts.
1199.description: As enacted, requires the AOC to provide each court clerk in a county that has not installed TnCIS with a list of the data that is required under Rules of the Supreme Court of Tennessee or state law; requires the AOC and court to coordinate efforts to ensure that the court clerks submit the required data by January 1, 2022, and in an ongoing manner thereafter, pursuant to procedures established by the AOC. - Amends TCA Section 8-4-115; Title 16 and Title 18, Chapter 1.

1200.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 10, Part 1; Title 2, Chapter 10, Part 2; Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 6, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 6, Part 2; Title 4, Chapter 55 and Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 5, relative to government reform.
1200.description: As enacted, revises various provisions relative to ethics and campaign finance laws. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 10, Part 1; Title 2, Chapter 10, Part 2; Title 3, Chapter 1, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 6, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 6, Part 2; Title 4, Chapter 55 and Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 5.

1203.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to sales and use taxes.
1203.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing special sales and use tax allocation in regard to minor league baseball stadium. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6.

1204.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1204.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 25, relative to deferred or tax-sheltered compensation programs for public employees.
1204.description: As introduced, replaces the name of the "consolidated retirement board" with "board of trustees of the consolidated retirement system," for purposes of the Tennessee consolidated retirement system. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 25.

1207.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1207.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 56, Chapter 7; Title 68, Chapter 11 and Title 71, Chapter 5, relative to certificates of need.
1207.description: As introduced, increases from 15 to 20 the number of days before a health services and development agency meeting at which a certificate of need application is originally scheduled that a health care institution wishing to oppose the application must file a written objection with the agency and serve a copy on the contact person for the applicant. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 56, Chapter 7; Title 68, Chapter 11 and Title 71, Chapter 5.

1208.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 54, Chapter 1, Part 4; Title 55, Chapter 10; Section 57-5-201; Section 67-4-402 and Title 68, Chapter 211, relative to litter prevention and control.
1208.description: As introduced, adds a reference to the statute listing the type of information that must be contained in litter reports submitted by citizens. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 54, Chapter 1, Part 4; Title 55, Chapter 10; Section 57-5-201; Section 67-4-402 and Title 68, Chapter 211.

1210.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14, relative to criminal offenses.
1210.description: As enacted, establishes the criminal offense of mail theft; specifies that the second or subsequent conviction of mail theft is at least a Class E felony; defines mail to include items such as letters, postal cards, and packages. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14.

1211.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Insurance Subcommittee
1211.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 55 and Title 56, relative to motor vehicle insurance.
1211.description: As introduced, requires the department of revenue to establish an uninsured vehicle diversion program; allows the department of revenue to utilize vehicle recognition systems to identify violations of the Financial Responsibility Law and assess fees for participation in the diversion program. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 55 and Title 56.

1212.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40 and Title 55, relative to driver licenses.
1212.description: As introduced, prohibits the suspension of a person’s driver license as a result of the person's failure to timely pay litigation taxes, court costs, and fines assessed as a result of disposition of any criminal offense. - Amends TCA Title 40 and Title 55.

1214.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Health Committee
1214.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 50, relative to immunizations.
1214.description: As introduced, removes obsolete reference to a non-existent public health council; requires approval of a majority of the health and welfare committee of the senate, the health committee of the house of representatives, and the general assembly by joint resolution before the commissioner may designate diseases against which immunization is required for a child to attend any school or child care facility of this state on or after July 1, 2021. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 50.

1217.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 67, relative to tax relief for new markets tax credit recipients.
1217.description: As introduced, enacts the "New Markets Development Act." - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 67.

1218.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 24; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the Stop Guilt by Accusation Act.
1218.description: As introduced, enacts the "Stop Guilt by Accusation Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 24; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40.

1219.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1219.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 9 and Title 67, relative to state finances.
1219.description: As introduced, authorizes the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and the house of representatives to electronically transmit the written report that must be submitted to the speakers of the house of representatives and the senate, and to the commissioner of finance and administration and the comptroller of the treasury, regarding the extent of allocations from the increases in the funds required to provide the state's share of the funding of any municipality expenditure increase or county government expenditure increase. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 9 and Title 67.

1221.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 41-4-144, relative to jailer qualifications.
1221.description: As enacted, establishes that a contracted licensed healthcare provider who certifies that a person is free from an impairment to authorize the person to work in a jail is not an agent of the municipality, county, or political subdivision; establishes that a municipality, county, or political subdivision's good faith reliance of the jailer qualification requirements does not give rise to a cause of action. - Amends TCA Section 41-4-144.

1222.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
1222.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 82, relative to boards of commissioners for utility districts.
1222.description: As introduced, increases the membership of the board of commissioners for the Powell-Clinch River Utility District from three to five members. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 82.

1223.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, relative to a tax upon the privilege of occupancy.
1223.description: As introduced, exempts Sullivan and Washington counties from the prohibition on a county levying a hotel/motel tax in a municipality that has an existing hotel/motel tax. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4.

1224.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1224.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 3, relative to education funding.
1224.description: As introduced, changes, from 10 days to 10 business days, the period of time after an LEA receives the audit report of the LEA's school funds that the LEA is required to deliver a copy of the report to the commissioner of education. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 3.

1225.last_action: Failed for lack of second in: Corrections Subcommittee
1225.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to corrections.
1225.description: As introduced, makes eligible for parole an inmate who is 60 years of age or older or is terminally ill; requires the Tennessee corrections institute to provide members of the general assembly the results of inspections of local jails, lock-ups, workhouses, and detention facilities within five days of the completion of inspection results. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 40 and Title 41.

1226.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1226.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to the Tennessee historical commission.
1226.description: As introduced, vacates and reconstitutes the commission. - Amends TCA Title 4.

1227.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in K-12 Subcommittee
1227.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to reestablishment of the office of elected school superintendent.
1227.description: As introduced, allows county or city school districts to reestablish the office of elected school superintendent and outlines the qualifications of an elected superintendent. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1228.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 4, relative to executive orders issued by the president of the United States.
1228.description: As introduced, authorizes the joint government operations committee of the general assembly to review an executive order of the president of the United States for its constitutionality under federal law and to recommend to the attorney general and reporter and the governor that the executive order be further reexamined. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 4.

1229.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 70-2-104, relative to licenses.
1229.description: As enacted, expands eligibility for permanent sport combination hunting and fishing licenses to include residents of this state who have suffered an amputation of 75 percent or more of a lower limb. - Amends TCA Section 70-2-104.

1230.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 39, relative to juveniles.
1230.description: As enacted, requires secure detention facilities, correctional facilities, youth development centers, and other hardware secure facilities that contract with the department, that are housing juveniles to immediately report any security breach to the department and local law enforcement; requires the department to include information on escapes, attempted escapes, security breaches, or attempted security breaches in the previous calendar year in the department's annual report. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 39.

1231.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 40, relative to aggravated rape of a child.
1231.description: As introduced, prohibits a court from accepting a plea of guilty or no contest to any other offense in exchange for a dismissal of the charge of aggravated rape of a child if the charge against the defendant is supported by eyewitness testimony or DNA evidence. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 40.

1232.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the Tennessee Accommodations for All Children Act.
1232.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Accommodations for All Children Act." - Amends TCA Title 49.

1233.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1233.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 13; Title 64 and Title 67, relative to manufacturers of ammunition components.
1233.description: As introduced, requires TACIR to perform a study and make recommendations to the general assembly regarding incentives to encourage and facilitate the relocation of manufacturers of ammunition components to this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 13; Title 64 and Title 67.

1234.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1234.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 8; Title 58 and Title 68, relative to emergencies.
1234.description: As introduced, reduces from 60 to 45 days the period for which the governor may declare a state of emergency. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 8; Title 58 and Title 68.

1235.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to nursing homes.
1235.description: As introduced, enacts the "Nursing Home Resident Safety and Monitoring Act"; requires nursing homes to equip a resident's room with a monitoring device at the request of the resident or the resident's legal representative. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1236.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the course access program.
1236.description: As introduced, specifies that the information the department of education must make publicly available concerning the course access program must be available by July 1 following the immediately preceding school year. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1238.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to fingerprint identification of voters.
1238.description: As introduced, authorizes the state election commission and each county election commission to utilize technology to identify the fingerprints of voters for purposes of conducting elections in this state in collaboration with state agencies that maintain a database of fingerprints in this state; requires state agencies with fingerprint databases to collaborate with secretary of state to implement this bill. - Amends TCA Title 2.

1239.last_action: Failed in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1239.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to costs assessed to practice as a healthcare professional.
1239.description: As introduced, waives licensure fees for healthcare professionals for the period beginning July 1, 2021, through June 30, 2025; requires licensing authorities to refund the portion of any licensure fee paid to the authority that is credited to a healthcare provider for that period of time. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 63; Title 67 and Title 68.

1240.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1240.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17, relative to judges and chancellors.
1240.description: As introduced, exempts judges and chancellors who are prohibited from practicing law from the professional privilege tax assessed to persons licensed as attorneys. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17.

1241.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
1241.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to student athletes.
1241.description: As introduced, prohibits a four-year public college or university from preventing a student athlete from earning compensation as a result of the use of the student athlete's name, image, or likeness; prohibits a four-year public college or university from discriminating against a student athlete based on an athletic coach's donation to the college or university. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1242.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1242.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 29; Title 33; Title 35; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 42; Title 45; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 56; Title 57; Title 62; Title 63; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to civil rights.
1242.description: As introduced, increases from two years to three years the term of the chair of the human rights commission. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 16; Title 29; Title 33; Title 35; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 42; Title 45; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 56; Title 57; Title 62; Title 63; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

1243.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1243.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12, Chapter 4, relative to public contracts.
1243.description: As introduced, requires a person or entity bidding on a state or local public construction contract to hold the appropriate Tennessee contractor's license prior to bidding on the project; deletes certain prohibitions regarding state residency and income for purposes of bidding on public works projects. - Amends TCA Title 12, Chapter 4.

1245.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 7, relative to the Students' Right to Know Act.
1245.description: As enacted, enacts the "Students Right to Know Act." - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 7.

1246.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1246.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 21 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the review of governmental entities by the department of audit.
1246.description: As introduced, requires the department of audit to obtain a comprehensive analysis, created by the Tennessee Human Rights Commission, of the extent to which an entity is in compliance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act and include a summary of the analysis as part of the department's performance review of a state entity. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 21 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

1247.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1247.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 39-14-105, relative to theft.
1247.description: As introduced, classifies the theft of a firearm from a law enforcement vehicle as a Class D felony, regardless of the value of the firearm. - Amends TCA Section 39-14-105.

1248.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1248.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 67, Chapter 6, relative to allocation of sales and use tax revenue.
1248.description: As introduced, allocates a portion of state sales and use tax revenues to an eligible county or a municipality within the eligible county that is economically distressed for the purpose of funding certain capital outlay or other eligible projects; establishes requirements for such allocation. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 67, Chapter 6.

1249.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1249.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 17; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 5 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 6, relative to charitable gaming.
1249.description: As introduced, requires an applicant to conduct an annual charitable gaming event to include in its application to the secretary of state the starting and ending time of the event. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 17; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 5 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 6.

1250.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1250.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 2-6-202, relative to the election process.
1250.description: As introduced, prohibits a county election commission from transmitting an application to vote absentee to a voter unless the voter makes a request for the ballot in writing. - Amends TCA Section 2-6-202.

1251.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20 and Title 29, relative to torts.
1251.description: As enacted, states that there is no cause of action for wrongful birth based on a claim that a person would not or should not have been born or for wrongful life based on a claim that a person would or should have been aborted. - Amends TCA Title 20 and Title 29.

1252.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1252.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 47 and Title 48, relative to social media.
1252.description: As introduced, prohibits an entity of state government from using a social media platform that censors the free speech of a person or group of persons based on political ideology, viewpoint discrimination, or personal animus. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 47 and Title 48.

1254.last_action: Failed for lack of motion in: Civil Justice Subcommittee
1254.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 29 and Title 39, relative to Bill of Rights sanctuary states.
1254.description: As introduced, establishes Tennessee as a "bill of rights sanctuary state." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 29 and Title 39.

1255.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 67, relative to state finances.
1255.description: As introduced, requires state funding board to conduct a study on the impact and effects of the rapid devaluation of the United States dollar on the state's economy; requires the board to prepare a report of its findings and recommendations resulting from the study and submit it to the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and house of representatives on or before January 1, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 67.

1256.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1256.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, relative to insurance coverage.
1256.description: As introduced, extends, from 60 days to 70 days, the time a governmental entity, employee, or the governmental entity's insurance carrier has to answer or otherwise respond to a claim, action, or suit brought under the Tennessee Governmental Tort Liability Act. - Amends TCA Title 29.

1257.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Insurance Subcommittee
1257.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to the all payer claims database.
1257.description: As introduced, adds reporting on the cost, utilization, and effectiveness of the all payer claims database to the general assembly annually on February 15 to the commissioner of finance and administration's duties related to the database. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 56; Title 68 and Title 71.

1258.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1258.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 49 and Title 71, relative to child care.
1258.description: As introduced, reduces, from 30 days to 25 days, the grace period in which a child care program must submit its annual report after receiving notice of its failure to do so. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 49 and Title 71.

1259.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1259.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to adverse childhood experiences.
1259.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to notify the department of education if the LEA develops its own adverse childhood experiences training program. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1262.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1262.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13, Chapter 16; Title 49, Chapter 3; Title 64, Chapter 6; Title 65, Chapter 5; Title 67 and Title 71, relative to public finances.
1262.description: As introduced, requires department of economic and community development to submit the report on grants distributed under the broadband accessibility grant program to the chairs of the finance, ways and means committees. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13, Chapter 16; Title 49, Chapter 3; Title 64, Chapter 6; Title 65, Chapter 5; Title 67 and Title 71.

1263.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1263.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 4, relative to sports authority facilities.
1263.description: As introduced, designates a CHI Memorial Stadium in East Ridge as a sports authority facility for purposes of consumption of alcoholic beverages on the premises of the facility. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 4.

1266.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 14; Title 38; Title 39; Title 47; Title 49 and Title 67, relative to the duties of the sports wagering advisory council.
1266.description: As enacted, transfers all powers and duties regarding the Tennessee Sports Gaming Act to the sports wagering advisory council. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 14; Title 38; Title 39; Title 47; Title 49 and Title 67.

1267.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 39, relative to the department of children's services.
1267.description: As enacted, requires the department to notify the appropriate court when the department has knowledge that a foster parent from a kinship placement violated a court order by allowing a child to visit the child's parent within 96 hours of the department's knowledge of the information. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 39.

1268.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1268.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 66 and Title 68, relative to discrimination.
1268.description: As introduced, creates a civil cause of action for discrimination based on COVID-19 vaccine status. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 66 and Title 68.

1269.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1269.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 42 and Title 64, relative to regional authorities.
1269.description: As introduced, requires the annual report of the Greater Nashville regional council to be submitted on or before February 1 each year. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 42 and Title 64.

1270.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 49, Chapter 10, Part 14 and Title 67, relative to taxation of individualized education accounts.
1270.description: As enacted, exempts from state and local taxation, all contributions or distributions made to, or on behalf of, participating students pursuant to any individualized education account (IEA). - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 49, Chapter 10, Part 14 and Title 67.

1271.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1271.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 41; Title 49; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to congregate care settings.
1271.description: As introduced, changes from the tenth to the fifteenth of each month that is not the first month of a calendar quarter the date by which a county maintaining a subsidized receiving home must submit to the department an itemized statement of the costs of subsidizing each licensed receiving home, and of the boarding care and special needs provided each child placed in the home. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 41; Title 49; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1272.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1272.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to preventing the theft of firearms.
1272.description: As introduced, creates a Class A misdemeanor of leaving a firearm unattended in a motor vehicle or boat, if the firearm is not locked within a trunk, glove box, or interior of the person's motor vehicle or boat or within a container securely affixed to the motor vehicle or boat. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

1273.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to work share programs.
1273.description: As enacted, establishes a voluntary shared work unemployment benefits program that allows certain employers to submit to the department of labor and workforce development for approval a plan to reduce employee work hours in exchange for employee access to a certain level of unemployment compensation benefits. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

1274.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 13, relative to medical occupations.
1274.description: As enacted, makes certain changes to the practice of occupational therapy, including authorizing the practice of dry needling of the upper limb, authorizing the making of certain treatment diagnoses, and authorizing practice via telehealth; authorizes the practice of physical therapy via telehealth. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 13.

1275.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 16 and Title 17, relative to the "Tennessee Election Integrity Act".
1275.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Election Integrity Act," which requires that absentee ballots, other than ballots authorized by state or federal law to be delivered electronically to qualified voters who are entitled to vote by absentee ballot, include a watermark approved by the coordinator of elections; requires a counting board official to verify that the absentee ballots contain the watermark and reject any ballot that does not bear the watermark. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 16 and Title 17.

1276.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 8, relative to removal of public officers.
1276.description: As introduced, increases from 20 to 30 days the period by which, after being served, a defendant in an ouster proceeding may answer a complaint to remove the defendant from public office. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 8.

1277.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 39, relative to smoking.
1277.description: As introduced, authorizes counties with a population greater than 180,000, and the cities within such counties, to regulate smoking and the use of vapor products; prohibits the use of vapor products in certain places. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 39.

1279.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1279.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 5; Title 7; Title 16 and Title 17, relative to nonpartisan elections.
1279.description: As introduced, requires that elections in Shelby and Davidson counties for judicial offices and offices elected in countywide elections and for the legislative bodies be nonpartisan. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 5; Title 7; Title 16 and Title 17.

1280.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 12, relative to public officials.
1280.description: As introduced, prohibits a public facility from being named for a public official who is in office, for two years after the public official leaves office, or if the public official has been convicted of a felony or a crime of moral turpitude; prohibits a public official from making charitable donations in the public official's name if the donation is from public funds. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 12.

1281.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1281.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 51, relative to leave policies.
1281.description: As introduced, deletes prohibition on local governments mandating that employers who do business with the local government or within its jurisdictional boundaries maintain certain sick and family leave policies. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 51.

1282.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1282.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 7, relative to evidence of identification for voting.
1282.description: As introduced, permits the use of a photo identification card issued by this state, the United States, or an accredited postsecondary institution of education in this state for purposes of verifying the identity of an eligible voter. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 7.

1283.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 5, relative to dentistry.
1283.description: As enacted, revises present law provisions regarding the examination to become licensed as a dentist. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 5.

1285.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 57; Title 5, Chapter 9 and Title 43, Chapter 21, relative to the Tennessee State Fair.
1285.description: As enacted, adds Wilson County Promotions, Inc., a not-for-profit corporation, to the entities with which the Tennessee state fair and exposition commission may work to conduct a fair or exposition; provides for the Tennessee state fair being held at the Wilson County fairgrounds. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 57; Title 5, Chapter 9 and Title 43, Chapter 21.

1286.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1286.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, relative to reserved parking for expectant mothers and parents with infants.
1286.description: As introduced, authorizes businesses to provide for specially marked parking spaces for pregnant women and persons with infants; creates civil penalty if an unauthorized person parks in such spaces. - Amends TCA Title 55.

1288.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
1288.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to teacher pay.
1288.description: As introduced, provides all school-based employees of an LEA during the 2020-2021 school year with a one-time hazard pay bonus of $1,000 for full-time employees and $500 for part-time employees. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1289.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1289.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to officer misconduct.
1289.description: As introduced, changes from February 1 to March 1 the date by which the community oversight board must present a report to the chairs of certain committees of the senate and the house of representatives detailing certain actions of the board for the previous calendar year. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1291.last_action: Failed in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1291.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 39, relative to emergency protection orders.
1291.description: As introduced, allows a court to issue an emergency protection order upon a finding that a person poses an imminent risk of harm to the person or others if allowed to purchase or possess a firearm; authorizes a family member, household member, intimate partner, or law enforcement officer to petition for such an order. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 39.

1292.last_action: Failed in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
1292.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 3 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to class size.
1292.description: As introduced, prohibits a school that is designated by the department as a priority or focus school from exceeding a class size ratio of one teacher per 15 students in kindergarten through second grade. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 3 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

1293.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Education Administration
1293.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 5, relative to teacher licensure.
1293.description: As introduced, requires the state board to renew the license of a teacher, principal, or supervisor whose license has expired, but who possesses an active license in another state with which the state board has a reciprocity agreement, without requiring the teacher, principal, or supervisor to take an assessment. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 5.

1294.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 21; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 50, relative to insurance benefits.
1294.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Family Insurance Act." - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 21; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 50.

1295.last_action: Failed in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1295.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8 and Title 49, Chapter 5, Part 7, relative to family leave for public employees.
1295.description: As introduced, provides paid family and medical leave for state employees and teachers. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 50, Part 8 and Title 49, Chapter 5, Part 7.

1296.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1296.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6, Chapter 54, Part 1, relative to municipal powers.
1296.description: As introduced, authorizes municipalities to create a fund that provides grants for the study of juveniles involved in prostitution and homicides committed by juveniles; requires such study to be conducted at the direction of the chief executive of a municipality. - Amends TCA Title 6, Chapter 54, Part 1.

1297.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 47, Chapter 18, relative to consumer protection.
1297.description: As enacted, clarifies that wireless communication includes text messages sent and received on smart devices for purposes of the Anti-Phishing Act. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 47, Chapter 18.

1298.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 2, relative to a tax upon incomes derived from stocks and bonds that are not taxed ad valorem.
1298.description: As introduced, authorizes municipalities to levy and collect an annual income tax on incomes derived by way of dividends from stocks or by way of interest on bonds. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 2.

1300.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 41; Title 49; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to children.
1300.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing the surrender of newborn infant. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 41; Title 49; Title 68 and Title 71.

1301.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to statutes of limitation for human trafficking.
1301.description: As enacted, removes the statute of limitation for prosecution of trafficking for commercial sex act when committed against a child on or after July 1, 2021. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1304.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 2 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to open enrollment.
1304.description: As enacted, requires each LEA to have an open enrollment period in which a parent or guardian of a student may seek to transfer the parent's or guardian's student to a school in the LEA that the student is not zoned to attend. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1; Title 49, Chapter 2 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

1305.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1305.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55, relative to the Racial Profiling Prevention Training Act.
1305.description: As introduced, enacts the "Racial Profiling Prevention Training Act," which prohibits a law enforcement officer from using a person's race or ethnicity to form probable cause or reasonable suspicion to stop a vehicle and requires state and local law enforcement agencies to adopt a policy and implement an annual training program regarding racial profiling. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55.

1306.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1306.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 41, relative to the curriculum taught in facilities for juveniles.
1306.description: As introduced, requires youth development centers and detention centers to teach certain life skills to children held in these facilities. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 41.

1308.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 58 and Title 68, relative to emergencies.
1308.description: As introduced, authorizes the mayor to designate a person to attend meetings of the county board of health on the mayor's behalf. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 58 and Title 68.

1311.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to photographs of minors.
1311.description: As enacted, specifies that photographic evidence of a fatal motor vehicle accident depicting a deceased minor victim at the scene of the accident is confidential and not open for inspection by members of the public; provides that custodial parent or legal guardian of such deceased minor victim may waive confidentiality and allow the minor victim's photograph to be used and obtained in the same manner as other public records. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1312.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1312.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 39-17-1302, relative to weapons.
1312.description: As introduced, identifies a blackjack and stun baton as examples of prohibited weapons for purposes of offense of possessing implements for the infliction of serious bodily injury or death. - Amends TCA Section 39-17-1302.

1313.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1313.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to vehicular offenses.
1313.description: As introduced, changes the date by which the department of safety must submit its annual report regarding offenders who have had ignition interlock devices installed on their motor vehicles from February 1 to February 15; clarifies the report shall be sent to the criminal justice committee in the house of representatives instead of the judiciary committee. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1314.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4, Chapter 10; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9, Chapter 21 and Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to property tax increases.
1314.description: As introduced, directs TACIR to conduct a study regarding the use of a voter referendum to approve significant tax increases on real property. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4, Chapter 10; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9, Chapter 21 and Title 67, Chapter 5.

1315.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1315.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to use of force by law enforcement.
1315.description: As introduced, requires law enforcement agencies to report findings of excessive use of force by a law enforcement officer to the district attorney general, to be reviewed for possible criminal prosecution; requires the district attorney general to review 10 percent of all allegations of excessive force in each previous calendar year. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1316.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1316.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 28 and Title 9, Chapter 23, relative to financing.
1316.description: As introduced, requires the department of economic and community development to make quarterly reports instead of annual reports regarding TNInvestcos; requires the report to be submitted to all members of the general assembly rather than only the chairs of the finance committees; requires the comptroller of the treasury to develop a numerical grading system for all tax increment financing (TIF) plans; requires the comptroller to evaluate TIF plans based on the benefits the municipality is receiving from the plan and the cost of the active plan to the taxpayers in the jurisdiction. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 28 and Title 9, Chapter 23.

1317.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1317.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 38 and Title 40, Chapter 6, relative to warrants.
1317.description: As introduced, requires a complainant seeking a no-knock entry provision in a search warrant or an arrest warrant to have the facts supporting the warrant reviewed by the district attorney general prior to presenting any facts to a magistrate. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 38 and Title 40, Chapter 6.

1318.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 32 and Title 40, Chapter 35, Part 3, relative to expunction.
1318.description: As enacted, requires a judge to notify, if practicable, a defendant at the time of sentencing if the conviction is for an expungeable offense and the time period after which a petition to expunge may be filed; requires the administrative office of the courts to provide judges handling criminal matters with reference document containing certain information. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 32 and Title 40, Chapter 35, Part 3.

1319.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal gangs.
1319.description: As introduced, creates an offense of using force or coercion to cause a person to join a criminal gang against the person's will; sets penalty based on the age of the victim; classifies new offense as a criminal gang offense. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1320.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1320.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 40, Chapter 35, relative to reckless endangerment.
1320.description: As introduced, creates a Class C felony of reckless endangerment; authorizes courts to revoke or prohibit the issuance of a driver license to individuals convicted of such offenses. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13 and Title 40, Chapter 35.

1321.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, relative to police canine units.
1321.description: As introduced, requires law enforcement agencies to annually report statistics and policies regarding police canine units to the POST commission; requires the POST commission to develop and implement state guidelines for the training, care, and use of police canine units for law enforcement purposes. - Amends TCA Title 38.

1322.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 4, relative to criminal procedure.
1322.description: As introduced, requires an officer to provide an alleged victim of certain criminal offenses with a document, created by the administrative office of the courts, notifying the victim of the global positioning monitoring system used as a condition of bail. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 4.

1323.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to evidence of identification for voting.
1323.description: As introduced, authorizes the use of an identification card issued by an accredited institution of higher education in this state for purposes of voter identification at a polling place; requires the secretary of state to conduct studies on such use and file reports regarding such use. - Amends TCA Title 2.

1324.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to driver education in Title I schools.
1324.description: As enacted, requires the office of research and education accountability, in collaboration with TSAC and the departments of education, labor and workforce development, and human services to study providing driver education in Title I public high schools at low or no cost to students, sources of funding for the driver education, and benefits to students of the driver education. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1325.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, relative to real property.
1325.description: As introduced, requires the recordation of land sale contracts with the county register. - Amends TCA Title 66.

1326.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 68, Chapter 2, Part 6, relative to public health emergencies.
1326.description: As introduced, specifies that the county mayor, in unincorporated areas, and the city mayor, in the incorporated areas, have the authority to establish and implement health policies that affect the county or city, as applicable, during a health emergency; directs the county health director, health officer, and board of health to provide advice to the county mayor and city mayor to develop the policies. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 68, Chapter 2, Part 6.

1327.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 65, relative to utilities.
1327.description: As introduced, prohibits a utility that furnishes electricity, gas, or water, or converts solid waste into heat, fuel, or energy, from cutting off an existing service to an address in order to start a new service to the same address until the utility contacts the registered customer with the existing service and confirms the utility has the correct address and other necessary information. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 65.

1328.last_action: Action Def. in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee to TACIR
1328.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45 and Title 47, Chapter 18, relative to financial institutions.
1328.description: As introduced, prohibits a licensee engaged in the business of deferred presentment services from contracting for or receiving a fee or charge exceeding a 36 percent annual percentage rate on the unpaid balance of the amount financed. - Amends TCA Title 45 and Title 47, Chapter 18.

1329.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1329.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 38; Title 49; Title 50; Title 63; Title 65, Chapter 15 and Title 71, relative to drug testing.
1329.description: As introduced, prevents employers from taking adverse action against certain job applicants and employees with regard to drug tests indicating the use of marijuana. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 38; Title 49; Title 50; Title 63; Title 65, Chapter 15 and Title 71.

1332.last_action: Assigned to s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee
1332.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-13-113, relative to charter school enrollment.
1332.description: As introduced, authorizes a public charter school to give an enrollment preference to "at-risk" students when an enrollment lottery is conducted; establishes the order in which an enrollment preference for "at-risk" students, if offered by the public charter school, must be provided for purposes of an enrollment lottery. - Amends TCA Section 49-13-113.

1333.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 30; Title 37; Title 39; Title 40; Title 49 and Section 71-1-135, relative to human trafficking.
1333.description: As enacted, requires the human trafficking advisory council to develop a poster design that brings awareness to human trafficking and provide the completed poster design to the department of tourism for placement of the posters in each of Tennessee's welcome centers for the public to view. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 30; Title 37; Title 39; Title 40; Title 49 and Section 71-1-135.

1335.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to services offered through online marketplace providers.
1335.description: As enacted, prohibits counties, including counties with a metropolitan form of government, and municipalities from regulating the operation of an online marketplace or requiring an online marketplace to provide personally identifiable information of users without an administrative subpoena or court order. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68.

1336.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1336.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13 and Title 49, relative to education.
1336.description: As introduced, changes the date by which the department of education must submit the annual report on virtual education programs from July 1 to July 10. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 13 and Title 49.

1337.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 49, relative to burglary.
1337.description: As enacted, states that aggravated burglary and especially aggravated burglary are crimes committed against the person; moves the burglary offenses to the chapter that includes offenses against persons. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 49.

1338.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 24; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to witness testimony.
1338.description: As enacted, limits the circumstances under which a court may permit remote testimony by an expert in the scientific detection of crime (a "forensic analyst") in a criminal proceeding to certain cases; enacts other related requirements. - Amends TCA Title 24; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1339.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
1339.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 38 and Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to the education of law enforcement recruits.
1339.description: As introduced, creates Tennessee reconnect grant eligibility for students admitted to an eligible postsecondary institution and enrolled in a basic law enforcement training academy operated by the postsecondary institution. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 38 and Title 49, Chapter 4.

1340.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8, Chapter 27 and Title 56, relative to insurance.
1340.description: As introduced, deletes obsolete requirement that the commissioner conduct a study of impediments to insurance for the use of justifiable force and report the results of that study to the general assembly and governor no later than March 1, 2012. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8, Chapter 27 and Title 56.

1342.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 16, Part 2, relative to contraband in a penal institution.
1342.description: As enacted, creates the Class E felony of possessing a telecommunication device inside a penal institution; specifies that the first violation of such an offense is punishable only by a fine and the second or subsequent violation is punishable only by a fine of $3,000. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 16, Part 2.

1343.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 43; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to childhood health.
1343.description: As enacted, requires TACIR to conduct a comprehensive evaluation of childhood obesity in the state and its short- and long-term effects. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 10; Title 33; Title 34; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 43; Title 47; Title 49; Title 50; Title 53; Title 55; Title 56; Title 62; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

1344.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1344.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 43 and Title 67, relative to agriculture.
1344.description: As introduced, changes from February 1 to January 15, the due date for the Tennessee equine health advisory commission's annual report on the status of equine health in Tennessee. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 43 and Title 67.

1345.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to sexual exploitation of children.
1345.description: As enacted, expands the definition of "sexual activity" for purposes of offenses related to the sexual exploitation of children to include an intent of sexual arousal or gratification. - Amends TCA Title 39.

1346.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1346.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4 and Title 58, Chapter 2, relative to emergency powers.
1346.description: As introduced, requires the general assembly to review an executive agency created by executive order of the governor under the governor's emergency management powers; authorizes the general assembly to either continue or discontinue the executive agency and its function; directs that all public purchases and contracts for goods and services entered into by an executive agency are subject to state purchasing law requirements. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4 and Title 58, Chapter 2.

1347.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1347.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to 340B entities.
1347.description: As introduced, prohibits certain health insurance issuers, managed health insurance issuers, pharmacy benefits managers, or other third-party payers from taking certain actions against entities participating in the federal 340B drug discount program. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 56 and Title 71.

1348.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1348.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 7, relative to pharmacy benefit managers.
1348.description: As introduced, increases from the first seven calendar days of the month to the first 10 calendar days of the month the time within which an audit of a pharmacist or pharmacy shall not be initiated or scheduled due to high prescription volume. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 7.

1349.last_action: Failed in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1349.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, relative to the use of professional titles.
1349.description: As introduced, limits the use of the title of anesthesiologist only to those physicians licensed by the board of medical examiners or the board of osteopathic examination, who have completed a residency in anesthesiology, and who have a practice limited primarily to anesthesiology, and to those dentists who completed a residency program in anesthesiology at an accredited medical school in years 1963 through 1977. - Amends TCA Title 63.

1351.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-17-121, relative to obligations under warranties and recalls.
1351.description: As enacted, adds to the provisions governing labor rates charged by motor vehicle dealers. - Amends TCA Section 55-17-121.

1352.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 7, Part 1, relative to nursing graduates.
1352.description: As enacted, authorizes a graduate nurse to engage in the practice of professional nursing without a license for a limited period of time if certain conditions are met. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 7, Part 1.

1353.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 11, Part 1; Title 4, Chapter 17; Title 56, Chapter 4; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to tax credits for the rehabilitation of historic structures.
1353.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Historic Revitalization Act." - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 11, Part 1; Title 4, Chapter 17; Title 56, Chapter 4; Title 66 and Title 67.

1354.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1354.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to employment.
1354.description: As introduced, extends from 60 to 65 the number of days the finance, ways and means committees of the senate and house of representatives have to comment on draft rules from the department to implement the Tennessee job skills program. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 68.

1355.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 51, Part 2; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 68, Chapter 102, relative to firefighters.
1355.description: As introduced, enacts the "James 'Dustin' Samples Act." - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 51, Part 2; Title 50, Chapter 6 and Title 68, Chapter 102.

1356.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1356.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4; Title 50; Title 53; Title 57; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to controlled substances.
1356.description: As introduced, changes, from March 1 to February 15, the date by which the commissioner of health must file the annual report with the health committees of the general assembly regarding the Tennessee Prescription Safety Act of 2016 program with respect to its effect on distribution and abuse of controlled substances, including recommendations for improving control and prevention of diversion of controlled substances in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4; Title 50; Title 53; Title 57; Title 67 and Title 68.

1358.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-3-224; Section 57-3-803 and Section 57-5-103, relative to the delivery of alcoholic beverages and beer.
