1358.description: As introduced, authorizes the holder of a retail food store wine license to hold a delivery service license for purposes of delivering sealed bottles of wine or beer to customers located off of the premises. - Amends TCA Section 57-3-224; Section 57-3-803 and Section 57-5-103.

1359.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-4-105, relative to fees for service and handling mail orders of plates and decals.
1359.description: As enacted, increases, from $4.00 to $5.00, the amount of the fee that may be imposed by each county clerk for the service of handling mail orders of registration plates and decals. - Amends TCA Section 55-4-105.

1360.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1360.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, relative to rental properties.
1360.description: As introduced, enacts the "Right to Call for Help Act" to prohibit certain penalties based on a property owner or lessee calling for emergency assistance. - Amends TCA Title 66.

1361.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-21-401; Section 30-4-103; Section 30-4-104 and Section 30-4-101, relative to probate.
1361.description: As enacted, enacts the "Small Estate Affidavit Limited Letter of Authority Act," which is a rewrite of "The Small Estates Act." - Amends TCA Section 8-21-401; Section 30-4-103; Section 30-4-104 and Section 30-4-101.

1362.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9 and Title 49, relative to education.
1362.description: As enacted, defines the term "teacher" for purposes of state salary increases for licensed education personnel. - Amends TCA Title 9 and Title 49.

1363.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
1363.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 50; Title 55 and Title 67, relative to assessment, collection, or recovery of taxes, fees, surcharges, and claims against businesses.
1363.description: As introduced, prohibits the state, cities, and municipalities from assessing, collecting, or recovering taxes, fees, surcharges, or monetary claims against businesses ordered to cease operations with the public, upon submission of satisfactory proof of a revenue loss resulting from the order. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 50; Title 55 and Title 67.

1364.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 27, relative to local government entities that self-fund a plan of insurance.
1364.description: As enacted, revises the provisions governing a county's, a municipal corporation's, and a special school district's right of subrogation under the local authority's group life, hospitalization, disability, or medical insurance plan. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 27.

1365.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 36 of the Private Acts of 1961; as amended by Chapter 185 of the Private Acts of 1984; Chapter 66 of the Private Acts of 1993; Chapter 156 of the Private Acts of 1996 and Chapter 62 of the Private Acts of 2010; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the Charter of the City of Lewisburg.
1365.description: Subject to local approval, makes various changes to the charter of the City of Lewisburg. - Amends Chapter 36 of the Private Acts of 1961; as amended.

1366.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1366.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 28, Chapter 3; Title 55, Chapter 8 and Title 55, Chapter 9, relative to limitation of actions.
1366.description: As introduced, clarifies that a cause of action brought by a person injured by criminal conduct that is a traffic offense that is classified as a Class B or C misdemeanor or a violation of a municipal ordinance must be commenced within one year of the cause of action, not within two years as authorized for causes of action based on other criminal conduct. - Amends TCA Title 28, Chapter 3; Title 55, Chapter 8 and Title 55, Chapter 9.

1367.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 16, Part 2, relative to participation in interscholastic athletics by virtual school students.
1367.description: As introduced, permits virtual school students to participate in interscholastic athletics in the LEAs in which the students reside. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 16, Part 2.

1368.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1368.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, relative to carrying of firearms by certain persons.
1368.description: As introduced, deletes the requirement that a retired law enforcement officer submit to a criminal history records check in order to carry a firearm in the same manner as an active law enforcement officer under federal law. - Amends TCA Title 38.

1369.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1369.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 20; Title 28; Title 29; Title 39; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 67, relative to technology corporations.
1369.description: As introduced, makes removing or censoring a political candidate or user from a social media platform of a technology corporation based on speech otherwise protected by the First Amendment in a public forum an unfair and deceptive act under the Consumer Protection Act of 1977. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12; Title 20; Title 28; Title 29; Title 39; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 67.

1370.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 16 and Title 36, Chapter 3, Part 3, relative to marriage.
1370.description: As enacted, permits notaries public to solemnize marriages. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 16 and Title 36, Chapter 3, Part 3.

1371.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to scholarships.
1371.description: As introduced, revises eligibility requirements for the general assembly merit scholarship for students who complete high school in a Tennessee home school program or who graduate from an ineligible Tennessee high school. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4.

1372.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 27, relative to health insurance benefits for families of first responders.
1372.description: As enacted, requires the state to reimburse a local government that provides health insurance benefits for first responders in an amount equal to that portion of health insurance premiums or expenses for COBRA coverage for benefits for which the local government is responsible. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 27.

1374.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to jury instructions.
1374.description: As introduced, requires a court, upon the request of a criminal defense attorney, to instruct the jury that although the state may prove a case beyond a reasonable doubt the jury may still find the defendant not guilty in order to avoid an unjust result. - Amends TCA Title 37; Title 39 and Title 40.

1376.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 37, relative to dependent and neglected children.
1376.description: As enacted, enacts "Eli's Law," which creates a presumption that any child born to a parent, from whose custody a child has previously been removed for being dependent or neglected and the child who was previously removed is in the custody of the department of children's services, may be dependent or neglected and that it is in the best interest of both children that the child's birth be brought to the court's attention; enacts other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 37.

1377.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
1377.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-3-207; Section 57-3-217 and Section 57-4-102, relative to local wine industry associations.
1377.description: As introduced, provides for the licensure and regulation of local wine industry associations; authorizes such associations to participate in wine festivals with up to 10 wineries that are members of the association. - Amends TCA Section 57-3-207; Section 57-3-217 and Section 57-4-102.

1378.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1378.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to coverage of medical expenses.
1378.description: As introduced, increases from 21 days to 30 days the time within which a health insurance entity must pay on or notify a provider regarding a claim received by electronic submission. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 56 and Title 71.

1379.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 54 of the Private Acts of 1983; as amended by Chapter 185 of the Private Acts of 1986; Chapter 107 of the Private Acts of 1991; Chapter 27 of the Private Acts of 1991; Chapter 152 of the Private Acts of 1994; Chapter 42 of the Private Acts of 1995; Chapter 6 of the Private Acts of 2015; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the Madison County Sheriff's Civil Service Law of 2021.
1379.description: Subject to local approval, replaces existing sheriff's civil service law with a new civil service law. - Amends Chapter 54 of the Private Acts of 1983; as amended.

1380.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1380.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 45; Title 55; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
1380.description: As introduced, increases from 60 to 90 days the time period following notice to a domestic insurance company that its capital stock is impaired to the extent of 20 percent or more and subject to be made good, within which the company must lawfully repair or reduce its capital or be subject to proceedings by the commissioner. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 45; Title 55; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1381.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1381.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 13; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 65, relative to oversight of utility providers.
1381.description: As introduced, requires the public utility commission to make available to the public on its website an electronic copy of its annual report to the general assembly and governor on matters related to the commission for the previous year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 13; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 65.

1382.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 7; Title 8, Chapter 25; Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37, relative to retirement for certain law enforcement officers.
1382.description: As enacted, authorizes, from May 25, 2021, to July 1, 2023, law enforcement officers who have been retired for at least nine months from TCRS from any superseded system administered by the state, or from any local retirement fund to accept employment as a law enforcement officer without loss or suspension of retirement benefits if certain conditions met. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 7; Title 8, Chapter 25; Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37.

1383.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 70, Chapter 2, relative to licenses.
1383.description: As enacted, repeals statutory fee structure for licenses and permits, with certain exceptions; authorizes the fish and wildlife commission to promulgate rules to abolish license years and establish an annual license system. - Amends TCA Title 70, Chapter 2.

1385.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 20, relative to the appointment of deputies and assistants.
1385.description: As enacted, revises and adds to the provisions governing petitions for such deputies and assistants and disputes regarding the hiring or salary of such a deputy or assistant. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 20.

1386.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1386.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 4, to authorize issuance of United States army ranger license plates.
1386.description: As introduced, authorizes issuance of United States army ranger license plates to active, retired, or honorably discharged U.S. Army Rangers; specifies documentation applicant for such plate must provide for issuance. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 4.

1387.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1387.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to the carrying of weapons.
1387.description: As introduced, deletes the criminal offense prohibiting a person from carrying a firearm or club with the intent to go armed and defenses and exceptions to that offense; makes various other changes with regard to possession of a firearm. - Amends TCA Title 39.

1388.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to recreational activities.
1388.description: As enacted, requires TACIR to study funding for all non fish and game recreational activities, particularly the use of non-motorized vessels, and submit a report of their findings and recommendations, including any proposed legislation or interim reports, to the general assembly no later than December 31, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 69 and Title 70.

1389.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 47, relative to identity theft.
1389.description: As introduced, increases, from five to seven days, the time in which a party who brings a private action for identity theft must submit a copy of any judgment, order, or decrees of the action to the attorney general. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 47.

1390.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, relative to paid family leave.
1390.description: As introduced, authorizes 12 workweeks of paid family leave during a 12-month period for qualified state employees. - Amends TCA Title 8.

1391.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 51, Part 10, relative to the regulation of transportation services.
1391.description: As enacted, authorizes governmental entities to regulate entertainment transportation services. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 51, Part 10.

1392.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1392.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to restoration of rights of citizenship.
1392.description: As introduced, allows a person to have the right of suffrage restored if the person has entered into an agreement to pay the full amount of restitution owed to a victim in reasonable installments and is current on such installments. - Amends TCA Title 40.

1394.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1394.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to solid waste.
1394.description: As introduced, expands the maximum number of persons who may serve on a county solid waste authority's board of directors, from 15 to 17 members. - Amends TCA Title 55; Title 67 and Title 68.

1395.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 7, relative to the educational services plan.
1395.description: As enacted, ends the BEST college savings program that permitted tuition units to be purchased under a tuition contract; provides for the use, refund, or rollover to another college savings plan of all funds remaining under any tuition contract. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 7.

1396.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1396.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 13 and Title 65, relative to wireless communications.
1396.description: As introduced, makes various changes to the Competitive Wireless Broadband Investment, Deployment, and Safety Act of 2018. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 13 and Title 65.

1397.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to pharmacy benefits.
1397.description: As enacted, revises various provisions governing pharmacy benefits and pharmacy benefits managers. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 56 and Title 71.

1398.last_action: Reset on Final cal. of Property & Planning Subcommittee
1398.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, relative to county zoning.
1398.description: As introduced, removes the authority of the county legislative body in Hamilton County to rezone properties conditionally or based upon contract, where the agreed conditions are designed to ameliorate injuries created by the rezoning to surrounding property interests or to county interests. - Amends TCA Title 13.

1400.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 3-1-106, relative to members of the general assembly.
1400.description: As enacted, revises various provisions regarding mileage allowance and expense allowances.

1402.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 10, Part 4 and Title 49, relative to immunization.
1402.description: As enacted, requires schools, nursery schools, preschools, child care facilities, and public institutions of higher education to include information on immunization exemptions on any communications to students or parents regarding immunization requirements. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 10, Part 4 and Title 49.

1404.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to sales taxes.
1404.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing the sales and use tax exemption for qualified farmers and nurserymen in regard to certain farm equipment and machinery used in agricultural operations. - Amends TCA Title 67.

1405.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal justice.
1405.description: As enacted, requires law enforcement agencies to develop certain policies regarding the use of force; prohibits magistrates from issuing no-knock warrants; establishes certain reporting requirements. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1406.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 1 of the Public Acts of 2021 (1st Ex. Sess.); Chapter 2 of the Public Acts of 2021 (1st Ex. Sess.); Chapter 3 of the Public Acts of 2021 (1st Ex. Sess.) and Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to teacher evaluations.
1406.description: As introduced, requires that a petition by a teacher to the commissioner of education for waiver of any requirement for renewal of the teacher's license on the basis of the teacher's performance effectiveness level on each of the last three evaluations be made in writing. - Amends Chapter 1 of the Public Acts of 2021 (1st Ex. Sess.); Chapter 2 of the Public Acts of 2021 (1st Ex. Sess.); Chapter 3 of the Public Acts of 2021 (1st Ex. Sess.) and TCA Title 49.

1407.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1407.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to juveniles.
1407.description: As introduced, requires a law enforcement officer to make efforts to contact a parent, legal guardian, or legal custodian when issuing a citation to a child in lieu of continuing to keep the child in custody; changes the evidentiary requirement for a supervising authority who petitions a court to intervene when a child has violated the terms or conditions of the judicial diversion. - Amends TCA Title 37.

1409.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49 and Title 68, relative to athletics.
1409.description: As enacted, enacts the "Safe Stars Act," which establishes certain health and safety requirements in regard to school youth athletic activities. - Amends TCA Title 49 and Title 68.

1410.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1410.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 68 and Title 69, relative to environmental conservation.
1410.description: As introduced, changes from February 1 to January 15 the due date for the commissioner's report concerning the time within which permit applications are acted on during the first six months of each fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 68 and Title 69.

1411.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
1411.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 10; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13 and Title 65, Chapter 4, relative to comprehensive growth plans.
1411.description: As introduced, deletes requirements for cities and counties to develop comprehensive growth plans. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 10; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13 and Title 65, Chapter 4.

1412.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69 and Title 70, relative to boating.
1412.description: As introduced, requires rules of the fish and wildlife commission governing the numbering, safety equipment, and operation of vessels to be published in the newspaper at least 20 days, instead of 15 days, before the rules become effective. - Amends TCA Title 69 and Title 70.

1413.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1413.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13 and Title 68, relative to subdivision regulations.
1413.description: As introduced, requires a planning commission to give notice at least five days prior to a public hearing that is held for adopting or amending subdivision regulations. - Amends TCA Title 13 and Title 68.

1414.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-3-802, relative to retail food store licenses.
1414.description: As introduced, expands definition of "retail food store" to include certain facilities that transfer, store, and deliver retail and other goods. - Amends TCA Section 57-3-802.

1415.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 71, relative to human trafficking.
1415.description: As enacted, creates the Class A felony of aggravated human trafficking; revises other provisions in regard to trafficking, involuntary servitude, and prostitution offenses. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 71.

1416.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1416.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 38, Chapter 9; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 3; Title 39, Chapter 11, Part 6 and Title 58, Chapter 2, relative to civil emergencies.
1416.description: As introduced, reduces, from 15 days to 14 days, the length of time the chief administrative officer of a municipality may order a general curfew to be in effect in response to a civil emergency. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 38, Chapter 9; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 3; Title 39, Chapter 11, Part 6 and Title 58, Chapter 2.

1418.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 54 and Title 55, relative to traffic-control signals.
1418.description: As introduced, requires the department to promulgate rules to standardize the length of time a traffic-control signal must display the yellow signal light, when following the green signal light; requires traffic-control signals to be in compliance with the standardized display times. - Amends TCA Title 54 and Title 55.

1419.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1419.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 17; Title 4; and Title 47, Chapter 18, relative to sweepstakes.
1419.description: As introduced, defines "sweepstakes" for purposes of consumer protection. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 17; Title 4; and Title 47, Chapter 18.

1421.last_action: Assigned to s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee
1421.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, relative to grandparents' rights.
1421.description: As introduced, requires a court of competent jurisdiction, upon granting visitation rights to the grandparents of a child who is removed from the custody of the child's parents, guardians, or legal custodian, to reduce to writing the factors that went into making the determination to grant grandparent visitation rights and include the writing in the case file. - Amends TCA Title 36.

1422.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
1422.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to public planning.
1422.description: As introduced, reduces from 30 to 20 days following the availability of sufficient data, the period within which a historic zoning commission or regional historic zoning commission must grant or deny a request for a certificate of appropriateness. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13; Title 66 and Title 67.

1423.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1423.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5, Chapter 1, relative to counties.
1423.description: As introduced, extends the prohibition on a former county official or employee purchasing surplus property from the county except by public auction or competitive sealed bid from six months after leaving employment to 12 months. - Amends TCA Title 5, Chapter 1.

1424.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 10-7-504; Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to the Every Mom Matters Act.
1424.description: As introduced, enacts the "Every Mom Matters Act," which requires a woman to complete a free resource access consultation with the department of health prior to having an abortion. - Amends TCA Section 10-7-504; Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68.

1425.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63 and Title 68, relative to practical nurse scope of practice.
1425.description: As introduced, increases from six to eight months the single period of time that a temporary permit for a practical nurse licensed in another state who has made an application for permanent licensure in Tennessee is valid. - Amends TCA Title 63 and Title 68.

1426.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1426.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to licensed aestheticians.
1426.description: As introduced, increases the required hours for an aesthetician student from 150 hours to 175 hours. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 62; Title 63 and Title 68.

1427.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1427.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 62, Chapter 4; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to licensed estheticians.
1427.description: As introduced, requires the board of cosmetology and barber examiners to promulgate rules on the licensure and scope of practice of estheticians. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 62, Chapter 4; Title 63 and Title 68.

1428.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1428.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 4, relative to voter registration.
1428.description: As introduced, requires department of safety to automatically register a qualified person to vote from information on an application for a driver license or photo identification card unless the person opts out. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 4.

1429.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1429.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 24-2-109; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38, Chapter 12, Part 1; Title 39, Chapter 11; Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 1; Title 40 and Title 71, Chapter 6, relative to domestic violence.
1429.description: As introduced, increases the fine a defendant convicted of domestic assault violence must pay to fund family violence shelters and shelter services from $225 to $250. - Amends TCA Section 24-2-109; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38, Chapter 12, Part 1; Title 39, Chapter 11; Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 1; Title 40 and Title 71, Chapter 6.

1430.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 13; Title 49 and Title 68, relative to water access in public schools.
1430.description: As introduced, requires a local board of education or the governing body of a public charter school to incorporate water bottle filling stations as part of any new school building construction; major renovation; or substantial repair, replacement, or upgrade of a school building's plumbing system or fixtures. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 13; Title 49 and Title 68.

1431.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 1, relative to heritage protection.
1431.description: As introduced, requires grants of waivers by the Tennessee historical commission for the movement or alteration of a memorial to be approved by joint resolution of the general assembly; creates a Class C misdemeanor if a person causes damage to certain privately owned memorials; makes other revisions to the Tennessee Heritage Protection Act. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 1.

1433.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Criminal Justice Committee
1433.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to criminal law.
1433.description: As introduced, establishes a study committee to study the traumatic effects on victims of criminal offenses that do not involve physical harm; allows a victim of a nonviolent crime to receive notification of the release from custody of an offender from a jail or detention facility prior to trial. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

1434.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1434.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 59; Title 67, Chapter 7; Section 68-105-120 and Title 69, Chapter 3, relative to mining.
1434.description: As introduced, changes from February 15 to February 1 the due date for persons engaged in mining, quarrying, production of minerals or gas, manufacture of gas or pig iron, and similar businesses to annually report output to the department of labor and workforce development. - Amends TCA Title 59; Title 67, Chapter 7; Section 68-105-120 and Title 69, Chapter 3.

1435.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1435.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 1, Chapter 3; Title 2; Title 3; Title 16; Title 17; Title 20; Title 27 and Title 29, relative to three-judge panels.
1435.description: As introduced, requires the establishment of a three-judge panel to adjudicate cases challenging state legislative or congressional districts. - Amends TCA Title 1, Chapter 3; Title 2; Title 3; Title 16; Title 17; Title 20; Title 27 and Title 29.

1437.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1437.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to expunction of certain offenses.
1437.description: As introduced, requires a court to issue an order of expunction after a person completes the sentence imposed for any misdemeanor or Class C, D, or E felony that was nonviolent and was not a sexual offense. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1438.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Commerce Committee
1438.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7, Chapter 34; Title 7, Chapter 36; Title 7, Chapter 52; Title 9 and Title 65, relative to utilities.
1438.description: As introduced, establishes that when cities or towns revert real property within municipal boundaries to an unincorporated status, such action does not require a municipal utility to cease providing electrical service, water service, sanitary sewer service, natural gas service, other utility services, or street lighting in the territory excluded from the municipality's corporate limits. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7, Chapter 34; Title 7, Chapter 36; Title 7, Chapter 52; Title 9 and Title 65.

1439.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 16; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 49; Title 53; Title 55; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to drugs.
1439.description: As introduced, increases from within 45 days to within 60 days of the date of judgment, the timeframe for the court clerk to forward to the Tennessee bureau of investigation a copy of the judgment and date of birth of all persons required to be included on the drug offender registry. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 16; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 49; Title 53; Title 55; Title 63 and Title 68.

1440.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
1440.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 49, relative to investment of state funds.
1440.description: As introduced, prohibits monies within the state pooled investment fund from being invested on or after August 1, 2021, in any entity that receives immunity under Section 230 of the federal Communications Decency Act; requires divestment of any monies that are invested in such an entity before August 1, 2021; requires written notice of the divestment to such entity at the earliest practicable time. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 49.

1441.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 3; Title 29, Chapter 34; Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 1, relative to COVID-19 related civil liability.
1441.description: As introduced, adds delaying or modifying the schedule or performance of any dental procedure to the meaning of "arising from COVID-19" as used in the Tennessee COVID-19 Recovery Act. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 3; Title 29, Chapter 34; Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 1.

1443.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to K-12 finances.
1443.description: As introduced, requires the comptroller to review the state's K-12 finances for the 2018-2019 school year and report the findings by January 1, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1444.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to property taxes.
1444.description: As introduced, increases from 1,500 to 5,000 the number of acres of land that may be placed within one property tax jurisdiction; increases from 1,500 to 5,000 the maximum acreage available to a real property owner that may be classified as forest or open space land. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 5.

1445.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to career and technical education.
1445.description: As enacted, directs the department to provide career and technical education opportunities for students in middle school; requires an LEA to provide students in seventh or eighth grade with information on available career and technical education programs upon administering a career aptitude assessment. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1446.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 12, relative to county election commissions.
1446.description: As introduced, requires each county election commission to maintain an internet website for purposes of providing voter information to residents of the county. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 12.

1447.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 193 of the Private Acts of 1947; as amended by Chapter 6 of the Private Acts of 1993 and Chapter 63 of the Private Acts of 2014; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the Charter of the Town of Samburg.
1447.description: Subject to local approval, allows non-resident property owners to vote in the municipal elections; authorizes the treasurer to pay warrants issued by the vice mayor and any other officer approved by ordinance; deletes provision authorizing collection of delinquent taxes by distress warrants. - Amends Chapter 193 of the Private Acts of 1947; as amended.

1448.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal justice.
1448.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing sentencing for persons convicted of drug offenses committed in a drug-free school zone; authorizes a court that imposed a sentence for a drug-free school zone offense that occurred prior to September 1, 2020, upon motion of the defendant or the district attorney general or the court's own motion, to resentence the defendant under the current law. - Amends TCA Title 16; Title 39 and Title 40.

1449.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 51, relative to funding for public safety operations.
1449.description: As introduced, authorizes each municipality, county, or metropolitan government to impose a public safety surcharge for purposes of providing public safety services; specifies the manner by which the surcharge must be approved by the local government and the purposes for which the surcharge must be used. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 51.

1450.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 43; Title 44; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 66, relative to agricultural property.
1450.description: As introduced, limits foreign ownership of agricultural property in this state. - Amends TCA Title 43; Title 44; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 66.

1452.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
1452.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 57 and Title 71, relative to discount programs.
1452.description: As introduced, requires coverage under the Volunteer Rx discount program for smoking cessation products beginning October 1, 2021. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 57 and Title 71.

1453.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1453.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 50, relative to wages.
1453.description: As introduced, removes the subminimum wage exception for an employee whose earning or productive capacity is impaired by age, physical, or mental deficiency or injury. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 50.

1456.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1456.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14 and Title 39, Chapter 17, relative to criminal offenses.
1456.description: As introduced, changes from a Class E felony to a Class A misdemeanor, the criminal penalty for a person engaged in camping on state property knowing that the area is not specifically designated for use as a camping area by the department or agency responsible for such land; removes the enhanced penalties for certain criminal offenses involving obstruction of highways, streets, or other passageways. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14 and Title 39, Chapter 17.

1458.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to domestic violence.
1458.description: As enacted, adds to the provisions governing bail that following the arrest of a person for the offense of aggravated assault under circumstances in which the alleged victim of the offense is a domestic abuse victim, that the court or magistrate must make certain findings and, based on the findings, may extend the 12-hour hold period up to 24 hours after the time of arrest; revises other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 36; Title 39 and Title 40.

1459.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 10, relative to curriculum.
1459.description: As introduced, requires each LEA and public charter school to provide age-appropriate instruction to public school students on black history in the fifth and eighth grades; directs the department of education to provide LEAs and public charter schools with black history resources and materials. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 10.

1460.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
1460.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 49; Title 67 and Title 71, relative to single parents.
1460.description: As introduced, directs the department to develop partnerships with technology companies, nonprofit organizations, and other public and private community partners to establish programs and seek grants to provide low-cost or free technology training, computers, and job placement services to single parents. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 49; Title 67 and Title 71.

1461.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, relative to lease financing by local public entities.
1461.description: As enacted, enacts the "Uniformity in Local Government Lease Financing Act of 2021." - Amends TCA Title 9.

1462.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 63, relative to health insurance plans.
1462.description: As enacted, clarifies that the assignment of benefits statute does not prohibit a policy of insurance from providing reimbursement to an insured for expenses the insured incurred when the insured remitted payment directly to a healthcare provider or healthcare facility for provided covered healthcare services. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 63.

1463.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 33; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health care.
1463.description: As enacted, prohibits certain healthcare providers and entities from discriminating against qualified persons for receipt of transplantations or anatomical gifts based solely on disability; prohibits insurers that offer plans covering transplantations from denying coverage solely on disability. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 33; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1464.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
1464.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12; Title 62 and Title 68, relative to construction.
1464.description: As introduced, prohibits persons from conditioning, reducing, withholding, or delaying payment pursuant to a construction agreement to a commercial building contractor by requiring a signed waiver, release, denial, discharge, negative affirmation, or similar document, other than a document that corresponds directly to the specific work, services, materials, and labor for which the payment is due. - Amends TCA Title 12; Title 62 and Title 68.

1465.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1465.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 44; Title 55; Title 62 and Title 68, relative to professions.
1465.description: As introduced, reduces from 75 to 60 days after the end of the pre-need seller's fiscal year, the time by which a pre-need seller and trustee must file an annual report with the commissioner of commerce and insurance. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 44; Title 55; Title 62 and Title 68.

1466.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 12; Title 43; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 61; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to commerce.
1466.description: As introduced, removes provision that describes a report by the department of commerce and insurance due on or before January 1, 2014, to the commerce and labor committee of the senate and the business and utilities committee of the house of representatives concerning the department's findings and recommendations concerning the Tennessee works pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 12; Title 43; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 61; Title 66 and Title 67.

1467.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1467.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 64 and Title 65, relative to utilities.
1467.description: As introduced, removes reference to a pilot project that ran through the end of the year 2003. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 64 and Title 65.

1468.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1468.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 5, relative to sales and use tax collection and remittance.
1468.description: As introduced, requires dealers and marketplace facilitators with no physical presence in this state to register with the department of revenue and collect and remit sales and use taxes if the dealer or facilitator made 200 or more separate sales transactions to consumers in this state. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 6, Part 5.

1469.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 54 and Title 55, relative to devices used for mobility or transportation.
1469.description: As introduced, requires department of safety to report to the transportation and safety committee of the senate and the transportation committee of the house of representatives on the number and severity of accidents involving electric scooters, including any findings and recommendations; requires the report on or before March 1, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 54 and Title 55.

1470.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1470.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4 and Title 8, relative to the general assembly.
1470.description: As introduced, requires office of legislative administration to provide an electronic report to the members of certain information regarding full- and part-time employees of the general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4 and Title 8.

1471.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Civil Justice Committee
1471.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 19; Title 20; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the administration of justice.
1471.description: As introduced, clarifies that the annual report district attorneys general submit regarding administrative subpoenas of internet service accounts must be submitted to the criminal justice committee instead of the judiciary committee of the house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 19; Title 20; Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40.

1472.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1472.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20; Title 24; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal matters.
1472.description: As introduced, changes from January 15 to February 1 the date by which the district attorneys general shall report to certain committees of the senate and the house of representatives the number of reports received of a person who appeared to be suffering from or to have been the victim of female genital mutilation. - Amends TCA Title 20; Title 24; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1473.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 307 of the Acts of 1903; as amended and rewritten by Chapter 78 of the Private Acts of 1993; Chapter 86 of the Private Acts of 2004; Chapter 39 of the Private Acts of 2010; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the Town of Cleveland.
1473.description: Subject to local approval, expands, from 30 to 60 days, the time period in which vacancies on the city council or the office of mayor must be filled by the remaining council members. - Amends Chapter 307 of the Acts of 1903; as amended and rewritten.

1474.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
1474.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 553 of the Acts of 1903; as amended by Chapter 405 of the Acts of 1907; Chapter 241 of the Private Acts of 1974; and Chapter 8 of the Private Acts of 1983; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the City of Tullahoma.
1474.description: Subject to local approval, changes the election date from the first Thursday in August to the Tuesday after the first Monday in August; extends the terms of office, from three years to four years, for the aldermen and mayor. - Amends Chapter 553 of the Acts of 1903; as amended.

1475.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to school performance.
1475.description: As introduced, prohibits the use of student performance and student growth data from TCAP tests in identifying priority schools and assigning schools to the achievement school district. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1476.last_action: Assigned to s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee
1476.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1, Part 6 and Title 49, Chapter 13, relative to the achievement school district.
1476.description: As introduced, requires public charter schools authorized by the ASD to remain in the ASD until the school satisfies certain exit criteria; specifies that the removal by the commissioner of a public charter school from the jurisdiction of the ASD acts as an automatic revocation of the public charter school's charter agreement. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1, Part 6 and Title 49, Chapter 13.

1477.last_action: Assigned to s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee
1477.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 13, relative to charter schools.
1477.description: As introduced, changes, from 10 years to five years, the term of an initial charter agreement and, in certain circumstances, the term of a renewed charter agreement; authorizes a local board of education to consider the number of public schools already serving the school district when approving or denying a charter application. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 13.

1478.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1478.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 28 and Title 40, relative to collection of certain debts.
1478.description: As introduced, limits civil judgments to recover a fine, court costs, or litigation taxes assessed against a criminal defendant to a 10-year period following conversion of the debt to a civil judgment. - Amends TCA Title 28 and Title 40.

1479.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Criminal Justice Committee
1479.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to criminal offenses involving drugs.
1479.description: As introduced, increases the amount of marijuana possessed or exchanged under the offenses of simple possession or casual exchange from less than one-half ounce to less than one ounce; prohibits the inference of purpose of selling or otherwise dispensing solely from the simple possession or casual exchange of less than one ounce of marijuana. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1480.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-3-207 and Section 57-3-217, relative to wine.
1480.description: As enacted, authorizes a winery direct shipper that produces or manufactures less than 270,000 liters of wine per calendar year to ship up to 54 liters of wine to an individual per calendar year. - Amends TCA Section 57-3-207 and Section 57-3-217.

1481.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1481.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 43 and Title 44, relative to agriculture.
1481.description: As introduced, changes from February 15 to January 15 the due date for the Tennessee agricultural hall of fame board's biennial report of the board's activities. - Amends TCA Title 43 and Title 44.

1482.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 24; Title 55, Chapter 4 and Title 68, Chapter 102, relative to firefighters.
1482.description: As introduced, creates attendance requirements for members of the commission on firefighting personnel standards and education. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 24; Title 55, Chapter 4 and Title 68, Chapter 102.

1483.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1483.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-8-199, relative to the use of wireless telecommunications devices.
1483.description: As introduced, exempts operators of tow trucks or wreckers from the prohibition on physically holding a wireless telecommunication device while operating a motor vehicle. - Amends TCA Section 55-8-199.

1484.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1484.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, relative to public records.
1484.description: As introduced, authorizes any county official providing remote electronic access to certain public records of the office that are maintained on computer storage media in that office to submit electronically the statement that must be sent to the comptroller 30 days prior to providing such access. - Amends TCA Title 10.

1485.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 5, Part 2, relative to the arrangement of names on ballots.
1485.description: As introduced, requires names of candidates representing statewide political parties and recognized minor parties to be listed alphabetically on partisan general election ballots instead of ordering by majority party, minor party, and recognized minor party prior to alphabetizing. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 5, Part 2.

1486.last_action: Failed in s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
1486.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 2, relative to voter registration purging.
1486.description: As introduced, requires county election commissions, in the manner they deem appropriate, to call, send text messages, or email notifications to voters whose registration may be purged as a result of the address verification program, with instructions on how the voters may verify or correct their address information. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 2.

1487.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 13 and Title 12, Chapter 2, relative to electronic equipment of the general assembly.
1487.description: As introduced, requires the office of legislative administration to offer for sale to members of the general assembly decommissioned electronic equipment of the general assembly prior to disposing of the equipment; requires the office to offer former members upon separation from office the option to purchase their electronic equipment. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 13 and Title 12, Chapter 2.

1488.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1488.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 68, relative to nursing homes.
1488.description: As introduced, prohibits the administrator of a nursing home from limiting access to the facility to a family member of a resident during a disease outbreak, epidemic, or pandemic. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 68.

1489.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1489.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, relative to communication between persons with autism spectrum disorder and law enforcement officers.
1489.description: As introduced, requires commissioner of safety to design and make available to persons with autism spectrum disorder a blue envelope containing written information and guidance on ways to enhance effective communication between a law enforcement officer and a person with such disorder, and the person's driver license, registration, and insurance card. - Amends TCA Title 55.

1490.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
1490.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 1, relative to student athletes.
1490.description: As introduced, prohibits a public institution of higher education from preventing a student athlete from earning compensation as a result of the use of the student athlete's name, image, or likeness; prohibits a public institution of higher education from punishing a student athlete based on a gift, benefit, or inducement given to the student athlete or the student athlete's family by a booster. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 1.

1492.last_action: Failed in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1492.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4, relative to Kratom.
1492.description: As introduced, adds as requirements for sale of Kratom that sales only be made by retailers and sold only in packaging of five ounces to seven ounces; violation is a Class A misdemeanor. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4.

1493.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1493.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 33; Title 37; Title 41; Title 49; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health care.
1493.description: As introduced, makes various vaccinations and medical treatments voluntary rather than required; authorizes citizens to refuse vaccinations or medical treatment for any reason. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 33; Title 37; Title 41; Title 49; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

1494.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
1494.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 36-6-103; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to medical records.
1494.description: As introduced, entitles a parent or legal guardian to access the medical records of a child legally within the legal guardian or parent's care; requires that a child must provide voluntary, written consent for the legal guardian or parent to access medical records once the child reaches 18 years of age. - Amends TCA Section 36-6-103; Title 63 and Title 68.

1495.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
1495.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 39; Title 44 and Title 67, relative to horse racing.
1495.description: As introduced, enacts the "Horse Racing Control Act of 2021," authorizing and regulating parimutuel wagering on horse racing. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 39; Title 44 and Title 67.

1496.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, Chapter 104, relative to display operators.
1496.description: As enacted, makes various changes to the process for certification as an outdoor fireworks display operator, proximate pyrotechnic display operator, or flame effect display operator. - Amends TCA Title 68, Chapter 104.

1497.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1497.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 10; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to communication services.
1497.description: As introduced, removes the expired requirement for the public utility commission to file a report about the applications made for state-issued certificates of franchise authority and amendments to applications made during the prior year. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 10; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68.

1498.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 167 of the Private Acts of 1979; as amended by Chapter 140 of the Private Acts of 2000 and Chapter 57 of the Private Acts of 2018; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the privilege tax on the occupancy of hotels and motels in Montgomery County.
1498.description: Subject to local approval, transfers the function of budgeting and fiscal matters regarding the hotel tax from the tourist commission to the economic development council; reallocates the distribution of proceeds received from such tax. - Amends Chapter 167 of the Private Acts of 1979; as amended.

1499.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
1499.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 49; Title 54 and Title 55, relative to school zones.
1499.description: As introduced, authorizes the department of transportation to paint and maintain pedestrian crosswalks located within school zones designated as being on the state system of highways. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 49; Title 54 and Title 55.

1500.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to kindergarten through grade twelve (K-12) education.
1500.description: As enacted, enacts the "School Turnaround Pilot Program Act." - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 6.

1501.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
1501.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-23-103 and Title 36, relative to child support.
1501.description: As introduced, extends the time within which a party may request a rehearing of the determination of a child support magistrate from five days to 10 days; requires child support magistrates to be paid a salary equal to 75 percent of the salary paid to a circuit court judge. - Amends TCA Section 8-23-103 and Title 36.

1502.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1502.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 68 and Title 69, relative to the department of environment and conservation.
1502.description: As introduced, changes from January 31 to January 15 the deadline for the commissioner to submit the annual report on implementation of a secure web portal for the submittal of online permit applications under the Water Quality Control Act. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 68 and Title 69.

1504.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1504.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to landfills.
1504.description: As introduced, increases, from 30 days to 35 days, the time an interested party has from the date notice was given to submit written comments on the tentative determinations made regarding a proposed solid waste facility. - Amends TCA Title 68.

1505.last_action: Assigned to s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee
1505.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to sex education.
1505.description: As introduced, deletes the family life curriculum required for schools located in certain counties that only allows students to receive education on sexual risk avoidance through abstinence; requires each LEA and public charter school that serves any of the grades kindergarten through 12 to provide students with medically accurate, age-appropriate sex education that teaches students about abstinence, contraception, consent, and how to develop healthy relationships and communication skills. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

1506.last_action: P2C, ref. to Government Operations Committee for Review -- Finance, Ways, & Means Committee
1506.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 67, relative to financing infrastructure projects.
1506.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Infrastructure Bank Act," establishing a governmental entity to finance infrastructure projects in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 67.

1507.last_action: Action def. in State Government Committee to 2022
1507.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 51, Part 3 and Title 67, relative to the Tennessee Sports Gaming Act.
1507.description: As introduced, reduces from 10 days to five days the period by which a licensed sportsbook must request additional information from a bettor if the information initially provided by the bettor was insufficient to verify the bettor's identity and financial information. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 51, Part 3 and Title 67.

1508.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, relative to child care.
1508.description: As enacted, authorizes the department to utilize alternative methodologies to determine the cost of day care when setting the annual day care reimbursement rate and to take actions necessary to support the development of shared services alliances and family child care networks to improve the quality of child care in this state, give child care providers access to innovative child care business resource platforms, and provide a means of cost savings to child care providers through negotiated discounts. - Amends TCA Title 71.

1510.title: AN ACTto amend Chapter 98 of the Private Acts of 1983; as amended by Chapter 186 of the Private Acts of 1992 and Chapter 187 of the Private Acts of 1998; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the hotel occupancy tax in Henderson County.
1510.description: Subject to local approval, increases the rate of the occupancy tax from 5 percent to 7 percent; changes the distribution and use of the tax revenue. - Amends Chapter 98 of the Private Acts of 1983; as amended.

1511.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1511.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55, relative to monitoring systems.
1511.description: As introduced, requires the magistrate to provide a victim who participates in a global positioning monitoring system with the emergency assistance number, in addition to the number for a local law enforcement agency. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41 and Title 55.

1512.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22, relative to the Textbook Transparency Act.
1512.description: As enacted, enacts the "Textbook Transparency Act," which revises provisions governing textbooks and instructional materials. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22.

1514.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to accommodations for transients.
1514.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing the levying of a hotel occupancy tax by a local government. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13; Title 67 and Title 68.

1516.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 57-3-106 and Section 57-4-103, relative to alcoholic beverages.
1516.description: As enacted, authorizes the City of St. Joseph to hold a referendum to authorize the retail sale of alcoholic beverages in package stores and for consumption on the premises. - Amends TCA Section 57-3-106 and Section 57-4-103.

1517.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1517.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 11, relative to reporting of the release of criminal defendants.
1517.description: As introduced, requires the clerk of each court with criminal jurisdiction to submit a monthly report to the administrative office of the courts including certain statistical information about arrests, release, bonds, and failures to appear; requires clerks who fail to submit the required information to pay an administrative fee. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 11.

1520.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1520.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 9; Title 38, Chapter 7; Title 58; Title 62, Chapter 5; Title 63; Title 68, Chapter 3, Part 5 and Title 68, Chapter 3, Part 2, relative to veterans.
1520.description: As introduced, changes, from 30 to 45, the number of days prior to the beginning of a new fiscal year that the Tennessee state veterans' homes board must submit the plan of operation for review and approval to the commissioner of veterans services, the commissioner of finance and administration, and the comptroller of the treasury. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 9; Title 38, Chapter 7; Title 58; Title 62, Chapter 5; Title 63; Title 68, Chapter 3, Part 5 and Title 68, Chapter 3, Part 2.

1521.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 46; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 61; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to commerce.
1521.description: As enacted, revises various provisions of the Tennessee Small Business Investment Company Credit Act regarding TNInvestco. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13; Title 42; Title 43; Title 44; Title 45; Title 46; Title 47; Title 48; Title 50; Title 53; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 61; Title 62; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68.

1523.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 1; Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 8 and Title 49, relative to the department of education.
1523.description: As introduced, requires the commissioner to submit the commissioner's strategic plan for the department, and any proposed amendments to, or deviations from, the department's strategic plan, to the state board of education for approval. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 1; Title 4, Chapter 3, Part 8 and Title 49.

1524.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1524.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6; Title 7 and Title 65, relative to utilities.
1524.description: As introduced, changes, from the first Monday of February to February 15, the date by which the commission is required to submit its annual report to the general assembly and the governor regarding all matters relating to the commission's office for the preceding year. - Amends TCA Title 6; Title 7 and Title 65.

1525.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16; Title 17; Title 25; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the Gabby Act.
1525.description: As introduced, enacts the "Gabby Act." - Amends TCA Title 16; Title 17; Title 25; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

1526.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, Chapter 13, relative to selection of candidates for United States senator.
1526.description: As introduced, changes the nomination process for candidates for United States senator. - Amends TCA Title 2, Chapter 13.

1527.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
1527.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 91 of the Private Acts of 2008; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to a privilege tax on restaurants in the city of Jellico.
1527.description: Subject to local approval, authorizes the levy of a privilege tax, not to exceed 2 percent, on the purchase of prepared food from restaurants. - Amends Chapter 91 of the Private Acts of 2008.

1528.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1528.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 67-4-504, relative to privilege taxes.
1528.description: As introduced, expands eligibility criteria for certain municipalities to be authorized to levy and impose certain additional privilege taxes within the corporate limits of the municipality. - Amends TCA Section 67-4-504.

1529.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 56, relative to healthcare costs.
1529.description: As introduced, requires health plans and pharmacy benefits managers to provide to enrollees upon request certain information about covered drugs and benefits under the enrollee’s health plan. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 47, Chapter 18 and Title 56.

1531.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 2 and Section 40-35-501, relative to parole eligibility for persons sentenced to imprisonment for life.
1531.description: As introduced, reduces the portion of a person's sentence for first degree murder that must be served prior to becoming eligible for parole to 60 percent of 60 years if sentenced to imprisonment for life for an offense committed during certain dates or 100 percent of 60 years if sentenced to imprisonment for life without the possibility of parole. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13, Part 2 and Section 40-35-501.

1532.last_action: Failed in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
1532.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 5 and Title 38, relative to law enforcement.
1532.description: As introduced, removes prohibition against community oversight boards issuing subpoenas; replaces procedure for local legislative bodies to issue subpoenas on behalf of a board with procedure for boards to issue subpoenas. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 5 and Title 38.

1534.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
1534.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to supplemental materials used by teachers.
1534.description: As introduced, prohibits teachers from using supplemental materials that are not approved by the state board. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1535.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee of Education Instruction
1535.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22, relative to textbooks and instructional materials.
1535.description: As introduced, requires that the textbooks and instructional materials adopted by the state board of education be available online for public inspection; authorizes the public to continue to provide public comment on the textbooks and instructional materials after the adoption process. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22.

1536.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22, relative to instructional materials.
1536.description: As enacted, requires the department of education to develop a proposed rubric to assist the state textbook and instructional materials quality commission in reviewing and scoring textbooks and instructional materials proposed for adoption and submit the proposed rubric to the commission for approval; enacts other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 22.

1537.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 10; Title 38 and Title 71, relative to the prevention of fraud.
1537.description: As enacted, creates a new division of state government, the Tennessee Office of Cooperative Disability Investigation, to operate for three years. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 10; Title 38 and Title 71.

1538.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to abortion.
1538.description: As introduced, enacts the "Rule of Law Life Act." - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68.

1539.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 8, relative to public pensions and retirement benefits.
1539.description: As enacted, allows members of the Tennessee consolidated retirement system to obtain creditable service for prior service while a participating member of a retirement system of a city, metropolitan government, county, utility district, or other political subdivision. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 8.

1541.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 16, Part 1, relative to real property.
1541.description: As introduced, prohibits the exercise of eminent domain to acquire private property for trails, paths, or greenways for walking, running, hiking, bicycling, or equestrian use unless the private property runs alongside a highway, road, or street; makes other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 16, Part 1.

1542.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 15, Chapter 2, relative to Star-Spangled Banner Day.
1542.description: As enacted, designates September 14 of each year as "Star-Spangled Banner Day," a day of special observance. - Amends TCA Title 15, Chapter 2.

1543.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
1543.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 4 and Title 55, Chapter 6, relative to registration periods for license plates.
1543.description: As introduced, permits registration plates to be renewed every 24 months instead of 12 months. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 4 and Title 55, Chapter 6.

1544.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1, relative to special advocates.
1544.description: As introduced, authorizes a family to request a family special advocate to advocate for family reunification when the family is subject to an investigation. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1.

1545.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to freedom from unwanted surveillance.
1545.description: As introduced, makes various changes regarding law enforcement use of drones, including revising the authorized uses for a drone without a warrant. - Amends TCA Title 39.

1546.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 36; Title 37 and Title 71, relative to children.
1546.description: As enacted, prohibits the department from requiring an individual or members of the individual's household to undergo an immunization as a condition of adopting or fostering unless the child is under 18 months of age or has significant documented medical needs that would necessitate the caregiver or members of the caregiver's household being immunized. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 36; Title 37 and Title 71.

1548.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 5, relative to the Professional Educators Collaborative Conferencing Act of 2011.
1548.description: As introduced, makes various procedural changes in the Professional Educators Collaborative Conferencing Act of 2011. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 5.

1549.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to employees.
1549.description: As introduced, deletes provision establishing that all persons employed in a position for which no teaching license is required are at-will employees of the director of schools; extends the due process protections provided to nontenured, licensed employees dismissed by the director of schools to all persons employed in a position for which no teaching license is required. - Amends TCA Title 49.

1550.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
1550.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 47, relative to protection of personal information.
1550.description: As introduced, reduces the number of days a business has to notify a consumer of a data breach involving the consumer's personal information from 45 days to 30 days. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 47.

1551.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
1551.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to fines.
1551.description: As introduced, allows a court to impose a payment plan for fines in equal installments or, at the request of the defendant, in graduated installments. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

1552.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
1552.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 10, relative to the Accountability and Engagement Through Transparency Act.
