2296.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 3, Part 3, relative to school personnel.
2296.description: As introduced, requires BEP funding formula to fund one full-time school social worker position for each 250 students or one full-time position for each LEA, whichever is greater. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 3, Part 3.

2297.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
2297.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 17, relative to hearing instrument specialists.
2297.description: As introduced, authorizes an individual without the educational equivalent of two years of accredited college coursework or NBC-HIS certification to apply for a hearing instrument specialist license if the individual has 10 years of experience working for an audiologist licensed in this state, with that experience being as an industrial hearing conservationist; a lab technician doing hearing aid repairs, hearing aid programming, loop installations, hearing aid analysis, and electronics repair; or other equivalent experience. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 17.

2298.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2298.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to certain sexual offenses committed against minors.
2298.description: As introduced, expands the offense of aggravated statutory rape to include when the victim is 13 or 14 years of age and the defendant is at least four years older; increases the penalty for such an offense from a Class D felony to a Class C felony; prohibits a court from granting judicial diversion for aggravated statutory rape. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

2300.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
2300.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 7-51-209, relative to infectious diseases.
2300.description: As introduced, entitles a law enforcement officer to certain disability benefits under circumstances in which the officer suffers a health condition or impairment as the result of exposure to and contraction of an infectious disease, including COVID-19. - Amends TCA Section 7-51-209.

2301.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
2301.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68 and Title 71, Chapter 5, relative to crossover claims.
2301.description: As introduced, requires the bureau to implement an electronic system that permits nursing facility providers to track the status of medicare crossover claims; establishes a process for a nursing facility to appeal the denial of such claim. - Amends TCA Title 68 and Title 71, Chapter 5.

2302.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 27, relative to insurance for county employees.
2302.description: As enacted, authorizes a county to pay to an employee up to 15 percent of the total premium that would have otherwise been paid by the county on behalf of the employee who opts out of the coverage provided by the county. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 27.

2303.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45, Chapter 13, Part 2, relative to working from remote locations.
2303.description: As enacted, specifies the conditions under which an employee of a licensed mortgage lender, mortgage loan broker, or mortgage loan servicer may perform licensable activities at an unlicensed or unregistered remote location. - Amends TCA Title 45, Chapter 13, Part 2.

2304.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4; Title 8 and Title 38, Chapter 6, relative to crimes related to elections.
2304.description: As introduced, requires the comptroller of the treasury, the director of the Tennessee bureau of investigation, and each district attorney general to designate personnel in their respective departments as election crime specialists; requires the coordinator of elections to provide annual training for election crime specialists and publish educational materials related to election crimes for use by local law enforcement agencies. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4; Title 8 and Title 38, Chapter 6.

2305.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to parole determinations.
2305.description: As enacted, enacts the "Joe Clyde Daniels Act" to require the board of parole, in making a parole determination for an offender convicted of a homicide, to consider whether the offender obstructed or continues to obstruct the ability of law enforcement to recover the remains of the victim. - Amends TCA Title 40.

2306.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Civil Justice Committee
2306.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 29; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 49; Title 55; Title 57; Title 62; Title 67 and Title 69, relative to youth involved in the justice system.
2306.description: As introduced, requires the administrative office of the courts, the department of children's services, and the commission on children and youth to jointly submit a report addressing statewide data collection in the juvenile justice system, on or before January 1, 2024, to the governor, speaker of the senate, and speaker of the house of representatives. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 29; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 41; Title 49; Title 55; Title 57; Title 62; Title 67 and Title 69.

2307.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 10-7-504, relative to confidential records.
2307.description: As enacted, adds to the provisions governing confidentiality of photographic evidence that depicts certain deceased persons. - Amends TCA Section 10-7-504.

2308.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to state government.
2308.description: As enacted, adds to the Eligibility Verification for Entitlements Act that a public benefit does not include a professional or commercial license for purposes of the citizenship verification requirement; specifies that to be eligible for a professional or commercial license, an applicant must show that the applicant is either a United States citizen or authorized under federal law to work in the United States as verified by the SAVE program. - Amends TCA Title 4.

2310.last_action: Failed for lack of second in: Business & Utilities Subcommittee
2310.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14 and Title 39, relative to COVID-19.
2310.description: As introduced, creates an offense of requiring another to receive a COVID-19 vaccination or provide proof of vaccination as condition of employment or in order to enter any building, facility, or property that is generally open to the public; permits such a requirement as a condition of entry into a hospital or other healthcare facility that is being used for treatment of a person at high risk of death from exposure to a communicable disease. - Amends TCA Title 14 and Title 39.

2311.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the general assembly.
2311.description: As enacted, requires an LEA or the department of education to provide testing materials or proposed testing materials in the LEA's or department's possession to a member of the general assembly upon the member's request to inspect and review the material; excludes certain materials. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2312.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
2312.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 49; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63; Title 64 and Title 65, relative to discrimination.
2312.description: As introduced, prohibits a person from requiring an individual, employee, or applicant for employment to complete or participate in training, orientation, or any other instructional or informational program that promotes certain discriminatory concepts. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 49; Title 50; Title 62; Title 63; Title 64 and Title 65.

2313.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 15, Part 4, relative to criminal law.
2313.description: As introduced, expands the offenses of child abuse, child neglect, child endangerment, aggravated child abuse, aggravated child neglect, and aggravated child endangerment to include acts of abuse, neglect, and endangerment against an unborn child; defines an unborn child as an individual living member of the species, homo sapiens, throughout the entire embryonic and fetal stages of the unborn child from fertilization to birth. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 15, Part 4.

2314.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7 and Title 65, relative to the Tennessee Natural Gas Innovation Act.
2314.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Natural Gas Innovation Act." - Amends TCA Title 7 and Title 65.

2316.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2316.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to transportation.
2316.description: As introduced, requires a county or municipality to publish its certified highway map on the county's or municipality's website, which must be accessible to the public, no less than 30 days prior to the date of a public hearing on the map. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 54; Title 55; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 67.

2317.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 21 and Title 55, Chapter 4, relative to license plates.
2317.description: As enacted, requires that the design of disabled license plates incorporate the color scheme, base design, and details used on the standard registration and license plate, to be effectuated upon the existing inventory of the registration and license plates being utilized. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 21 and Title 55, Chapter 4.

2318.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4 and Title 40, relative to certain drug offenses.
2318.description: As introduced, creates a rebuttable presumption that bail in the amount of at least $100,000 is necessary to reasonably assure the appearance of the defendant in court when the defendant is charged with the manufacture, delivery, or sale of a controlled substance or possession with intent to manufacture, deliver, or sell a controlled substance and the controlled substance involved is alleged to be fentanyl. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4 and Title 40.

2321.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2321.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-4-256, relative to disabled veterans.
2321.description: As introduced, authorizes issuance of a disabled veteran registration plate without payment of a fee to a veteran with a service-connected disability that is determined by the United States department of veterans affairs to be permanent and total due to individual unemployability. - Amends TCA Section 55-4-256.

2322.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2322.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 11, Part 6, relative to criminal law.
2322.description: As introduced, permits a private citizen to threaten to use deadly force in making an arrest without being subject to certain limitations. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 11, Part 6.

2323.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2323.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 54, Chapter 21, relative to advertising.
2323.description: As introduced, increases, from 15 to 20 days, the time within which the commissioner must notify an applicant for a vegetation control permit for outdoor advertising that the application received is incomplete or defective. - Amends TCA Title 54, Chapter 21.

2324.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2324.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 51, Part 10 and Title 65, Chapter 15, relative to the regulation of transportation services.
2324.description: As introduced, requires the department of transportation to report on or before January 1, 2023, to the transportation committee of the house of representatives and the transportation and safety committee of the senate on any recommendations for changes which would improve transportation services for passengers with disabilities. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 51, Part 10 and Title 65, Chapter 15.

2325.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2325.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 54-16-113; Title 55; Title 56 and Title 66, relative to towing of vehicles.
2325.description: As introduced, specifies that a digital authorization containing an electronic signature is acceptable for purposes of a towing firm obtaining the required written authorization from the owner of private property or the owner's authorized agent to tow a vehicle on the property. - Amends TCA Section 54-16-113; Title 55; Title 56 and Title 66.

2326.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2326.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 6, relative to disclosure of stored wire or electronic communications.
2326.description: As introduced, requires law enforcement, district attorneys, and the attorney general to obtain a warrant for disclosure of stored wire or electronic communications and related transactional records; removes a subpoena or other lawful process except a warrant as a process for obtaining disclosure of stored wire or electronic communications and transactional records. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 6.

2327.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
2327.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, Chapter 7; Section 54-1-128; Title 59 and Title 69, Chapter 3, Part 1, relative to reclamation plans for fill or borrow material from state highway construction projects.
2327.description: As introduced, exempts from local and regional zoning regulations, reclamation of a formerly operating borrow excavation, surface mining operation, or quarry that agrees to receive fill or borrow material from state road construction projects, if certain conditions are met. - Amends TCA Title 13, Chapter 7; Section 54-1-128; Title 59 and Title 69, Chapter 3, Part 1.

2328.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 6, relative to the Tennessee Personal and Commercial Computer Act of 2003.
2328.description: As enacted, classifies all misdemeanor offenses under the Tennessee Personal and Commercial Computer Act of 2003 as Class A misdemeanor offenses. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 6.

2329.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2329.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to handgun carry permits.
2329.description: As introduced, extends the validity of enhanced handgun carry permits from an eight-year period to the lifetime of the permit holder; permits a permit holder to submit a permit with an expiration date to the department of safety in order to receive a reissued permit without an expiration date. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2331.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Corrections Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2331.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 41, Chapter 2; Title 41, Chapter 3 and Title 41, Chapter 4, relative to inmate work release.
2331.description: As introduced, changes the requirement for public notice for the annual meeting of a county legislative body related to the county's work release program from at least 30 days prior to the meeting to at least 45 days prior. - Amends TCA Title 41, Chapter 2; Title 41, Chapter 3 and Title 41, Chapter 4.

2332.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to courts.
2332.description: As introduced, requires a court that refers a matter to a safe baby court program to do so within 30 days of the case coming before the referring court; requires that, if a matter is transferred to a safe baby court program, any permanency plan already in place must be scheduled for a review hearing by the court within 30 days of the transfer to a safe baby court. - Amends TCA Title 37.

2333.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2333.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 16; Title 24; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to domestic violence.
2333.description: As introduced, specifies that the domestic violence state coordinating council must submit its annual report by March 30 of each year. - Amends TCA Title 16; Title 24; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

2334.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33; Title 53; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to the prescribing of buprenorphine.
2334.description: As enacted, prohibits a healthcare provider who is authorized to prescribe buprenorphine under federal law from prescribing via telehealth a buprenorphine product, as approved by the federal food and drug administration for use in recovery or medication-assisted treatment, unless certain conditions met. - Amends TCA Title 33; Title 53; Title 63 and Title 68.

2337.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2337.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 55 and Title 68, relative to certain driving offenses.
2337.description: As introduced, adds an additional fine of $200 to speeding, driving under the influence, and reckless driving violations to cover funding for a system to compensate members of the emergency medical services transportation community for readiness and uncompensated trauma care. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 55 and Title 68.

2338.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2338.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 6 and Title 41, relative to wages and salaries of department of correction employees.
2338.description: As introduced, increases wages and salaries of preferred service employees of the department by 15 percent. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 6 and Title 41.

2339.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 9-4-610, relative to the interagency cash flow committee.
2339.description: As enacted, revises certain operations of the Tennessee interagency cash flow committee. - Amends TCA Section 9-4-610.

2340.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to human trafficking.
2340.description: As enacted, requires that each LEA employee who works directly with students in the LEA, instead of only teachers, be trained at least once every three years on the detection, intervention, prevention, and treatment of human trafficking in which the victim is a child. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2341.last_action: Assigned to s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
2341.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17, relative to the privilege tax imposed on persons engaged in certain occupations.
2341.description: As introduced, eliminates the professional privilege tax for tax years that begin on and after June 1, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 17.

2343.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee of Education Instruction
2343.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to educational opportunities.
2343.description: As introduced, requires each LEA to publish a link on the LEA's website to the course access catalog on the department of education's website. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2344.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
2344.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to open enrollment.
2344.description: As introduced, requires LEAs to allow nonresident students to enroll in a school in which spaces are available. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2345.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 64; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to utilities.
2345.description: As enacted, requires certain utilities to prepare and implement a cyber security plan to provide for the protection of the utility's facilities from unauthorized use, alteration, ransom, or destruction of electronic data and imposes certain requirements on the comptroller in regard to such plans; requires public utilities that provide electric, water, wastewater, or natural gas services to prepare and implement a cyber security plan and imposes certain requirements on the public utilities commission in regard to such plans. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 47, Chapter 18; Title 64; Title 65; Title 67 and Title 68.

2346.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, Chapter 5, relative to temporary healthcare staffing.
2346.description: As enacted, requires the comptroller of the treasury, in conjunction with the bureau of TennCare and the department of health, to study the use of temporary staffing provided by healthcare staffing agencies in long-term care facilities; requires that the study examine the effects that costs of temporary staffing have upon the TennCare program and upon assisted-care living facilities, and practices that may improve the quality of long-term care for residents while reducing costs to the TennCare program. - Amends TCA Title 71, Chapter 5.

2347.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33 and Title 68, relative to emergency services.
2347.description: As enacted, clarifies that an ambulance service that holds a valid and unencumbered license to operate in at least one county is not required to maintain a separate license or establish a base of operations in a county for which the ambulance service is not licensed in order to provide a secondary mental health transport to, from, or through that county. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33 and Title 68.

2348.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 5, relative to beer.
2348.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing the authority for certain manufacturers of beer to self-distribute the manufacturer's beer. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 5.

2349.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Civil Justice Subcommittee
2349.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 27; Title 39; Title 49 and Title 50, relative to appeals.
2349.description: As introduced, enacts the "Appellate Courts Improvements Act of 2022." - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 27; Title 39; Title 49 and Title 50.

2350.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
2350.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 56, relative to pharmacy services administrative organizations.
2350.description: As introduced, requires a pharmacy services administrative organization or similar entity that receives maximum allowable cost list or related information from a contracted pharmacy to destroy the shared information within five business days of receipt of a written request for destruction from the sharing pharmacy. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 56.

2351.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 35, Chapter 14 and Title 46, Chapter 1, Part 2, relative to cemeteries.
2351.description: As enacted, specifies that a trustee for an improvement care trust fund may establish a separate trust for each individual cemetery or cemetery company, or a master trust for multiple cemetery companies; specifies that a trustee for pre-need cemetery contracts may establish a separate trust fund for each contract, a single trust fund for all contracts written by an individual cemetery, or a single trust fund for all contracts written by multiple cemetery companies; makes other changes related to the establishment and management of an improvement care trust fund or a trust fund for a pre-need cemetery contract. - Amends TCA Title 35, Chapter 14 and Title 46, Chapter 1, Part 2.

2352.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 35 and Title 48, relative to trusts.
2352.description: As enacted, changes requirements for providing various types of notice concerning activities of fiduciaries; revises manner to authorize trustees and others to vote stock that is a trust asset; makes other changes concerning administration of trusts. - Amends TCA Title 35 and Title 48.

2353.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 6, Part 1; Title 37 and Section 39-13-306, relative to children.
2353.description: As enacted, enacts "Noah's Law," which allows a custodial parent, under certain circumstances, to seek an emergency court order declaring a child to be in imminent danger of serious bodily injury or death and ordering the noncustodial parent to return the child to the custodial parent immediately. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 6, Part 1; Title 37 and Section 39-13-306.

2354.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2354.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 16; Title 29, Chapter 32; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to bail.
2354.description: As introduced, establishes a registration program for the regulation and oversight of bail bondsmen by the department of commerce and insurance and makes various other related changes. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 16; Title 29, Chapter 32; Title 39 and Title 40.

2355.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6, Chapter 3, relative to term limits.
2355.description: As enacted, authorizes the board of mayor and alderman of a municipality incorporated under a mayor-aldermanic charter and having a population of 60,000 or more to adopt an ordinance to establish term limits, to become operative only if approved in a referendum. - Amends TCA Title 6, Chapter 3.

2356.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36, Chapter 4 and Title 36, Chapter 5, relative to domestic relations.
2356.description: As enacted, clarifies that the court must allocate responsibility for payment of marital debt in actions for divorce or legal separation; defines "marital debt" and "separate debt"; adds factors for the court to consider in determining the allocation of responsibility for payment of marital debt; clarifies alimony in solido may be awarded for attorney fees and expenses incurred in connection with the proceedings. - Amends TCA Title 36, Chapter 4 and Title 36, Chapter 5.

2357.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
2357.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 30; Title 31; Title 32; Title 34; Title 35 and Title 67, relative to estates.
2357.description: As introduced, clarifies that the right of election against the estate of a deceased spouse is not an asset of the estate of the surviving spouse; declares that the personal representative of a deceased surviving spouse is not liable to any person or entity with an interest in the estate of the surviving spouse for loss or damages resulting from the personal representative's discretion to exercise or not exercise the surviving spouse's right to elect against the deceased spouse's estate; makes various other clarifications regarding the death of a surviving spouse before the time for electing the elective share expires. - Amends TCA Title 30; Title 31; Title 32; Title 34; Title 35 and Title 67.

2358.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 34; Title 35 and Title 67, relative to fiduciaries.
2358.description: As enacted, specifies that confidential medical information must not be disclosed in the accounting statement of a fiduciary when the fiduciary advises the court whether or not the condition of the respondent continues to require the fiduciary's services. - Amends TCA Title 34; Title 35 and Title 67.

2360.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2360.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to marinas.
2360.description: As introduced, decreases, from 90 to 75 days, the time within which a boat dock or marina operator who is convicted of or pleads guilty to an offense of failing to comply with marina safety requirements has to come into compliance with such requirements before the state fire marshal declares that the boat dock or marina where the violation occurred is a threat to public safety and orders closure of such boat dock or marina until it complies with the requirements. - Amends TCA Title 68.

2362.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2362.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 8; Title 33; Title 50 and Title 56, relative to employees.
2362.description: As introduced, removes the requirement that the department report, on or before January 1, 2014, to the commerce and labor committee of the senate and the business and utilities committee of the house of representatives concerning findings and recommendations concerning the Tennessee works pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 8; Title 33; Title 50 and Title 56.

2363.last_action: Assigned to s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee
2363.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 13, Chapter 4, relative to municipal planning.
2363.description: As introduced, authorizes the legislative body of a municipality to designate a committee of the legislative body as the planning commission. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 13, Chapter 4.

2364.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2364.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-7-119, relative to tuition discounts.
2364.description: As introduced, extends the 25 percent tuition discount at state institutions of higher education for children under 24 years of age whose parents are full-time certified teachers in any Tennessee public school to children under 24 years of age whose parents are full-time educational employees in any Tennessee public school. - Amends TCA Section 49-7-119.

2365.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 15; Title 43, Chapter 27 and Title 67, relative to products and materials containing cannabinoids.
2365.description: As introduced, prohibits the sale, purchase, or possession of products containing intoxicating cannabinoids derived from hemp to and by persons who are under 21 years of age; requires retailers and wholesalers of products containing hemp-derived cannabinoids to be licensed; levies privilege tax at rate of 6.6 percent on wholesale sale of products containing hemp-derived cannabinoids. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 15; Title 43, Chapter 27 and Title 67.

2366.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 16; Title 40 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 6, relative to notification systems.
2366.description: As enacted, requires the Tennessee sheriffs' association to provide a criminal proceedings notification system, as a three-year pilot program that will begin July 1, 2022, and end June 30, 2025, for the purpose of increasing the transparency and efficiency of the criminal justice process by providing timely information about each stage of the criminal process to interested parties; requires that the criminal proceedings notification system be available 24 hours a day over the telephone, through the internet, or by email. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 16; Title 40 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 6.

2367.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2367.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 58, relative to weapons.
2367.description: As introduced, changes from January 1 to January 15, the date by which the department of safety must annually report to each member of the general assembly a statistical report for the preceding calendar year that includes the number of handgun permits issued, denied, revoked, or suspended by the department; the cost of the program; the revenues derived from fees; the number of violations of the enhanced handgun carry permit law; and the average time for issuance of an enhanced handgun carry permit. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 58.

2369.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 13, relative to registers' official seals.
2369.description: As enacted, removes requirement that the official seal of a county register emboss on paper. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 13.

2370.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
2370.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 49; Title 63 and Title 71, relative to child abuse.
2370.description: As introduced, reduces, from no later than 60 days to no later than 50 days, the time after receiving an initial report of child abuse or child sexual abuse within which the department of children's services or child protective investigation team must determine whether the reported abuse was indicated or unfounded and report the findings to the department's abuse registry. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 33; Title 37; Title 39; Title 49; Title 63 and Title 71.

2371.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2371.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 56 and Title 66, relative to homeowners' associations.
2371.description: As introduced, increases time, from 30 business days to 45 business days, within which a business entity that owns residential property must send notice to a homeowners' association that there has been a change in contact information or transfer of ownership of the property. - Amends TCA Title 13; Title 45; Title 47; Title 48; Title 56 and Title 66.

2372.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2372.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 14; Title 38; Title 39; Title 41; Title 49; Title 55; Title 59; Title 65; Title 68; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to safety.
2372.description: As introduced, reduces from 14 to 10 days the period by which a building inspector or representative from a county health department must inspect the rented premises of a tenant who files a complaint that such premises are unfit for human habitation. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 14; Title 38; Title 39; Title 41; Title 49; Title 55; Title 59; Title 65; Title 68; Title 69 and Title 70.

2373.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2373.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 6; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to transportation.
2373.description: As introduced, changes, from 10 days to 15 days, the time in which the department must provide notice to an owner of a personal property encroachment on a highway right-of-way after the removal of such encroachment. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 6; Title 7; Title 54; Title 55; Title 56; Title 65 and Title 67.

2375.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 33, relative to the department of mental health and substance abuse services.
2375.description: As enacted, requires, beginning in 2024, the department to submit to the members of the general assembly, by February 15 of each year, a report of data collected related to the use of medication-assisted treatment for opiate addiction by department-funded providers in this state for the prior fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 33.

2376.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in K-12 Subcommittee
2376.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to the Job Training for High School Students Act.
2376.description: As introduced, enacts the "Job Training for High School Students Act," which requires the department to establish and implement a five-year pilot program that simultaneously addresses the state's unemployment rate and the state's high school dropout rate by enabling students enrolled in a high school to achieve academic, career, personal, and social success. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2377.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to taxation of computer software services.
2377.description: As enacted, exempts from sales and use tax certain use and services in regard to computer software. - Amends TCA Title 67.

2378.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2378.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 49; Title 39; Title 57 and Title 67, relative to sports gaming.
2378.description: As introduced, permits a licensee subject to an administrative investigation or hearing by the sports wagering advisory council to be represented by an attorney for the duration of the investigation or hearing. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 49; Title 39; Title 57 and Title 67.

2379.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7; Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 65, relative to passenger rail transportation.
2379.description: As enacted, requires TACIR to conduct a study and make recommendations regarding the potential for passenger rail service linking the major cities in each of the grand divisions of the state. - Amends TCA Title 7; Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 65.

2380.last_action: Failed in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
2380.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 14; Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 16 and Title 68, Chapter 211, relative to tires.
2380.description: As introduced, requires a person to obtain a permit to haul waste tires in this state, subject to certain exceptions; applies pre-disposal fee to used tires; makes other additions to law concerning tires. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 14; Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 16 and Title 68, Chapter 211.

2381.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37, relative to the payment of retirement service credit.
2381.description: As enacted, establishes a reserve account in the retirement system for the payment of state liabilities, and the interest that would have been earned thereon, resulting from military service credit established pursuant to existing law provisions. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37.

2382.last_action: Assigned to s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee
2382.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5, relative to county legislative bodies.
2382.description: As introduced, specifies that a new member of a county legislative body who completes orientation training is not required to complete continuing education training in the same year. - Amends TCA Title 5.

2383.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 8-25-115, relative to a length of service award program.
2383.description: As enacted, authorizes the state treasurer to develop, implement, and administer a program to award grants to eligible employers for the purpose of funding of a length of service award program. - Amends TCA Section 8-25-115.

2384.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 12-3-1209, relative to public contracts.
2384.description: As enacted, requires contracts procured by local governments and similar entities for services provided by an insurance producer to be procured on the basis of competence and integrity rather than by competitive bidding. - Amends TCA Section 12-3-1209.

2387.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6, Chapter 31, Part 3 and Title 49, relative to local school board members.
2387.description: As introduced, broadens, from only Madison County to statewide, the authority to recall a local board of education member. - Amends TCA Title 6, Chapter 31, Part 3 and Title 49.

2388.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2388.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 45; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 62, relative to the business of brokering.
2388.description: As introduced, requires persons engaged in the business of brokering to prominently display in the broker's principal place of business any licenses or registrations held by the broker. - Amends TCA Title 45; Title 47; Title 48 and Title 62.

2389.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2389.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 33; Title 39; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to mental health.
2389.description: As introduced, requires a healthcare provider to enter a threat or attempt at suicide or infliction of bodily harm into the patient's medical record within 12 hours of learning of the threat or attempt. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 33; Title 39; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2390.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2390.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7 and Title 65, relative to advanced broadband services.
2390.description: As introduced, requires certain persons holding a franchise, and certificated providers electing market regulation, to file a map or other information indicating the specific locations where the person or provider offered advanced broadband internet service as of January 1, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 7 and Title 65.

2391.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 8, relative to local government.
2391.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing "base tax revenues" under the Convention Center and Tourism Development Financing Act of 1998. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 8.

2393.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
2393.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 50, relative to driver license examinations.
2393.description: As introduced, requires that examinations administered to applicants for a driver license or intermediate driver license must include the online or on-site viewing of a training video of at least one hour in length that covers, in substantially equal lengths of time, the topics of domestic violence, human trafficking, and driving under the influence; requires the department of safety to develop the training video and certificate of completion. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 50.

2394.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2394.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to obstruction of access to schools.
2394.description: As introduced, increases the penalty, from a Class A misdemeanor to a Class E felony, for obstructing public school property during regular school hours. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2395.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2395.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 50, relative to occupational safety.
2395.description: As introduced, increases civil and criminal penalties for violations of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1972. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 50.

2396.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2396.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12 and Title 47, relative to contracts.
2396.description: As introduced, requires that certain products used in the fulfillment of a contract with a public agency of the state be manufactured in the United States. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12 and Title 47.

2397.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2397.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 50, Chapter 2, Part 1, relative to wages.
2397.description: As introduced, requires an employer that employs 50 or more employees within the state to include a salary or hourly wage range in an advertisement for a job, promotion, or transfer opportunity advertised within the state. - Amends TCA Title 50, Chapter 2, Part 1.

2398.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee of Education Instruction
2398.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 13, relative to compensation of charter school staff.
2398.description: As introduced, requires a charter school's governing body to submit the proposed compensation of a member of its licensed administrative or supervisory staff to its authorizer for approval if the proposed compensation exceeds 150 percent of the average statewide compensation of LEA licensed administrative and supervisory staff according to the position and the training and experience compiled for each school year by the comptroller. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 13.

2400.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 3; Title 17, Chapter 5 and Title 50, Chapter 6, Part 2, relative to the board of judicial conduct.
2400.description: As enacted, makes various changes to the board of judicial conduct. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 3; Title 17, Chapter 5 and Title 50, Chapter 6, Part 2.

2401.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
2401.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 67, relative to the use of permeable materials in highway and other public improvement projects.
2401.description: As introduced, provides a business tax deduction for a private developer that uses only permeable concrete in industrial and commercial areas for parking lots; deduction is 3 percent on the amount of business taxes paid by the developer during each business tax period; makes other revisions related to the use of permeable pavement and materials. - Amends TCA Title 9; Title 54; Title 55 and Title 67.

2402.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
2402.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, relative to the transfer of real property.
2402.description: As introduced, requires the seller of a residential property to disclose, before sale of the property, if the maintenance of the road, water pumping station, or sewer pumping station is the sole responsibility of the owner of the property. - Amends TCA Title 66.

2405.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2405.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 59, Part 3, relative to video service.
2405.description: As introduced, increases the amount of time a cable franchisee has to notify the governing authority of the affected local government of a transfer in a cable franchise from at least 10 to seven days prior to the consummation of the transfer. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 59, Part 3.

2407.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
2407.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to teacher discipline.
2407.description: As introduced, prohibits a teacher from being disciplined or having remedial actions taken against the teacher if the teacher is teaching to Tennessee academic standards or using state- or LEA-approved instructional materials as part of a course of instruction, curriculum, or instructional program. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

2408.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2408.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 27 and Title 49, relative to insurance for local education employees.
2408.description: As introduced, requires an LEA to notify the LEA's new employees of the health plan offered to the employees. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 27 and Title 49.

2409.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2409.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 11; Title 12 and Title 70, relative to wildlife resources.
2409.description: As introduced, extends from 90 to 120 days the period after the close of a fiscal year within which nonprofit partners with which the wildlife resources agency enters into partnership agreements to promote and support the goals and objectives of the agency must provide a report setting forth the partner’s operation and accomplishments to the governor, the speakers of the senate and house of representatives, and the chair of the Tennessee fish and wildlife commission. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 11; Title 12 and Title 70.

2410.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
2410.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 12; Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70, relative to disposition of property.
2410.description: As introduced, adds a notice requirement that sales of property forfeited under the fish and wildlife or boating laws, and sales of interests in energy-related resources by or on behalf of the commission or the wildlife resources agency be continuously publicly advertised on the department of general service's website for the 90-day period immediately preceding the date of the sale; makes certain requirements for sales of state property applicable to TWRA surplus; redirects revenue from surplus and forfeiture sales from wildlife fund to general fund. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 12; Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70.

2411.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2411.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 33; Title 39 and Title 71, relative to programs for the homeless.
2411.description: As introduced, directs the Tennessee advisory commission on intergovernmental relations to perform a study of current programs in this state related to services provided to homeless persons for shelter, mental health, and safety, and to prepare a report comparing those programs and designating those programs with the highest success rate of helping individuals find employment and permanent shelter, to be submitted by January 1, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 33; Title 39 and Title 71.

2412.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
2412.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 20; Title 29; Title 39; Title 54; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to railroads.
2412.description: As introduced, requires the department of transportation to provide assistance to certain municipalities in obtaining federal funds for projects regarding areas impacted by blocked crossings; requires the department to designate certain roads as part of highway plan and to eliminate grade crossing on those roads; increases proportionate costs of railroad companies in relation to such closures; creates rebuttable presumption of negligent acts in certain civil and criminal actions regarding blocked crossings. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 20; Title 29; Title 39; Title 54; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 67.

2414.last_action: Rec. for pass. if am., ref. to Calendar & Rules Committee
2414.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 39, Chapter 17, relative to criminal acts.
2414.description: As introduced, adds a mandatory minimum fine of $1,000 for the offense of harassment; adds a mandatory minimum fine of $2,000 for the offense of stalking; adds a mandatory minimum fine of $2,500 for the offense of aggravated stalking; requires a court to order a child adjudicated delinquent for an act that, if committed by an adult, would constitute the offense of harassment, stalking, or aggravated stalking to perform 12 hours of community service and allows the court to order up to 40 hours of community service for a second or subsequent adjudication of delinquent for such act. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 39, Chapter 17.

2415.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to abortion.
2415.description: As enacted, enacts the "Tennessee Abortion-Inducing Drug Risk Protocol Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 53; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2416.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
2416.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9 and Title 49, relative to higher education.
2416.description: As introduced, prohibits employees of, and courses of instruction or units of study at, public institutions of higher education from compelling or addressing certain tenets; creates a cause of action and loss of state funding for violations. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9 and Title 49.

2417.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Civil Justice Committee
2417.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 32, relative to probate of a will as a muniment of title.
2417.description: As introduced, revises the process through which the will of a deceased person may be admitted to probate for the limited purpose of serving as a muniment of title to real or personal property of the deceased person; requires all beneficiaries named in the will and all heirs-at-law to be identified in the petition for muniment of title and be mailed a copy of the petition. - Amends TCA Title 32.

2418.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2418.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 4, relative to alcoholic beverages.
2418.description: As introduced, requires a liquor-by-the-drink licensee closing a licensed establishment to provide written notice to the alcoholic beverage commission 14 days rather than 10 days in advance of selling or transferring the licensee's inventory to another licensee. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 4.

2419.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 2, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 7; Title 4 and Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to fiscal notes.
2419.description: As introduced, clarifies that representatives of executive departments and other witnesses affected by a resolution, in addition to a bill, may be invited to present testimony to the fiscal review committee during the fiscal review committee staff's annual presentation of its review of the cumulative fiscal note. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 2, Part 1; Title 3, Chapter 7; Title 4 and Title 9, Chapter 4.

2420.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2420.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 4-29-248; Section 4-3-1016; Section 12-3-312; Section 45-12-126; Section 49-1-302; Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 17 and Section 49-7-812, relative to financial literacy.
2420.description: As introduced, establishes deadline of February 1 for the Tennessee financial literacy commission to submit its annual report concerning its activities during the preceding year to the general assembly. - Amends TCA Section 4-29-248; Section 4-3-1016; Section 12-3-312; Section 45-12-126; Section 49-1-302; Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 17 and Section 49-7-812.

2421.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2421.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 49, relative to school security.
2421.description: As introduced, increases, from five years to seven years, the amount of time that schools must maintain records of armed intruder drills conducted to comply with the SAVE Act. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 49.

2422.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
2422.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 3; Title 14; Title 29, Chapter 34; Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 1, relative to civil liability related to COVID-19.
2422.description: As introduced, specifies that a verified complaint alleging loss, damage, injury, or death arising from a COVID-19 infection must include the date and location of the defendant's alleged gross negligence or willful misconduct. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 3; Title 14; Title 29, Chapter 34; Title 29, Chapter 20 and Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 1.

2423.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to littering.
2423.description: As enacted, increases the penalty for mitigated criminal littering from a Class C misdemeanor punishable by a $50 fine to a Class B misdemeanor punishable by a $500 fine. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2425.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to public funds.
2425.description: As enacted, authorizes the collateral pool board to make temporary changes to the required collateral and collateral pledge levels contained in the board's rules, including the qualitative and quantitative standards for determining collateral pledge levels and the admission criteria; makes other related revisions. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 4.

2427.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2427.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to the "Tennessee Earning Safe Reentry Through Work Act."
2427.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Earning Safe Reentry Through Work Act," which makes various changes to probation and parole, including creating a work for time credit program. - Amends TCA Title 40.

2429.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to local education agencies.
2429.description: As enacted, prohibits a county LEA from operating a school within the geographic boundaries of a municipal LEA, except under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2430.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2430.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3, relative to the state board of equalization.
2430.description: As introduced, adds the chairs of the government operations committees of the senate and the house of representatives to the state board of equalization. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 4, Chapter 3.

2431.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2431.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 4, relative to alternative facilities.
2431.description: As introduced, authorizes the sheriff or chief administrative officer of a local jail or workhouse to use alternative facilities for the incarceration of an offender convicted of driving under the influence regardless of whether the local jail or workhouse has space available. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 10, Part 4.

2433.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
2433.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13; Title 56; Title 62; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to the rental of property.
2433.description: As introduced, on or after July 1, 2022, redefines "bed and breakfast establishment" to include a single condominium for purposes of the Bed and Breakfast Establishment Inspection Act of 1990. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 13; Title 56; Title 62; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68.

2434.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, relative to compensation for the diminution in value of private property.
2434.description: As introduced, provides a method for a property owner to seek just compensation for a diminution of value of the property caused by the enactment or enforcement of land use regulations on the property. - Amends TCA Title 29.

2435.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to the Tennessee Promise scholarship.
2435.description: As enacted, specifies that a student who graduates early from an eligible high school, or who completes high school at an eligible home school early, or who obtains an equivalency diploma before the spring semester immediately preceding the student's initial fall enrollment, and is admitted to, and enrolled full time in, an eligible postsecondary program, is eligible for the Tennessee promise scholarship. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4.

2436.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2436.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 1, relative to theft of property and services.
2436.description: As introduced, revises the amounts in the classification system for theft of property or services. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 14, Part 1.

2437.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Civil Justice Committee
2437.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 5; Section 47-18-5519(f)(2); Section 56-7-1206(h)(1); Section 60-1-607(c)(2) and Section 66-34-104(f), relative to arbitration.
2437.description: As introduced, makes various revisions to the Uniform Arbitration Act. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 5; Section 47-18-5519(f)(2); Section 56-7-1206(h)(1); Section 60-1-607(c)(2) and Section 66-34-104(f).

2438.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2438.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to burglary.
2438.description: As introduced, clarifies that the offense of burglary includes entering a building other than a habitation, or any portion of the building, not open to the public and committing or attempting to commit a felony, theft, or assault, while the same behavior in a habitation is aggravated burglary. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2439.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2439.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38 and Title 40, relative to diversion.
2439.description: As introduced, specifies that unpaid court costs do not preclude a dismissal upon successful completion of other terms and conditions of diversion. - Amends TCA Title 38 and Title 40.

2441.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, relative to employment as a law enforcement officer.
2441.description: As enacted, removes the requirement for employment as a police officer that a lawful permanent resident has been honorably discharged from the United States armed forces, so that any permanent legal resident of the United States who applies for or obtains United States citizenship within six years of the employment start date may be employed as a police officer. - Amends TCA Title 38.

2442.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29 and Title 66, relative to forcible entry and detainer.
2442.description: As enacted, requires a tenant to execute a bond, post a cash deposit or irrevocable letter of credit from a financial institution, or provide personal sureties with security in the amount of one-year's rent in all instances in which the defendant appeals a judgment rendered in favor of the landlord instead of only applying when the landlord's action was brought due to the tenant's failure to pay rent. - Amends TCA Title 29 and Title 66.

2443.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2443.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 16; Title 33; Title 36 and Title 40, relative to judicial commissioners.
2443.description: As introduced, extends from 30 to 45 days the period of public notice required for an annual public hearing to examine and evaluate the use of judicial commissioners in any county with a population greater than 700,000 and that appoints and makes use of judicial commissioners. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 16; Title 33; Title 36 and Title 40.

2444.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2444.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 39, relative to personal information of participants in a legal proceeding.
2444.description: As introduced, makes it unlawful to knowingly and intentionally, or recklessly, intimidate a participant in a legal proceeding by posting certain personal information on the internet. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5 and Title 39.

2445.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2445.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49 and Title 71, relative to programs for the care of children.
2445.description: As introduced, reduces from 30 to 21 days the period of time within which a child care agency, substitute pool, or staffing agency must report to the department of human services the occurrence of an employee leaving employment. - Amends TCA Title 49 and Title 71.

2446.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 6, relative to physician self-referral.
2446.description: As enacted, designates as exempt from the requirements of state law on physician self-referrals any conduct or activity that does not violate, or that is protected by, federal law or rule on physician self-referral. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 6.

2447.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 88, Part 1 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 30, relative to qualified public use facilities.
2447.description: As enacted, extends the applicability of the Local Tourism Development Zone Business Tax Act to a privately owned or operated museum principally dedicated to the preservation of cultural heritage, achievements, and contributions of minority artists, musicians, composers, or other fine arts practitioners located within Davidson County. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 88, Part 1 and Title 67, Chapter 4, Part 30.

2448.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-5-108, relative to licensure.
2448.description: As enacted, clarifies that an assistant principal license is included for purposes of issuing licenses based on reciprocal agreements with other states and to military spouses who are licensed in other states. - Amends TCA Section 49-5-108.

2450.last_action: Failed for lack of second in: Health Subcommittee
2450.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 14-4-103; Title 49 and Title 63, relative to parental rights.
2450.description: As introduced, enacts the "Parent Bill of Rights Act," which requires LEAs to permit parents to have access to certain information, including the names of instructors, titles available in the school library, teacher manuals, and curriculum; requires parents to provide written consent before a student can participate in any extracurricular activity, family life lesson, field trip, school assembly, or guest speaker event; prohibits certain healthcare practitioners from providing medical treatment to a minor without parental consent or an appropriate court order. - Amends TCA Section 14-4-103; Title 49 and Title 63.

2451.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Civil Justice Committee
2451.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 14; Title 39; Title 50; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to medical discrimination.
2451.description: As introduced, designates as an unlawful discriminatory practice certain actions taken by a person, public officer, public employee, governmental entity, employer, or place of public accommodation against an individual on the basis of the individual’s vaccination status, immunity status, or whether the person has an immunity passport; makes various other changes related to COVID-19. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 14; Title 39; Title 50; Title 63 and Title 68.

2452.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 37; Title 38 and Title 39, relative to the department of children's services.
2452.description: As introduced, requires the department to remove and destroy certain records of an investigation if the department investigates an individual and closes the case without finding probable cause to believe that a child in the individual's care was neglected or that the individual committed a criminal violation of title 39. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 37; Title 38 and Title 39.

2453.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 17 and Title 49, Chapter 1, relative to children.
2453.description: As enacted, redefines "obscene" to include material that has educational value; makes various changes to the internet acceptable use policy LEAs are required to adopt; enacts requirements governing providers of digital and online resources; enacts and revises other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 17 and Title 49, Chapter 1.

2454.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to occupational teaching licenses.
2454.description: As enacted, establishes qualifications necessary to receive an occupational teaching license. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2455.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
2455.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 56 and Title 71, relative to reference-based health insurance pricing.
2455.description: As introduced, directs the Tennessee advisory commission on intergovernmental relations to perform a study of the effects on health insurance prices when reference-based pricing is used. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 56 and Title 71.

2456.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12; Title 39; Title 40; Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70, relative to seizure of personal property.
2456.description: As enacted, revises the provisions governing property used in violation of certain hunting laws. - Amends TCA Title 12; Title 39; Title 40; Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70.

2457.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to the Tennessee Medical Cannabis Act.
2457.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Medical Cannabis Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 4; Title 67 and Title 68.

2458.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13, relative to unlawful photography.
2458.description: As enacted, expands the offense of unlawful photography to include the photographing of an individual without the consent of the individual, if the photograph includes the unclothed intimate area of the individual and would be considered offensive or embarrassing by the individual; was taken for the purpose of offending, intimidating, embarrassing, ridiculing, or harassing the victim; and was disseminated by the defendant to any other person or the defendant threatened to disseminate, or permitted the dissemination of, the photograph. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13.

2459.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Calendar & Rules Committee
2459.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to testing.
2459.description: As introduced, prohibits the commissioner from establishing a schedule for the administration of TCAP tests that requires the administration of a TCAP test more than 20 days before the end of the school year, as provided in the school calendar adopted by the local board of education or public charter school governing body; requires the department to provide an LEA with the individual student performance level ratings from TCAP tests administered to the LEA's students no later than 10 business days after the close of the testing schedule established by the commissioner. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2460.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to assessments.
2460.description: As enacted, authorizes the administration of TCAP tests to students in a timed format and requires the department of education to establish the required time limit for each TCAP test and an optional additional time period that may be added to the required time limit for each test if requested by a student. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

2462.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 50-6-405, relative to annual certified financial statements filed by employers.
2462.description: As enacted, extends the deadline, from the last day of the sixth month following the end of the fiscal year to the last day of the ninth month, for an employer to file an annual certified financial statement with the department of commerce and insurance for purposes of showing the employer's ability to pay all workers compensation claims that may arise against the employer. - Amends TCA Section 50-6-405.

2463.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2463.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to insurance.
2463.description: As introduced, removes provision requiring the commissioner to conduct a study due no later than March 1, 2012. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 56; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2464.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, Chapter 1 and Title 68, relative to the use of opioid antagonists for drug-related overdoses.
2464.description: As enacted, authorizes a healthcare prescriber to prescribe an opioid antagonist for purposes related to the potential for drug-related overdose, not just opioid-related overdose; permits certain government and non-governmental entities to prescribe and store an opioid antagonist for the purpose of providing the antagonist to a person at-risk of overdose or likely to assist a person experiencing overdose; makes various other changes regarding prescribing and usage of opioid antagonists. - Amends TCA Title 63, Chapter 1 and Title 68.

2465.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
2465.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9, Chapter 3 and Title 71, relative to local government finances.
2465.description: As introduced, prohibits a local government from providing monetary assistance to an elective abortion provider. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9, Chapter 3 and Title 71.

2466.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 8, Chapter 11; Title 66 and Title 67, relative to property taxes.
2466.description: As enacted, authorizes country trustees to accept prepayments of property taxes. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 8, Chapter 11; Title 66 and Title 67.

2468.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Insurance Subcommittee of Insurance Committee
2468.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 71, relative to TennCare.
2468.description: As introduced, changes, from October 1 to September 1, the date upon which the TennCare foundation must report in writing to the governor, the health and welfare committee and commerce and labor committee of the senate, and the health committee and insurance committee of the house of representatives regarding how funds allocated to the foundation were spent during the previous fiscal year. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 71.

2469.last_action: Failed in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2469.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 50, relative to retirement.
2469.description: As introduced, authorizes the board of trustees for the Tennessee consolidated retirement system to electronically provide to its members the annual report showing the fiscal transactions of the retirement system. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9 and Title 50.

2470.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to the board of physician assistants.
2470.description: As introduced, authorizes the board of physician assistants to allow board members to participate in a meeting by, and the board to conduct a meeting through the use of, any means of remote communication; clarifies that a board member who participates in a meeting by remote communication is deemed to be physically present at the meeting. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2471.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 3-17-102, relative to charitable gaming.
2471.description: As enacted, reduces to three years the period of time that a 501(c)(3) or 501(c)(19) nonprofit organization has to be in continuous and active existence in this state to qualify to operate a charitable gaming event in this state. - Amends TCA Section 3-17-102.

2472.last_action: Failed in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2472.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 29; Title 39; Title 58 and Title 63, relative to emergency responses.
2472.description: As introduced, requires emergency communications districts (ECDs) to utilize the direct dispatch method in response to emergency 911 calls and one of three methods in response to non-emergency calls; requires that all emergency 911 calls, with the exception of misrouted calls, be dispatched without being transferred; authorizes ECDs to transfer non-emergency calls at the discretion of the dispatcher via attended transfer; adds emergency call takers and public safety dispatchers and emergency services personnel to definition of first responder for certain purposes. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 29; Title 39; Title 58 and Title 63.

2473.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
2473.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 65 and Title 67, relative to telecommunications.
2473.description: As introduced, enacts the "Broadband Resiliency, Public Safety, and Quality Act." - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 9; Title 65 and Title 67.

2474.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
2474.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12, Chapter 2; Title 39 and Title 70, relative to Tennessee wildlife resources agency employees.
2474.description: As introduced, prohibits employees of the Tennessee wildlife resources agency from purchasing surplus property from the agency; restricts employees' immediate family members and other persons who attempt to purchase such property on the employees' behalf; increases notice requirement for the sale of such surplus property prior to disposal. - Amends TCA Title 12, Chapter 2; Title 39 and Title 70.

2475.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2475.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 69, relative to water.
