2672.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to anti-Semitism in education.
2672.description: As enacted, establishes certain requirements to be followed if a state governmental entity or an LEA receives a complaint from a person who alleges that antisemitism has occurred on the premises of a public school serving any of the grades K-12, or through electronic outreach from a public school serving any of the grades K-12. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2673.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 7 and Title 9, Chapter 4, relative to corrections.
2673.description: As enacted, revises provisions governing appropriations for certain laws that result in a net increase in periods of imprisonment in state facilities. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 7 and Title 9, Chapter 4.

2674.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2 and Title 3, relative to general assembly members.
2674.description: As enacted, allows a member of the general assembly to use campaign account funds for lodging expenses if the member is not otherwise eligible for reimbursement or the reimbursement does not cover the total amount of the expense and for mileage reimbursement above the amount reimbursed by the state. - Amends TCA Title 2 and Title 3.

2675.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 49, relative to procurement.
2675.description: As enacted, requires, for each emergency purchase the central procurement office approves, the reporting of certain information, as specified in this amendment, to the fiscal review committee within 30 days of the approval; creates certain exemptions. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 12 and Title 49.

2676.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 39 and Title 50, relative to public servants.
2676.description: As enacted, creates a Class E felony of an employer influencing or attempting to influence an employee who is a public servant to vote or not to vote in a particular manner or to resign as a public servant or unnecessarily recuse themselves from a public body with the intent to influence the action or inaction of a public body; creates a cause of action for unlawful discharge of an employee who is a public servant. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 39 and Title 50.

2678.last_action: Assigned to s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee
2678.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Section 39-17-501, relative to sports gaming.
2678.description: As introduced, corrects references to the Tennessee Sports Gaming Act. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Section 39-17-501.

2681.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 1-3-116, relative to the census.
2681.description: As enacted, removes an obsolete reference in the provision regarding the use of census information to create the population figures contained in Tennessee Code Annotated; adds reference to 2020 census publication information. - Amends TCA Section 1-3-116.

2682.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 36, relative to early service retirement for emergency communications personnel.
2682.description: As enacted, makes emergency communications personnel eligible for early service retirement when the employing entity has elected to offer this benefit; requires the employing entity to be responsible for 100 percent of any increased cost necessary to provide this benefit to the emergency communications personnel. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 36.

2683.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Transportation Subcommittee of Transportation Committee
2683.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55 and Title 62, relative to catalytic converters.
2683.description: As introduced, increases from three years to four years the amount of time a scrap metal dealer must maintain a thumb or fingerprint impression taken from a person proposing to sell scrap metal. - Amends TCA Title 55 and Title 62.

2685.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
2685.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8 and Title 37, relative to children.
2685.description: As introduced, prohibits the department from collecting or expending moneys that are received as survivor benefits, disability benefits, or otherwise from the social security administration on behalf of a child in the custody of the department; requires the department to receive and hold such moneys in a trust for the child to be released to the child without condition upon the child's eighteenth birthday; requires the trust to be maintained by the state treasurer. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8 and Title 37.

2686.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2686.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to pre-kindergarten.
2686.description: As introduced, increases, from 180 to 190 days, the period of time during which a family of a prisoner of war or veteran missing in action may provide official documentation from the United States government to the department of education to prove that a child qualifies for access to pre-kindergarten in Tennessee. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2687.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2687.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to intimidation of participants in legal proceedings.
2687.description: As introduced, makes it a Class D felony to engage in certain criminal acts for purposes of intimidating a person involved in an existing or anticipated legal proceeding. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2690.last_action: Failed for lack of second in: Health Subcommittee
2690.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29, Chapter 8; Title 37 and Title 68, Chapter 3, relative to vital records.
2690.description: As introduced, allows amendments of birth certificates to reflect the individual's gender identity. - Amends TCA Title 29, Chapter 8; Title 37 and Title 68, Chapter 3.

2691.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2691.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 67, relative to franchise and excise taxes.
2691.description: As introduced, deletes the deadline of September 1, 1999, for the filing of a registration information form with the department of revenue by persons first becoming subject to franchise and excise taxes after July 1, 1999. - Amends TCA Title 67.

2693.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9; Title 12, Chapter 3 and Title 12, Chapter 4, relative to state contracts.
2693.description: As enacted, requires the office of diversity business enterprises to publish an annual report on its website listing each state department’s aspirational goals and achievements for businesses owned by minorities, women, persons with disabilities, and service-disabled veterans, as well as other small businesses. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9; Title 12, Chapter 3 and Title 12, Chapter 4.

2694.last_action: Failed in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2694.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to domestic abuse.
2694.description: As introduced, creates a registry of persons convicted of certain crimes in which the victim of the offense is a domestic abuse victim; requires the Tennessee bureau of investigation to maintain the registry based upon information provided by the court clerk. - Amends TCA Title 36; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

2697.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Civil Justice Committee
2697.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 24, Chapter 7; Title 36 and Title 68, relative to tests to determine parentage.
2697.description: As introduced, clarifies that a party to a civil or criminal proceeding in which the paternity of a child is at issue may voluntarily seek a genetic test from an accredited laboratory before a court issues an order requiring the genetic test. - Amends TCA Title 24, Chapter 7; Title 36 and Title 68.

2700.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5, Chapter 1, Part 3; Title 16, Chapter 15; Title 40, Chapter 11 and Title 40, Chapter 1, relative to bail.
2700.description: As introduced, requires the clerk of each court of record with criminal jurisdiction to provide the administrative office of the courts with a list of professional bondsmen or other sureties approved and qualified as solvent to write bonds by the courts within the county; specifies that a bail hearing addressing conditions of release must be conducted within 48 hours of arrest; makes various other changes regarding bail hearings and continuing education requirements relative to bail and bounty hunters. - Amends TCA Title 5, Chapter 1, Part 3; Title 16, Chapter 15; Title 40, Chapter 11 and Title 40, Chapter 1.

2701.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, relative to foster care.
2701.description: As enacted, expands the information required to be provided in writing to foster parents by the department to include all information available to the department regarding the child's education status, mental health history and status, behavioral history, and physical disabilities. - Amends TCA Title 37.

2702.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 5, relative to educator licenses.
2702.description: As enacted, requires the department to design and adopt a certificate of licensure for issuance to educators who have met the requirements for licensure established by the state board of education; requires that the certificate of licensure present an educator's licensure information in a format suitable for framing. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1 and Title 49, Chapter 5.

2703.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
2703.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37, relative to retirement benefits.
2703.description: As introduced, clarifies that it is the responsibility of the member seeking to claim prior state service for retirement credit purposes to submit to the board of trustees of the Tennessee consolidated retirement system proper documentation as required by the board. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 34; Title 8, Chapter 35; Title 8, Chapter 36 and Title 8, Chapter 37.

2704.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 39, relative to the regulation of certain products by governmental entities.
2704.description: As enacted, authorizes local governments to regulate, including the prohibition of, smoking and the use of vapor products in age-restricted venues; defines the terms “age-restricted venue” and “retail tobacco store” for the purposes of the Prevention of Youth Access to Tobacco, Smoking Hemp, and Vapor Products Act; prohibits local governments from regulating smoking and the use of vapor products in retail vapor product stores and cigar bars; exempts cigar bars that limit access to patrons 21 years of age or older from the prohibition on smoking in enclosed places. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7 and Title 39.

2705.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 1 and Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 4, relative to claims administration.
2705.description: As enacted, requires the state treasurer, in conjunction with the commissioner of transportation, to develop, implement, and administer a centralized information system for the reporting of alleged dangerous conditions on state-maintained highways and the repair of such conditions. - Amends TCA Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 1 and Title 9, Chapter 8, Part 4.

2706.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2706.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to certain offenses committed against a law enforcement officer.
2706.description: As introduced, increases the penalty for aggravated assault committed against a law enforcement officer from a Class C felony to a Class B felony. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2708.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 1, relative to pre-kindergarten.
2708.description: As enacted, specifies who is eligible to attend a voluntary pre-kindergarten program; deletes the pilot pre-kindergarten program; requires that a voluntary pre-kindergarten program be designed to comprehensively address the educational needs of children who are not otherwise eligible for similar programs or who do not have access to a pre-kindergarten program; revises and enacts other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 1.

2709.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 13, relative to the Tennessee Veterans Education Transition Support Act.
2709.description: As enacted, authorizes the governing board for each public institution of higher education to classify a veteran or military-affiliated individual as a Tennessee resident for tuition purposes if the veteran or military-affliated individual is enrolled in the institution and resides outside of this state. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 7, Part 13.

2710.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to children.
2710.description: As enacted, revises various provisions governing child care agencies; enacts provisions governing nontraditional child care agencies. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 9; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 49; Title 50; Title 55; Title 67; Title 68 and Title 71.

2714.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2714.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 20; Title 33; Title 47; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to opioid treatment.
2714.description: As introduced, extends, from three years to five years, the period of time a nonresidential office-based opiate treatment facility must maintain billing records and bank deposits of cash payments for services. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 20; Title 33; Title 47; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2715.last_action: Rec. for pass; ref to Calendar & Rules Committee
2715.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to public records.
2715.description: As introduced, expands to all people, rather than just minors, the confidentiality protection pertaining to photographic evidence of a fatal motor vehicle accident. - Amends TCA Title 10, Chapter 7; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 55.

2716.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2716.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 8, Chapter 3 and Title 8, Chapter 4, relative to elections.
2716.description: As introduced, changes the deadline to file a notice as a write-in candidate from 50 days before an election to 40 days before an election. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 8, Chapter 3 and Title 8, Chapter 4.

2717.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2717.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6; Title 12; Title 66; Title 67, Chapter 5 and Title 132, relative to annexation.
2717.description: As introduced, increases the number of signatures required on a petition to request that a larger municipality annex a smaller municipality, from 20 percent of the qualified voters of the smaller municipality who voted in the last general election to 30 percent of the qualified voters of the smaller municipality who voted in the last general election. - Amends TCA Title 6; Title 12; Title 66; Title 67, Chapter 5 and Title 132.

2718.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2718.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 84, relative to special districts.
2718.description: As introduced, increases the frequency that an initiating petition or resolution can be accepted for purposes of establishing a central business improvement district, from every 12 months to every six months. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 84.

2719.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 15, Chapter 2, relative to Historically Black Colleges and Universities.
2719.description: As enacted, designates November 8 as "Historically Black Colleges and Universities Day." - Amends TCA Title 15, Chapter 2.

2720.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Local Government Committee
2720.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 50-3-109, relative to contracts.
2720.description: As introduced, clarifies that a city, county, or metropolitan government may sanction or debar a bidder or proposer of a bid, proposal, or agreement relating to an improvement of real property for fraud, collusion, other acts that threaten the integrity of the procurement process, or for a breach of contract. - Amends TCA Section 50-3-109.

2721.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2721.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 11 and Title 39, Chapter 13, relative to criminal justice.
2721.description: As introduced, deletes from the offense of a first degree murder the killing of another in the perpetration of or attempt to perpetrate any first degree murder, arson, rape, robbery, burglary, theft, kidnapping, aggravated abuse of an elderly or vulnerable adult, aggravated neglect of an elderly or vulnerable adult, aggravated child abuse, aggravated child neglect, rape of a child, aggravated rape of a child, or aircraft piracy; makes other changes regarding criminal responsibility. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 11 and Title 39, Chapter 13.

2722.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 14 and Title 50, relative to state employees.
2722.description: As introduced, grants state employees up to five days of leave to care for a minor child that is required to stay home as the result of a COVID-19 infection or school closure; prohibits counting such leave from against the employee's accumulated sick or annual leave. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 14 and Title 50.

2723.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 49 and Title 50, relative to firearms.
2723.description: As introduced, repeals the law that allows authorized persons to transport or store a firearm or firearm ammunition in the person's motor vehicle while on or utilizing a public or private parking area if the firearm or firearm ammunition is kept from ordinary observation. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 49 and Title 50.

2724.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 13, Chapter 7, Part 4, relative to historic zoning commission members.
2724.description: As enacted, authorizes the chief executive of a city or county, with the approval of the local legislative body, to fill a vacancy on a historic zoning commission until the expiration of the vacated member's term and to remove a member from the commission. - Amends TCA Title 13, Chapter 7, Part 4.

2725.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 41, relative to correctional officers.
2725.description: As introduced, clarifies that the Tennessee corrections institute provides basic training to state correctional officers. - Amends TCA Title 41.

2727.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 20; Title 21; Title 22; Title 24; Title 25; Title 26; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the judicial system.
2727.description: As enacted, classifies as state employees for purposes of defense and other related provisions, a contracted court reporter when the contracted court reporter is named in a civil action for damages alleging an act or omission by the contracted court reporter in the course of performing the contracted court reporter's official duties. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 16; Title 17; Title 18; Title 20; Title 21; Title 22; Title 24; Title 25; Title 26; Title 27; Title 28; Title 29; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

2728.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee
2728.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 38; Title 39; Title 49; Title 65 and Title 68, relative to emergency communications.
2728.description: As introduced, requires the emergency communications board to annually publish on its website its report to the governor and speakers of the general assembly on its activities for the preceding year; requires the board to include in its report any suggestions received from any source on amending the Emergency Communications District Law. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 38; Title 39; Title 49; Title 65 and Title 68.

2729.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 43; Title 49; Title 62 and Title 68, relative to crime on college campuses.
2729.description: As enacted, adds requirements to provisions governing the reporting of crime statistics by institutions of higher education. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40; Title 43; Title 49; Title 62 and Title 68.

2731.last_action: Assigned to s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee
2731.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 24, Part 2 and Section 38-8-111, relative to pay supplements for completing in-service training course.
2731.description: As introduced, increases the amount of the pay supplement to which police officers and employed firefighters and emergency medical technicians are entitled for completing an in-service training course from $800 to $5,000. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 24, Part 2 and Section 38-8-111.

2732.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 15; Title 50 and Title 58, relative to Veterans' Day.
2732.description: As enacted, requires an employer to allow a veteran employee to have the entirety of Veterans' Day as a non-paid holiday if certain conditions met; specifies that this act does not prohibit an employer from allowing the employer's veteran employees to have the entirety of Veterans Day as a paid holiday. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 15; Title 50 and Title 58.

2733.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in State Government Committee
2733.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8 and Title 50, relative to employment.
2733.description: As introduced, requires an employer to permit an employee who is a local elected official to leave work in order to perform the duties of the elected office; requires the employer to permit the employee to use the employee’s available paid time off for that purpose if the employee elects to do so; permits an employer to require the employee to submit a written statement from a local elections official to verify that the employee is a local elected official. - Amends TCA Title 8 and Title 50.

2734.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56 and Title 63, relative to telemedicine.
2734.description: As introduced, requires the department of health to study the utilization of provider-based telemedicine among persons over 65 years of age, with particular emphasis on usage among those persons who are unable to travel independently or who use telemedicine solely for the purpose of renewing prescriptions for life-sustaining medications; requires other departments to assist the department of health upon request; requires the department to report its findings to the health-related committees of the general assembly and the legislative librarian by December 15, 2022. - Amends TCA Title 56 and Title 63.

2735.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
2735.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13 and Title 68, relative to public contracts.
2735.description: As introduced, requires that public contracts to construct or substantially renovate a building include energy use objectives; establishes other requirements and guidelines for energy use objectives in certain public contracts. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 12; Title 13 and Title 68.

2737.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2737.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 14 and Title 58, relative to emergencies.
2737.description: As introduced, specifies that the agency's notification to the governor regarding compliance with provisions designating emergency services coordinators must be made at least annually. - Amends TCA Title 3; Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 14 and Title 58.

2738.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Higher Education Subcommittee of Education Administration
2738.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8 and Title 49, relative to financial aid.
2738.description: As introduced, changes the date by which THEC must report its findings concerning scholarship and grant programs to the general assembly from October 1 to October 30. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8 and Title 49.

2739.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 43; Title 44 and Title 53, relative to the location of agricultural operations.
2739.description: As introduced, categorizes the construction and operation of dairy creameries, milk bottling plants, and certain slaughterhouses as agriculture operations that are not subject to local zoning requirements when located on agricultural land. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 43; Title 44 and Title 53.

2740.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2740.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 56, relative to compensation and benefits for public employees.
2740.description: As introduced, changes, from December 15 to December 7, the date by which the commission on compensation is required to report to the governor and the general assembly, each year in which the commission is convened, the commission's recommendation concerning the compensation of the governor, commissioners, constitutional officers, legislators, and other officials. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 8; Title 9; Title 49 and Title 56.

2742.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 37, relative to investments.
2742.description: As enacted, authorizes the investment committee for the TCRS board of trustees to cause the retirement system to divest, as expeditiously as possible, from an investment the system has with an entity found to be doing business with or supporting a country sanctioned by the office of foreign assets control. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 37.

2743.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to medication.
2743.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Pharmacy Act." - Amends TCA Title 14; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2744.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to health care.
2744.description: As introduced, prohibits discrimination on the basis of a patient's COVID-19 vaccine status as it relates to organ transplants. - Amends TCA Title 14; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2745.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 14; Title 47; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to medication.
2745.description: As enacted, authorizes a pharmacist to provide ivermectin to a patient, who is 18 years of age or older, pursuant to a valid collaborative pharmacy practice agreement containing a non-patient-specific prescriptive order and standardized procedures developed and executed by one or more authorized prescribers; enacts other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 14; Title 47; Title 53; Title 63; Title 68 and Title 71.

2746.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2746.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, Chapter 18, relative to consumer protection.
2746.description: As introduced, requires an entity that offers the option to purchase a lifetime membership to send a minimum of three written late notices to the member for failure to pay a renewal fee before the lifetime membership may be canceled; specifies that failure of an entity to send such notices to the member before canceling the lifetime membership is an unfair or deceptive trade practice. - Amends TCA Title 47, Chapter 18.

2747.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Corrections Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2747.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37 and Title 41, relative to telephone services.
2747.description: As introduced, requires youth development centers, jails, and correctional facilities to provide telephone services to inmates and detainees using not less than two vendors. - Amends TCA Title 37 and Title 41.

2748.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
2748.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 13; Title 35; Title 45; Title 47 and Title 66, relative to property.
2748.description: As introduced, increases, from 30 to 35 days, the period of time after which a successor or remaining trustee must execute and record an instrument for real estate held as part of a trust if the resigning or removed trustee fails to do so during that period. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 13; Title 35; Title 45; Title 47 and Title 66.

2750.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2750.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to criminal offenses.
2750.description: As introduced, increases the penalty for aggravated assault when committed by discharging a firearm from within a motor vehicle; specifies that a person commits an offense of reckless driving who operates a vehicle within certain congested areas at a speed that is at least 20 mph above the speed limit, and while weaving between lanes while other vehicles share the lanes. - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13; Title 40 and Title 55.

2751.last_action: Def. to Summer Study in Transportation Subcommittee
2751.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 55-9-402 and Title 65, Chapter 15, relative to transportation network companies.
2751.description: As introduced, requires a driver for a transportation network company to maintain an illuminated sign, or a sticker in a standard position, on the driver's vehicle that clearly indicates that the vehicle is being used for prearranged rides for the company; creates a civil penalty for violation of the signage or sticker requirement. - Amends TCA Section 55-9-402 and Title 65, Chapter 15.

2752.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2752.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14; Title 49 and Title 68, relative to education.
2752.description: As introduced, specifies that the office of early learning's report regarding the status of pre-kindergarten programs must be submitted by July 1 of each year to the governor and general assembly. - Amends TCA Title 14; Title 49 and Title 68.

2755.last_action: Received from House, Passed on First Consideration
2755.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36 and Title 37, relative to proceedings in juvenile court.
2755.description: As introduced, requires a juvenile court to enter a scheduling order at an initial appearance after the filing of a petition or citation; requires that a matter filed in juvenile court be heard within six months unless waived by the responding party. - Amends TCA Title 36 and Title 37.

2757.last_action: Failed in s/c Children & Family Affairs Subcommittee of Civil Justice Committee
2757.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 36; Title 40 and Title 55, relative to child support.
2757.description: As introduced, removes driver licenses from the list of licenses that can be revoked for failure to pay child support; removes the requirement that a felon seeking to restore voting rights be current in child support payments. - Amends TCA Title 36; Title 40 and Title 55.

2758.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
2758.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 39; Title 57; Title 62; Title 68; Title 69 and Title 70, relative to the reduction of litter.
2758.description: As introduced, enacts the "Tennessee Cleaner Landscapes for the Economy, Agriculture, and Nature (CLEAN) Act" to create a commission that will develop and implement policies to reduce litter in Tennessee. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 39; Title 57; Title 62; Title 68; Title 69 and Title 70.

2759.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to student discipline.
2759.description: As enacted, enacts the "School Safety and Removal Act;" authorizes alternative schools and alternative programs to provide remote instruction to students attending the school or program. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2760.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 5; Title 6; Title 13; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to solar energy development.
2760.description: As enacted, directs TACIR to perform a study of the overall effect of utility scale solar energy development in this state. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 5; Title 6; Title 13; Title 65; Title 66; Title 67 and Title 68.

2761.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 14 and Title 8, Chapter 7, relative to the compensation of certain public employees.
2761.description: As enacted, revises the pay schedule in Tennessee Code Annotated for assistant district attorneys and assistant district public defenders. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 14 and Title 8, Chapter 7.

2762.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 25, relative to the Uniform Motor Vehicle Records Disclosure Act.
2762.description: As enacted, deletes certain exemptions to the prohibition on the department of motor vehicles knowingly disclosing or otherwise making available to any person or entity personal information about any person obtained by the department in connection with a motor vehicle record. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 25.

2763.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2, relative to the selection of candidates.
2763.description: As enacted, requires that a person meet the residency requirements for state senators and representatives contained in the Tennessee constitution in order to qualify as a candidate in a primary election for congress. - Amends TCA Title 2.

2764.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2764.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, Chapter 28, relative to grounds for parole.
2764.description: As introduced, specifies that the board of parole may consider the prisoner's good conduct or efficient performance of duties assigned to the prisoner in prison when determining whether parole should be granted. - Amends TCA Title 40, Chapter 28.

2765.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to early childhood education.
2765.description: As introduced, directs the department of education to review its strategic plans for the development of early childhood education programs in low income areas of this state to determine if there are areas of improvement to be made that need legislative action; requires the department to report its findings and recommendations to the general assembly no later than January 1, 2023. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2766.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Transportation Committee
2766.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 55, Chapter 4, relative to registration of motor vehicles.
2766.description: As introduced, removes the provision excluding the weight of a notice of a vehicle emissions testing requirement from the calculation of the total postal weight of an insert included in the mailing of registration renewal notices. - Amends TCA Title 55, Chapter 12 and Title 55, Chapter 4.

2767.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 4 and Title 70, relative to wildlife resources.
2767.description: As enacted, requires the wildlife resources agency, when conducting sales of timber harvested from agency property, to comply with all processes followed by the department of agriculture, division of forestry for those sales. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 4 and Title 70.

2768.last_action: Assigned to s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee
2768.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 4; Title 67; Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70, relative to the wildlife resources agency.
2768.description: As introduced, requires that proceeds from the sale of timber harvested or caused to be harvested by the wildlife resources agency from wildlife management areas be deposited in the general fund; limits the amount of timber to be harvested by the agency from wildlife management areas. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 11, Chapter 4; Title 67; Title 69, Chapter 9 and Title 70.

2770.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 55, relative to operation of law enforcement vehicles.
2770.description: As enacted, requires the department, in consultation with local law enforcement agencies, to produce informational material on how to interact with law enforcement when a person is being pulled over. - Amends TCA Title 55.

2772.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2772.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to the collateral review of criminal judgments.
2772.description: As introduced, increases from one to two the number of copies of a petition for post-conviction relief that the clerk of the trial court must mail to the attorney general and reporter. - Amends TCA Title 29; Title 39 and Title 40.

2773.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2773.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 6, relative to grants for education expenses.
2773.description: As introduced, enacts the "More Opportunities for Students in Tennessee (MOST) Act"; establishes a grant program to assist parents of eligible students with education expenses. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 6.

2774.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Agriculture & Natural Resources Subcommittee of Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
2774.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 11, Chapter 14 and Title 70, relative to hunting.
2774.description: As introduced, requires the commission to publish a map of its "no elk zone" on the Tennessee wildlife resource agency's website. - Amends TCA Title 11, Chapter 14 and Title 70.

2776.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2776.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to use of force.
2776.description: As introduced, grants a defendant who has been charged with a criminal offense based on the use of force or threatened use of force and who asserts that the force was justified by law the right to at least two justifiable use of force hearings prior to trial, at which the prosecution has the burden to prove by clear and convincing evidence that the use of force was unlawful; requires the court to dismiss the criminal charges and find the defendant immune from criminal prosecution if the prosecution fails to meet that burden. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2777.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Health Committee
2777.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 14 and Title 68, Chapter 11, relative to visitation in hospitals.
2777.description: As introduced, requires hospitals to permit at least one family member or patient representative who meets certain conditions to visit a patient of the hospital during end-of-life situations if a disaster, emergency, or public health emergency for COVID-19 has been declared. - Amends TCA Title 14 and Title 68, Chapter 11.

2778.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Health Committee
2778.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 20; Title 29; Title 37; Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to abortion.
2778.description: As introduced, reduces from seven days to 72 hours the period within which a physician must notify the board of medical examiners after learning that the physician has been criminally charged with violating the statutory requirements that a physician must satisfy prior to obtaining informed consent to an abortion from a pregnant woman. - Amends TCA Title 20; Title 29; Title 37; Title 39; Title 63 and Title 68.

2779.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38, Chapter 6, relative to criminal background checks.
2779.description: As enacted, authorizes clerks of court, county clerks, registers of deeds, and county trustees to enter into agreements with a fingerprint vendor that is under contract with the Tennessee bureau of investigation for purposes of providing fingerprint capture services for fingerprint-based background checks permitted by law; enacts other related provisions. - Amends TCA Title 38, Chapter 6.

2780.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to educator licensure.
2780.description: As introduced, requires the board to post on its website a list of the states with which the board has entered into a reciprocal agreement. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2781.last_action: Failed in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2781.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 29; Title 54; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 66, relative to property.
2781.description: As introduced, extends the publication requirement for a petition to correct an error in a deed of conveyance from 30 days before the petition is to be heard to 45 days. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 11; Title 12; Title 13; Title 29; Title 54; Title 64; Title 65 and Title 66.

2782.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 36, Part 8, relative to reemployment as a teacher, substitute teacher, or bus driver after retirement.
2782.description: As enacted, authorizes, from July 1, 2022, to July 1, 2025, retirees who have been retired for at least 60 days from TCRS or from a superseded system administered by the state, or from a local retirement fund, to accept re-employment as a kindergarten through twelfth grade teacher, substitute teacher, or school bus driver without loss or suspension of retirement benefits if certain conditions are met. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 36, Part 8.

2783.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 9 and Title 49, relative to education.
2783.description: As introduced, authorizes the dyslexia advisory council to submit the council's annual report to the education committee of the senate and the education instruction committee of the house of representatives electronically. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 9 and Title 49.

2784.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
2784.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 3, Chapter 6; Title 4 and Title 8, relative to lobbyists.
2784.description: As introduced, prohibits paid lobbyists from serving as members of state and local boards, commissions, and other governmental entities. - Amends TCA Title 3, Chapter 6; Title 4 and Title 8.

2785.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2785.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 41 and Title 71, Chapter 4, relative to vending facilities.
2785.description: As introduced, extends the deadline to hold a hearing on a dispute between the management of public property and the department concerning the provision of vending facilities by blind individuals from within 30 days of the appointment of an administrative law judge to within 45 days of the appointment of an administrative law judge. - Amends TCA Title 41 and Title 71, Chapter 4.

2786.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Cities & Counties Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
2786.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8 and Title 68, relative to employee assistance programs.
2786.description: As introduced, makes the state's employee assistance program, including components for mental health and wellness, available to all active members of a recognized fire department; requires a career fire department to pay for the costs of access to the program for its firefighters; requires the state to pay for the costs of access for volunteer firefighters. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8 and Title 68.

2788.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, relative to unlawful exposure.
2788.description: As enacted, classifies as the Class A misdemeanor offense "unlawful exposure" the distribution of an image of an identifiable person engaged in sexually explicit conduct if: the image was photographed or recorded under circumstances where the parties agreed or understood that the image would remain private; and the person depicted in the image suffers emotional distress. - Amends TCA Title 39.

2791.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2791.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39, Chapter 13; Title 40 and Title 68, Chapter 10, relative to the HIV Modernization Act.
2791.description: As introduced, enacts the "HIV Modernization Act." - Amends TCA Title 39, Chapter 13; Title 40 and Title 68, Chapter 10.

2792.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2792.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 12, Chapter 4 and Title 50, Chapter 2, relative to wages.
2792.description: As introduced, increases, from $7.25 to $15, the minimum hourly wage for employees within this state. - Amends TCA Title 12, Chapter 4 and Title 50, Chapter 2.

2794.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2794.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 40, relative to the administration of justice.
2794.description: As introduced, changes the date by which the fiscal review committee must submit its report regarding the minimum and maximum authorized fine ranges for criminal offenses to the general assembly from January 15 to January 30. - Amends TCA Title 40.

2795.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2795.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5 and Title 6, relative to state and local government.
2795.description: As introduced, authorizes members of the general assembly to nominate to the governor two persons each year, instead of only one, for the Tennessee Tri-Star General Award; requires a county attorney to consult with and advise elected officials, their deputies, and their employees as to the proper application and enforcement of federal and state laws that are pertinent to carrying out the duties of such county officials' respective offices; shortens time period a county has to post revisions to its charter of incorporation on the website from three months to two months. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5 and Title 6.

2797.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2797.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 58, relative to emergency management.
2797.description: As introduced, requires that verbal requests seeking mutual aid or assistance with an emergency that are submitted by a governmental entity to another governmental entity be confirmed in writing to the responding governmental entity within 20 days, rather than 30 days, after the initial verbal request. - Amends TCA Title 58.

2798.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2798.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1, relative to transfer from juvenile court.
2798.description: As introduced, increases the age at which a juvenile can be transferred to criminal court and tried for a criminal offense as an adult to 17 years of age for any offense. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1.

2799.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2799.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to adjunct educators.
2799.description: As introduced, requires a state university's board of trustees to notify each of the state university's adjunct professors if the board takes an action that directly affects the adjunct professors employed by the state university; allows the notice to be transmitted by electronic mail. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2800.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 11, Part 7, relative to community-based vocational rehabilitation services.
2800.description: As enacted, makes various changes to the system established by the commissioner of human services for providing rehabilitation centers for persons with disabilities; changes the name of the advisory board for rehabilitation centers to the advisory board for community-based vocational rehabilitation services; extends the new board to June 30, 2026. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 29 and Title 49, Chapter 11, Part 7.

2801.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2801.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to electronic tracking.
2801.description: As introduced, specifies that a course of conduct for purposes of stalking includes one instance of placing an electronic tracking device on a person or in or on a person's property, unless the electronic tracking device is placed by or at the direction of a law enforcement officer. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

2802.last_action: Assigned to s/c Public Service Subcommittee
2802.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, relative to the state flag.
2802.description: As introduced, requires that official flags of the United States and of the state of Tennessee, purchased under a local contract, in addition to state contracts, be manufactured in the United States. - Amends TCA Title 4.

2803.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2803.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 6; Title 12; Title 13; Title 66 and Title 67, Chapter 5, relative to annexation.
2803.description: As introduced, increases the number of signatures required on a petition to request that a larger municipality annex a smaller municipality, from 20 percent of the qualified voters of the smaller municipality who voted in the last general election to 30 percent of the qualified voters of the smaller municipality who voted in the last general election. - Amends TCA Title 6; Title 12; Title 13; Title 66 and Title 67, Chapter 5.

2804.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2804.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 37, Chapter 1, Part 1, relative to sentencing.
2804.description: As introduced, establishes a pilot program that would authorize a juvenile court to retain jurisdiction over a delinquent child until their twenty-fifth birthday if best suited for the child's treatment, rehabilitation, and welfare. - Amends TCA Title 37, Chapter 1, Part 1.

2805.last_action: Failed in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2805.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41, relative to witnesses.
2805.description: As introduced, creates the Tennessee witness protection and relocation grant pilot program within the department of finance and administration's office of criminal justice programs. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 36; Title 37; Title 38; Title 39; Title 40 and Title 41.

2808.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2808.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to serious mental illness.
2808.description: As introduced, states that a defendant is not eligible for the death penalty if the defendant suffered from a serious mental illness at the time of the alleged offense that, while not meeting the standard to be found not guilty by reason of insanity or incompetent to stand trial, significantly impaired the defendant's capacity to exercise rational judgment; permits an offender who was sentenced to death prior to July 1, 2022, to petition to be resentenced to life imprisonment without possibility of parole due to serious mental illness. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

2809.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Criminal Justice Committee
2809.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8, Chapter 13; Title 35; Title 39, Chapter 17; Title 45; Title 47; Title 66 and Section 67-4-409, relative to property.
2809.description: As introduced, increases, from 20 to 25 days, the time when a creditor that has redeemed land from the original purchaser for debt, or from one who has previously redeemed the land for debt, may advance upon the bid for the land any sum, to the extent of that creditor's debt, as if the creditor was the original purchaser. - Amends TCA Title 8, Chapter 13; Title 35; Title 39, Chapter 17; Title 45; Title 47; Title 66 and Section 67-4-409.

2810.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee of Commerce Committee
2810.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 62, Chapter 35, relative to private protective services.
2810.description: As introduced, requires the department of commerce and insurance to maintain on the department's website a database of each person who is registered to act as a security guard/officer and the name of any entity employing the person as a security guard/officer; makes various changes to the registration requirements for security guards/officers. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 62, Chapter 35.

2813.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
2813.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to minority teachers.
2813.description: As introduced, requires the commission to notify minority teaching fellowship award recipients of teaching opportunities and programs that offer assistance for minority teachers. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2814.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2814.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to law enforcement.
2814.description: As introduced, requires that the sheriff's department's or municipal police department's annual audited report of proceeds from certain seized and forfeited goods and certain fines be submitted to the appropriate legislative body by February 1 of each year. - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 10, Chapter 7, Part 5; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

2815.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
2815.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 4, relative to law enforcement.
2815.description: As introduced, requires TSAC to administer a law enforcement fellows program whereby recipients receive an award to attend a postsecondary degree program in this state that furthers a student's knowledge in law enforcement if certain criteria are met. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 4.

2816.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2816.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 47; Title 53; Title 67 and Title 68, relative to waste management.
2816.description: As introduced, changes from March 31 to March 1, the date by which each municipal solid waste region must submit the annual progress report to the commissioner of environment and conservation for the immediately preceding calendar year that includes data on collection; recycling; transportation; disposal; public costs; and other information relevant to solid waste planning and management. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 5; Title 6; Title 7; Title 47; Title 53; Title 67 and Title 68.

2817.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2817.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to conflict resolution.
2817.description: As introduced, requires LEAs to include a course of instruction for students in kindergarten through grade 12 with curricula designed to educate students in conflict resolution that is age and grade appropriate. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2818.last_action: Assigned to s/c Banking & Consumer Affairs Subcommittee
2818.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 12, Chapter 4 and Title 50, relative to wages.
2818.description: As introduced, requires the department of labor and workforce development to establish a living wage for the state. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 12, Chapter 4 and Title 50.

2819.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2819.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 40, relative to forfeiture.
2819.description: As introduced, requires the department of safety to provide the annual report on civil asset forfeiture to the members of the judiciary committee of the senate and the civil justice and criminal justice committees of the house of representatives, rather than the chairs of the committees. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40.

2822.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2822.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 68, relative to health care.
2822.description: As introduced, moves, from February 1 to March 15, the date by which the commissioner must report to the governor and to each house of the general assembly regarding the department's nursing home inspection and enforcement activities during the previous year. - Amends TCA Title 68.

2823.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2823.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 47, relative to commerce.
2823.description: As introduced, changes the date by which the consumer affairs division of the attorney general must submit its annual operations report from February 1 to March 30. - Amends TCA Title 47.

2828.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 7, Chapter 51 and Title 49, relative to grants by local government entities.
2828.description: As introduced, authorizes a local government or local education agency to create a program to incentivize medical professionals, police officers, firefighters, and teachers to live and work within the boundaries of the local government by providing grants to such professionals in an amount that is equal to the amount of property tax due on such person's principal residence. - Amends TCA Title 7, Chapter 51 and Title 49.

2829.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2829.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 31; Title 38; Title 46 and Title 62, relative to victims of homicide.
2829.description: As introduced, allows a person to file a petition for an injunction to prohibit the delivery of the remains of a victim of certain homicide offenses to the next of kin, if the next of kin is found to have committed the offense by a preponderance of the evidence; requires a court issuing such an injunction to include in its order the next person to whom the remains must be delivered. - Amends TCA Title 31; Title 38; Title 46 and Title 62.

2830.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Property & Planning Subcommittee of Local Government Committee
2830.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 66, relative to property.
2830.description: As introduced, requires a landlord subject to the Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act to use an updated electronic mail address provided to the landlord in writing for notifications required to be sent to the tenant. - Amends TCA Title 66.

2831.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Agriculture & Natural Resources Committee
2831.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 53 and Title 70, relative to donations of meat.
2831.description: As introduced, authorizes hunters to donate meat from wild hogs and other non-indigenous animals to nonprofit organizations that operate food pantries and soup kitchens, under certain circumstances. - Amends TCA Title 53 and Title 70.

2832.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Education Instruction Subcommittee of Education Instruction
2832.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 13 and Title 67, Chapter 5, Part 2, relative to charter schools.
2832.description: As introduced, reduces the amount of time within which certain decisions must be made concerning applications for public charter schools; creates process for authorization of replications of a public charter school; establishes a fund to assist public charter schools in obtaining favorable financing; makes various other changes and additions to law concerning charter schools. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 13 and Title 67, Chapter 5, Part 2.

2833.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
2833.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to face recognition.
2833.description: As introduced, prohibits a state or local law enforcement agency or law enforcement officer from obtaining, retaining, accessing, or using any face recognition system or any information obtained from a face recognition system; creates a private right of action that may be brought by a person who has been unlawfully subjected to face recognition technology or about whom information has been unlawfully obtained, retained, accessed, or used. - Amends TCA Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

2834.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
2834.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 8; Title 9; Title 14; Title 33; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to health.
2834.description: As introduced, enacts the “Youth Health Protection Act.” - Amends TCA Title 8; Title 9; Title 14; Title 33; Title 63 and Title 68.

2835.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
2835.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 55, relative to drivers failing to exercise due care.
2835.description: As introduced, enacts "Roger's Law," which enhances the penalties for failing to exercise due care while driving when it results in serious bodily injury or death to another person. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 55.

2836.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
2836.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 29 and Title 39, relative to liability.
2836.description: As introduced, establishes a cause of action for a victim of human trafficking to recover damages from the person or entity that commits a human trafficking offense or knowingly benefits from participating in a venture that traffics another person. - Amends TCA Title 29 and Title 39.

2839.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, relative to TennCare.
2839.description: As enacted, requires the bureau to, in consultation with and approval of the commissioner of finance and administration, develop and implement a program substantially similar to the federal centers for medicare and medicaid services’ Emergency Triage, Treat, and Transport model for emergency services. - Amends TCA Title 71.

2840.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
2840.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 9; Title 33 and Title 41, relative to mental and behavioral health.
2840.description: As introduced, requires the department to establish a behavioral health jail diversion grant program and a community crisis response grant program for the purpose of supporting community response and jail diversion programs related to mental and behavioral health. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 3; Title 9; Title 33 and Title 41.

2842.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Health Subcommittee of Health Committee
2842.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68, relative to healthcare outcomes.
2842.description: As introduced, enacts the "Equitable Health Outcomes Act" to create the health outcomes review board within the department of health. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 56; Title 63 and Title 68.

2843.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
2843.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 9 and Title 49, relative to kindergarten through grade twelve (K-12) education funding. This act makes appropriations for kindergarten through grade twelve education funding for the fiscal year beginning July 1, 2022.
2843.description: As introduced, enacts the "K-12 Block Grant Act," which distributes block grants to each LEA to improve the quality of education; appropriates $250 million from excess state tax revenues over-collected in fiscal years 2020-2021 and 2021-2022 for K-12 block grants. - Amends TCA Title 9 and Title 49.

2844.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2844.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 5; Title 6; Title 8; Title 16; Title 24; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40, relative to mental health.
2844.description: As introduced, specifies that the statewide planning and policy council for the department of mental health must submit its annual report to the governor and the general assembly by September 15. - Amends TCA Title 5; Title 6; Title 8; Title 16; Title 24; Title 33; Title 38; Title 39 and Title 40.

2845.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 55 and Title 67, relative to tax credits.
2845.description: As introduced, increases from 25 to 30 the number of qualified jobs that a qualified business entity must create within an investment period, not to exceed three years, to qualify for a job tax credit. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 55 and Title 67.

2846.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 15, Chapter 2, relative to Ida B. Wells.
2846.description: As enacted, designates July 16 as "Ida B. Wells Day." - Amends TCA Title 15, Chapter 2.

2848.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 63, relative to healthcare professional licensing.
2848.description: As enacted, authorizes the board of medical examiners and the board of osteopathic examination to issue short-term visitor clinical training licenses to eligible foreign medical graduates and physicians, subject to certain conditions. - Amends TCA Title 63.

2849.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2849.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 39, relative to a handgun safety course.
2849.description: As introduced, requires the department of safety to create a voucher program for the purpose of providing a handgun safety course to purchasers of handguns at no cost to the handgun purchaser; limits the value of the voucher to $30. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 39.

2850.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Insurance Committee
2850.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 7, relative to the use of genetic information.
2850.description: As introduced, adds life insurance and long-term care insurance to the types of insurance for which an insurance provider is prohibited from denying coverage or varying the premiums, terms, or conditions of coverage on the basis of an individual’s genetic information. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 7.

2851.last_action: Assigned to s/c Elections & Campaign Finance Subcommittee
2851.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 2; Title 3 and Title 4, Chapter 55, relative to government reform.
2851.description: As introduced, creates the campaign finance reform commission and charges the commission with certain duties related to campaign finance reform. - Amends TCA Title 2; Title 3 and Title 4, Chapter 55.

2852.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee of Criminal Justice Committee
2852.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 63, relative to healthcare providers.
2852.description: As introduced, changes the offense of assault against a first responder or nurse to assault against a first responder or healthcare provider; defines healthcare provider as a person registered, licensed, or certified under title 33, title 63, or title 68. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 63.

2853.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in Education Administration
2853.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, relative to COVID-19 sick leave.
2853.description: As introduced, authorizes up to 10 days of paid COVID-19 sick leave for full-time and part-time public school employees, including employees caring for a family member who has COVID-19 or who live with a person who has COVID-19; requires the department of education to amend its federal plan to include COVID-19 paid sick leave for early childhood program employees. - Amends TCA Title 49.

2854.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 56, Chapter 7, Part 23, relative to coverage of emergency services.
2854.description: As enacted, prohibits a health benefit plan from denying payment or coverage for emergency services if the symptoms presented by an enrollee of a health benefit plan and recorded by the attending provider indicate that an emergency medical condition could exist, regardless of the final diagnosis of the symptoms. - Amends TCA Title 56, Chapter 7, Part 23.

2855.title: AN ACT to amend Chapter 158 of the Private Acts of 1927; as amended and rewritten by Chapter 1 of the Private Acts of 1989; as amended by Chapter 172 of the Private Acts of 1994; and any other acts amendatory thereto, relative to the charter of the City of Springfield.
2855.description: Subject to local approval, reduces the number of readings required for the passage of ordinances by the board of mayor and aldermen from three to two; raises the monetary limit on purchases that do not require competitive bidding from $4,000 to $25,000. - Amends Chapter 158 of the Private Acts of 1927; as amended and rewritten.

2856.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 68-11-239, relative to central service technicians.
2856.description: As enacted, removes the requirement that the credentials held by a person to practice as a central service technician must have been administered by the International Association of Healthcare Central Service Material Management or the Certification Board for Sterile Processing and Distribution, Inc.; allows an individual the option to obtain a certified sterile processing and distribution technician credential instead of a certified registered central service technician credential. - Amends TCA Section 68-11-239.

2858.last_action: Assigned to s/c Civil Justice Subcommittee
2858.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 10-7-504 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13, relative to a voluntary waiver of firearm rights.
2858.description: As introduced, creates a process for a person to file a voluntary waiver of firearm rights for the purpose of prohibiting the person from purchasing a firearm; provides for a revocation of the voluntary waiver of firearm rights; creates the offense of selling or transferring a firearm to a person knowing that the person has executed a voluntary waiver of firearm rights that has not been revoked. - Amends TCA Section 10-7-504 and Title 39, Chapter 17, Part 13.

2859.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39 and Title 44, Chapter 17, relative to criminal offenses.
2859.description: As introduced, creates the Class C misdemeanor of restraining a dog with a chain, cord, tether, cable, or similar device while a disaster is imminent or occurring; states that a person is not subject to prosecution for a violation unless the person has previously received a warning citation for a violation. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 44, Chapter 17.

2860.last_action: Failed in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
2860.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Section 49-3-307(a)(4) and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 26, relative to K-12 education.
2860.description: As introduced, revises student eligibility criteria for an education savings account; establishes the 2024-2025 fiscal year as the fiscal year in which the cost differential factor must be eliminated from the basic education program. - Amends TCA Section 49-3-307(a)(4) and Title 49, Chapter 6, Part 26.

2861.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c Finance, Ways, and Means Subcommittee of Finance, Ways, and Means Committee
2861.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 71, relative to services for persons with diabetes.
2861.description: As introduced, requires TennCare to develop and implement a three-year pilot program to provide a continuous glucose monitor to each patient with diabetes who is a TennCare beneficiary; authorizes the director of TennCare to seek a federal waiver deemed necessary to implement the pilot program. - Amends TCA Title 71.

2864.last_action: Assigned to s/c Business & Utilities Subcommittee
2864.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 62, Chapter 4, relative to cosmetology.
2864.description: As introduced, extends, from 10 days of an effective date to 15 days, the time within which the board of cosmetology and barber examiners must publish a compilation of its laws, rules, and any amendments or other changes to the laws and rules on its website. - Amends TCA Title 62, Chapter 4.

2866.last_action: Failed in s/c Departments & Agencies Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2866.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 57, Chapter 3, relative to liquor.
2866.description: As introduced, exempts spouses of law enforcement officials from the list of persons prohibited from obtaining a retail license to sell alcoholic beverages. - Amends TCA Title 57, Chapter 3.

2867.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 37; Title 68 and Title 71, relative to refugees.
2867.description: As enacted, adds the department of finance and administration to the list of recipients under the requirement that the Tennessee office for refugees at least quarterly transmit certain information to the chairs of the state government committee of the house and state and local government committee of the senate, and to the chair of the budget committee of either the city council or the county legislative body regulating a host community. - Amends TCA Title 4; Title 8; Title 9; Title 37; Title 68 and Title 71.

2868.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 70, relative to hunting where bait is present.
2868.description: As introduced, creates exception to Class C misdemeanor offense for hunting over bait when bait was on the land before hunting begins and the land is not posted by wildlife officers as a baited dove field. - Amends TCA Title 70.

2869.last_action: Taken off notice for cal in s/c K-12 Subcommittee of Education Administration
2869.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 49, Chapter 1, relative to the department of education.
2869.description: As introduced, requires the department to develop a database that contains certain information regarding the department's contracts and grants and publish the database on the department's website; requires each LEA to publish the database on the LEA's website. - Amends TCA Title 49, Chapter 1.

2871.last_action: Taken off notice for cal. in State Government Committee
2871.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4, Chapter 1, Part 4; Title 4, Chapter 11; Title 4, Chapter 12 and Title 4, Chapter 13, relative to historic memorials.
2871.description: As introduced, prescribes a fine against a public entity for certain acts relating to historic memorials. - Amends TCA Title 4, Chapter 1, Part 4; Title 4, Chapter 11; Title 4, Chapter 12 and Title 4, Chapter 13.

2872.last_action: Failed in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2872.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4 and Title 11, relative to historical relics.
2872.description: As introduced, requires certain artifacts from the Civil War pertaining to the Confederate States of America be transferred to the Sons of Confederate Veterans for preservation, at their cost. - Amends TCA Title 4 and Title 11.

2873.last_action: Failed in s/c Public Service Subcommittee of State Government Committee
2873.title: AN ACT relative to the bust of Nathan Bedford Forrest in the Tennessee State Museum.
2873.description: As introduced, transfers the custody and care of the bust of Nathan Bedford Forrest held in the Tennessee State Museum to the Sons of Confederate Veterans.

2874.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 41, relative to pregnant women who are incarcerated.
2874.description: As enacted, prohibits, beginning on the date on which a pregnancy is known to a law enforcement agency and confirmed by a healthcare professional, placing an inmate, who is in the custody of a correctional institution, in restraints; creates certain exceptions. - Amends TCA Title 41.

2875.last_action: P2C, caption bill, held on desk - pending amdt.
2875.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 39; Title 40 and Title 68, relative to the HIV Modernization Act.
2875.description: As introduced, enacts the "HIV Modernization Act"; specifies that licensed medical laboratories must report the results of the HIV test required in regard to assault victims by electronic or other means. - Amends TCA Title 39; Title 40 and Title 68.

2876.title: AN ACT to amend Tennessee Code Annotated, Title 4; Section 8-50-103 and Section 68-1-113, relative to the human rights commission.
